Text:
Equipped weapons determine your available attacks. Each weapon has a basic attack (<Attack1>) and two special attacks (<Attack2> and <Attack3>). Special attacks are powerful but have short cooldowns.

Victor Vran will execute attacks in the direction of the mouse cursor and will target foes directly under the mouse cursor.

Level 4 unlocks a second weapon slot. You can switch between your weapons with <SwitchWeapon>.

Each weapon offers a different play style to master. To learn more about the specific weapons and their attacks, check out the Weapons category in the Codex.
New Translation:
裝備的武器決定了你可以進行的攻擊方式。每種武器都有一個基本攻擊（<Attack1>）和兩個招式（<Attack2> 和 <Attack3>）。招式的威力更強，但需要短暫的冷卻。

維克多．弗蘭會向游標方向進行攻擊，並會將游標指著的敵人作為目標。

等級4時會解鎖第二欄武器。你可以按 <SwitchWeapon> 切換武器。

每種武器都能帶來不同的玩法。想深入了解特定武器和攻擊方式，請查閱百科全書中的武器章節。

Text:
Equipped weapons determine your available attacks. Each weapon has a basic attack (<Attack1>) and two special attacks (<Attack2> and <Attack3>). Special attacks are powerful but have short cooldowns. Hold <ForceAttack> to attack at your current position.

Level 4 unlocks a second weapon slot. You can switch between your weapons with <SwitchWeapon>.

Each weapon offers a different play style to master. To learn more about the specific weapons and their attacks, check out the Weapons category in the Codex.
New Translation:
裝備的武器決定了你可以進行的攻擊方式。每種武器都有一個基本攻擊（<Attack1>）和兩個招式（<Attack2> 和 <Attack3>）。招式的威力更強，但需要短暫的冷卻。按住 <ForceAttack> 可在原地進行攻擊。

等級4時會解鎖第二欄武器。你可以按 <SwitchWeapon> 切換武器。

每種武器都能帶來不同的玩法。想深入了解特定武器和攻擊方式，請查閱百科全書中的武器章節。

Text:
Equipped weapons determine your available attacks. Each weapon has a basic attack (<X>) and two special attacks (<Y> and <B>). Special attacks are powerful but have short cooldowns.

Level 4 unlocks a second weapon slot. You can switch between your weapons with <RB>.

Each weapon offers a different play style to master. To learn more about the specific weapons and their attacks, check out the Weapons category in the Codex.
New Translation:
裝備的武器決定了你可以進行的攻擊方式。每種武器都有一個基本攻擊（<X>）和兩個招式（<Y> 和 <B>）。招式的威力更強，但需要短暫的冷卻。

等級4時會解鎖第二欄武器。你可以按 <RB> 切換武器。

每種武器都能帶來不同的玩法。想深入了解特定武器和攻擊方式，請查閱百科全書中的武器章節。

Text:
Legendary weapons are some of the most powerful tools of the hunter's trade. Their stats are not randomized and they have unique effects and attacks that can't be found on any other weapon.

The damage of all Legendary weapons scales as you level up.
New Translation:
傳奇武器是獵人世界裡最強大的武器。它們的數據不是隨機的，每一把傳奇武器都有別於其它武器的獨特效果和攻擊方式。

所有傳奇武器的傷害都會隨你的等級提升。

Text:
You can equip two stacks of Consumables that can be activated with <UseConsumable1> and <UseConsumable2>.

Potions heal and grant beneficial effects. Bombs deal damage and apply different effects to all foes in a large area around the hero. Bombs have long cooldowns, so use them wisely.
New Translation:
你可以裝備兩組消耗品，分別按 <UseConsumable1> 和 <UseConsumable2> 使用。

藥劑可以治癒傷勢、強化能力。炸彈可以對玩家周圍大範圍的敵人造成傷害以及施加不同效果。炸彈的冷卻時間很長，請謹慎使用。

Potions heal and grant beneficial effects. Bombs deal damage and apply different effects to all foes in a large area around the hero. Bombs have long cooldowns, so use them wisely.
New Translation:
你可以裝備兩組消耗品，分別按 <DPadLeft> 和 <DPadRight> 使用。

藥劑可以治癒傷勢、強化能力。炸彈可以對玩家周圍大範圍的敵人造成傷害以及施加不同效果。炸彈的冷卻時間很長，請謹慎使用。

Text:
You gain Overdrive when attacking and killing monsters. Overdrive is indicated by the yellow bar next to your health. The more damage an attack makes, the more Overdrive it provides.

Overdrive is spent to activate supernatural attacks called Demon Powers (<UseRune1> and <UseRune2>). You can hold the buttons to aim and target where the attack will land precisely.

Outfits modify the way Victor Vran gains or spends Overdrive. For example the starting Hunter's Outfit provides additional Overdrive when you take damage.
New Translation:
你在攻擊和殺死怪物時會凝聚超能。超能以黃色條顯示在生命的右邊。攻擊造成的傷害越高，凝聚的超能越多。

超能可以用來施展惡魔之力（<UseRune1> 和 <UseRune2>）。按住按鍵可以精確瞄準攻擊位置。

服裝也會改變維克多．弗蘭凝聚或使用超能的方式。例如：初始的獵人服裝能使你在受到傷害時凝聚額外的超能。

Text:
You gain Overdrive when attacking and killing monsters. Overdrive is indicated by the yellow bar next to your health. The more damage an attack makes, the more Overdrive it provides.

Overdrive is spent to activate supernatural attacks called Demon Powers (<LT> and <RT>). You can hold the buttons to aim and target where the attack will land precisely.

Outfits modify the way Victor Vran gains or spends Overdrive. For example the starting Hunter's Outfit provides additional Overdrive when you take damage.

你在攻擊和殺死怪物時會凝聚超能。超能以黃色條顯示在生命的右邊。攻擊造成的傷害越高，凝聚的超能越多。

超能可以用來施展惡魔之力（<LT> 和 <RT>）。按住按鈕可以精確瞄準攻擊位置。

服裝也會改變維克多．弗蘭凝聚或使用超能的方式。例如：初始的獵人服裝能使你在受到傷害時凝聚額外的超能。

Text: Champion foes are some of the more powerful monsters you'll face. They are tougher then other members of their kin and may have additional attributes. In addition each Champion monster will use a specific Demon Power against you. Slaying Champions gives you a chance to acquire their Demon Powers.
New Translation: 悍將是你會遇見的強大怪物。牠們比同類的普通怪物更加棘手，可能還有額外的屬性。除此之外，每個悍將都會使用獨特的惡魔之力，殺了牠們可讓你有機會獲得其惡魔之力。

Text:
Outfits are items that change your outlook and the way you use Demon Powers and Overdrive. Some Outfits provide Armor and other bonuses.

You may customize the color of your Outfit by transmuting it together with Dyes.
New Translation:
服裝是能改變你的外觀和使用惡魔之力與超能的物品。有些服裝會提供防禦和其它加成。

將服裝和染料一同合成，可自訂服裝的顏色。

Text:
You can equip Destiny Cards to receive a variety of different passive abilities. To equip a card you'll need to both have a free slot and enough free Destiny Points. If a card is Unique you can never equip more than one copy of it.

You begin the game with two slots for Destiny Cards and 4 Destiny Points. You will gain additional slots and points as you level up.

The majority of Destiny Card effects stack, either adding their bonuses together or allowing the effect to trigger several times during the cooldown period.
New Translation:
你可以裝備命運牌來獲得各式各樣的被動能力。要裝備命運牌，你需要有空的牌槽和足夠的命運點。如果牌是獨特的，那同類的牌你只能裝備一張。

開始遊戲時你會有2格命運牌槽和4點命運點，隨著等級提升你會獲得更多的牌槽和點數。

大多數命運牌的效果會疊加，不是提升整體加成，就是在冷卻期間能發動效果數次。

Text:
Hexes are special items that allow you to challenge yourself and increase the difficulty of the game. You can activate Hexes from your inventory or the map screen.

You will gain a 10% bonus to XP and you will find 5% more items for each active Hex. In addition each Hex tracks the number of monsters you've slain while under its effect and shows a star rating based on that number.
New Translation:
禁咒是讓你挑戰自己，提高遊戲難度的特殊物品。你可以從物品欄或地圖介面啟用禁咒。

每啟用一個禁咒都會提升10%經驗獲得量和5%物品掉落數。除此之外，每個禁咒都會記錄在它的作用下被殺死的怪物數量，並依據其數量顯示星級排名。

Text:
Use the <Move_CameraForward>, <Move_CameraLeft>, <Move_CameraBackward>, <Move_CameraRight> keys to move.

Double tap a direction key or press <Dodge> while moving to dodge away from attacks. You can disable double tap to dodge from the Options (Gameplay).
New Translation:
按 <Move_CameraForward>、<Move_CameraLeft>、<Move_CameraBackward>、<Move_CameraRight> 移動。

雙擊方向鍵或在移動時按 <Dodge> 以翻滾來閃避攻擊。你可以在選項（操作）中關閉雙擊翻滾。

Text:
Point and press <Attack1> to move to that point. Use <Goto> to force the character to move to a point even if there's a monster there.

Use <Dodge_CursorForward> to dodge to pointer. Use <Dodge_CameraForward> to dodge forward (camera relative). Use <Dodge_CameraBackward> to dodge back (camera relative). Use dodge to avoid enemy attacks.
New Translation:
指向某點並按 <Attack1> 移動到該處。使用 <Goto> 強制讓角色移動到某點，即使那裡有怪物。

使用 <Dodge_CursorForward> 向游標方向翻滾。使用 <Dodge_CameraForward> 向前翻滾（相對於鏡頭）。使用 <Dodge_CameraBackward> 向後翻滾（相對於鏡頭）。利用翻滾來避開敵人的攻擊吧。

Text:
Use <LS> to move.

Press <LB> while moving to dodge and avoid attacks.
New Translation:
使用 <LS> 移動。

移動時按 <LB> 以翻滾來閃避攻擊。

Text:
Press <Jump> to jump.

You can rebound off a wall by pressing <Jump> again. You can perform up to two wall jumps. Use wall jumping to climb up obstacles and discover hidden paths and secrets.
New Translation:
按 <Jump> 跳躍。

你可以再按一次 <Jump> 進行蹬牆跳，最多能進行兩次。利用蹬牆跳來翻越障礙、找出隱藏的小路和祕密吧。

Text:
Press <JumpCursor> to jump towards the mouse pointer. Use <Attack1> to move in mid-air.

You can rebound off a wall by pressing <JumpCursor> again. You can perform up to two wall jumps. Use wall jumping to climb up obstacles and discover hidden paths and secrets.
New Translation:
按 <JumpCursor> 向游標方向跳躍。使用 <Attack1> 在空中移動。

你可以再按一次 <JumpCursor> 進行蹬牆跳，最多能進行兩次。利用蹬牆跳來翻越障礙、找出隱藏的小路和祕密吧。

Text:
Press <A>  to jump.

You can rebound off a wall by pressing <A> again. You can perform up to two wall jumps. Use wall jumping to climb up obstacles and discover hidden paths and secrets.
New Translation:
按 <A> 跳躍。

你可以再按一次 <A> 進行蹬牆跳，最多能進行兩次。利用蹬牆跳來翻越障礙、找出隱藏的小路和祕密吧。

Text:
Checkpoints preserve your progress for the current play session. If you die, you will be able to revive at the last activated checkpoint or at the start of the zone if you haven't activated a Checkpoint yet.

Returning to the HUB or exiting the game resets checkpoints, monsters and challenges in progress.
New Translation:
紀錄點可以儲存你目前的遊戲進度。如果你死了，你可以在最後啟動的紀錄點重生；如果你尚未啟動紀錄點，你可以在地圖入口處重生。

返回主選單或離開遊戲會重置進度中的紀錄點、怪物和挑戰。

Text:
Damage (<imagescale 40><image UI/Common/damage.tga>) - The range of damage this item or skill does

Critical Chance (<imagescale 40><image UI/Common/critical_chance.tga>) - The chance that an attack will score a critical hit. Each weapon has its own Critical Chance

Critical Damage (<imagescale 40><image UI/Common/critical_bonus.tga>) - The bonus damage that critical hits deal (based on weapon damage)

Health (<imagescale 40><image UI/Common/Health.tga>) - The bonus to max health provided by the item

Armor (<imagescale 40><image UI/Common/armor.tga>) - Provides a chance to reduce incoming damage from an attack (but not any additional effects). Bombs and Demon Powers ignore Armor.

Armor Penetration (<imagescale 40><image UI/Common/armor_penalty.tga>) - Allows you to ignore some of the enemy Armor

Cooldown (<imagescale 40><image UI/Common/cooldown.tga>) - The duration of the skill's cooldown
New Translation:
傷害（<imagescale 40><image UI/Common/damage.tga>）：物品或招式造成的傷害大小。

暴擊率（<imagescale 40><image UI/Common/critical_chance.tga>）：攻擊造成暴擊的機率。每種武器的暴擊率各不相同。

暴擊傷害（<imagescale 40><image UI/Common/critical_bonus.tga>）：暴擊造成的傷害（基於武器傷害）。

生命（<imagescale 40><image UI/Common/Health.tga>）：物品提供的最大生命加成。

防禦（<imagescale 40><image UI/Common/armor.tga>）：可降低受到攻擊的傷害（但無法抵抗附加狀態）。炸彈和惡魔之力能無視防禦。

護甲穿透（<imagescale 40><image UI/Common/armor_penalty.tga>）：無視敵人部分防禦。

冷卻時間（<imagescale 40><image UI/Common/cooldown.tga>）：招式冷卻需要的時間。

Text: To overkill a monster inflict massive damage to it with the killing blow. Overkill is more likely to happen when a strong attack is used against a monster at low health.
New Translation: 想打出絕殺必須對怪物最後一擊時給予極大的傷害。在怪物的生命低下時使用強力攻擊更有機會打出絕殺。

Text:
Bounties and treasure hunts are special items that you can share with other hunters using their unique Treasure Codes. Each offers a list of locations that you must visit and explore. You can find them in the "Other" section of your inventory.

Bounties are completed by slaying powerful Epic Monsters while Treasure Hunts require discovering Clues in each of the specified locations. There is one Epic Monster or Treasure Clue in each location, indicated by a special icon on your radar when you are close by. When you have accomplished your task in each location, you will be rewarded.

You can destroy completed or expired bounties to free up space in your inventory.
You can redeem shared treasure codes from the Options menu while playing Online.
New Translation:
懸賞令與尋寶圖都是特殊物品，你可以與其他獵人通過使用獨特的密碼進行分享。每一件物品都會提供幾處你必須拜訪與探索的地點。你可以在物品欄的「其它」項中找到這些物品。

懸賞是藉由殺死強大的史詩怪物來完成，尋寶則需要在每個特定地點尋找線索。每個地點都只有一隻史詩怪物或尋寶線索，當你就在附近時，小地圖上會用特殊標記顯示。當完成每個地點的任務後，你將會獲得獎勵。

你可以銷毀已完成或過期的懸賞令，以清出物品欄空間。
當進行連線時，你可以在選項選單中兌換分享的密碼。

Text:
I was walking to my grave.

Or so I thought after I crawled out of the remains of the carriage that brought me to the outskirts of Zagoravia. Just before we entered the city it was crushed by a pile of rocks that fell upon us. My reflexes saved me so I was standing there, trying to catch my breath and planning my next move.

From where I was standing the city seemed too quiet. But the accident that just happened proved the carriage-drivers were right to refuse even hearing about my offer to pay them drive me here. I was no fool, either - if it wasn't for Adrian's summons I would have never ventured into the beast's maw.

What was done was done. I could only hope to survive Zagoravia long enough to find Adrian.
New Translation:
我正邁入自己的墳墓。

至少在我爬出了帶我來到扎古拉維亞郊區的馬車殘骸後，我就這樣認為了。就在剛才進城前，我們被從天而降的石堆砸爛了。我的反應救了我，所以我還站在這裡，喘口氣，計劃我的下一步。

從我所站的地方看去，這座城市太過安靜了。但剛剛發生的事故說明馬車伕是對的，一聽到要來這裡，他就立刻拒絕我。我也不是笨蛋──要不是因為艾德里安的召喚，我永遠也不會冒險進入這野獸的巢穴。

事已至此，我只能希望在扎古拉維亞能活得夠久，讓我找到艾德里安。

Text:
This was no ordinary demon manifestation.

I never saw a settlement this big completely deserted. I wished the citizens had the chance to flee but I knew that they were all dead. A few steps further down the street and I found what killed them. Spider demons. But they weren't the problem that made me feel shivers up my spine. It was the voice in my head.

The owner of the voice was clearly of the worst kind of monster - one that talks. Nothing good could come out from conversing with such a creature, so I decided to keep my mouth shut and ignore its taunts.
New Translation:
這不是單純的惡魔顯威。

我從未見過居住區被摧毀的如此徹底。我希望居民們有機會能逃跑，但我知道他們全都死了。沿著街道走了幾步，我找到了兇手──蜘蛛惡魔。但讓我感到背脊發涼的不是牠們，而是我腦海中的聲音。

聲音的主人顯然是怪物中最棘手的那種──會說話的傢伙。與這種傢伙交談絕不會有什麼好事，所以我決定閉緊嘴巴，無視它的嘲諷。

Text:
The queen had lost her mind.

She still believed that she can win her impossible fight and that help is on the way. Poor soul. She was in a complete denial. The survivors gathered around her in the castle weren't doing her any favour, fuelling her confidence with the loyalty they expressed - the only reason any of them remained in Zagoravia, no matter whether they realized it or not.

But that didn't concern me. According to her words there were still surviving hunters in the city. I hoped that Adrian is among them. Dead or alive, I was going to find you, my friend.
New Translation:
女王已經瘋了。

她還相信她能打贏這場毫無勝算的戰爭，相信援軍就在路上。可憐的人啊，她完全不能接受現實。城堡裡聚集在她身邊的倖存者，既無力幫她任何的忙，也無法用他們的忠誠激起她的信心。不管他們有沒有意識到，忠誠是他們仍留在扎古拉維亞的唯一理由。

但那不關我的事。據她所說，城裡還有倖存的獵人。希望艾德里安是其中一人。不管是死是活，我都會找到你的，我的朋友。

Text:
I still have nightmares about thrusting my blade through Adrian's chest.

I knew I gave him what he craved - a release from his imprisonment. I saw it in his eyes - for a brief moment he was my friend again. As his body turned to ashes I felt overwhelmed with grief and anger.

But it wasn't the time for desperation. Adrian was used to lure me into Zagoravia. He was a mere puppet for the one who wanted me dead. Very well - I decided to satisfy the mastermind's desire and stay to make sure Adrian is avenged. But for this I needed help. Irene.
New Translation:
我還做著噩夢，夢見我的劍刺穿了艾德里安的胸膛。

我知道我給了他渴望的東西──從禁錮中解脫。在他眼中我看見──有那麼一瞬間，他又成了我的朋友。在他的身體化成灰時，我感到無盡的悲痛和憤怒。

但現在不是絕望的時候。艾德里安被利用來引誘我進到扎古拉維亞，他只是向我索命的人所操控的傀儡。很好，我決定滿足這個幕後黑手的願望，留在這裡，為艾德里安報仇。但為此我需要找艾琳幫我。

Text:
Another kingdom, same story. People dying because of their sovereign's hubris.

It seems that the Queen's guilt was waiting all this time below the surface of a mask of self-destructive denial. When Irene and I cornered her, she confessed everything. A dark pact between her and an unknown demon sealed Zagoravia's fate.

When fighting otherworldly forces you often have to follow the paths of the supernatural laws. The ghost of Tzar Borimir knew about the pact signed by the queen. I had to find his resting place and try to converse with him, hoping to discover the Gordian knot, the crux of the curse that befell Zagoravia.
New Translation:
不同的王國，相同的故事。人民因君主的傲慢而死。

看來女王的罪行就是一直不願接受自我毀滅的現實。當我和艾琳把女王逼入絕境，她坦承了一切。她與一個未知惡魔之間的黑暗契約，決定了扎古拉維亞的命運。

與非自然力量戰鬥時，你常常不得不循著超自然法則的道路前進。波利密爾沙皇的鬼魂知道女王簽訂的契約內容。我得找到他的逝世之地，試著與他交談，祈求能解開這個降臨於扎古拉維亞的詛咒癥結。

Text:
Fate had finally revealed the purpose it had in store for me.

Years ago I obtained terrific demon powers through my own dark pact. I remembered how quickly the feeling of triumph they brought me was replaced by grief when the people I loved began paying the price for my bargain with their lives. I fled into exile and tried to atone my mistakes by fighting the very demons that cursed me. During all my life I viewed my unusual abilities as a taint.

But the ghost of Tzar Borimir showed me the way. It was my destiny to follow his legacy for he was the First Hunter who built the Order and this city to protect the Well of Worlds - the portal that connects our world and the countless alien dimensions where demons reside.
New Translation:
命運終於揭露我即將面臨的使命。

幾年前，我簽下了黑暗契約，獲得了強大的惡魔之力。我記得，當我愛的人們，用生命為我的契約付出代價時，力量所帶來勝利的感覺是如何迅速地被悲傷取代。我到處流亡，並與那些詛咒我的惡魔奮戰，以彌補我的過錯。在我的一生中，我都把我的惡魔之力視作是污點。

但波利密爾沙皇的鬼魂給我指引了一條明路。我的命運是按照他的遺願行進的，因為祂是初代獵人，一手建立了獵魔組織和這座城市來保衛異界之井──那是一個連結我們世界和無數惡魔棲息的異界的傳送門。

Text:
I was going to hell.

To undo the curse that befell Zagoravia I had to physically destroy the contract that bound the word of Queen Katarina. The contract itself was within the possession of a powerful demon called The Solicitor, who happened to be of the worst kind - one that talks. I had to walk through the Well of Worlds and into the demon realm.

Was I afraid? Only a fool wouldn't be. But I was more than determined to make sure that Adrian and all those unfortunate hunters didn't die in vain.
New Translation:
我正邁向地獄。

為了解除降臨於扎古拉維亞的詛咒，我必須摧毀卡特蓮娜女王的契約。契約被一個稱為誘魂者的強大惡魔占有，牠碰巧也是那種最棘手的惡魔──會說話的傢伙。我必須穿過異界之井，進入惡魔的領土。

我害怕嗎？只有傻子才不怕。但我已決心不讓艾德里安，還有那些不幸的獵人白白死去。

Text:
Gabriel had to die.

Malevolently tricking the young, dying Katarina into signing a dark pact, he promised to hide her from retribution with a cloaking spell. It was all part of his plan to ensure that the dark bargain can never be fulfilled. This allowed the demon forces to invade Zagoravia in search of the life that was promised to them. Assured in the success of his grand scheme he bargained his soul for control over the events, creating one big, elaborate trap with the sole purpose of destroying any hunter who ventured inside. Unfortunately too many of my brethren answered the call of the desperate queen who feared for her kingdom.

But Gabriel had to answer for one more crime. He was the one who pushed me towards accepting the demon taint as a gift, dooming my beloved family. My father had always supported the hunters' cause and so the vampire saw him as a threat. I bet Gabriel was laughing while watching me cry by his deathbed as he withered and died before my eyes.

It is ironic that Gabriel made me become what he fears the most. Calling me into the city was a mistake that was going to cost him.
New Translation:
加百列必須死。

惡意誘騙年輕、垂死的卡特蓮娜簽訂了黑暗契約，並承諾用屏障法術讓她躲過代價索求。但讓黑暗契約無法履行也是他計畫中的一環。這讓惡魔得以入侵扎古拉維亞，以尋找被承諾屬於牠們的生命。為了確保這龐大的計畫成功，加百列拿自己的靈魂作為交易，將一切握在掌中，他建立了一個巨大複雜的陷阱，唯一的目的就是殺掉所有冒險進入的獵人。不幸的是，太多我的兄弟回應了絕望的女王為憂心王國安危而發出的號召。

但加百列還得對另一樁罪行付出代價。他也是誘惑我接受惡魔之力作為禮物的人，給我摯愛的家人帶來了死亡。我的父親一直在援助獵魔組織，所以這個吸血鬼一直視他為眼中釘。我打賭，在我親眼看著父親死去而哭喊時，加百列一定笑的很開心。

諷刺的是，加百列讓我成為了他最恐懼的東西。召喚我來這座城市是個錯誤，他一定會為此付出代價。

Text:
A different picture was unfolding.

Hidden behind the constant smoke screen from the Steam Quarter, it was hard to tell exactly how overwhelmingly grand Gabriel's mansion was. But once I traversed up the black hills that deceitfully revealed as little as possible of the manor, its full splendour became relevant. Indeed, menacing in its size, the luxurious and unorthodox facades painted an entirely different picture of the power stage here in Zagoravia. 

Obviously expanded time and again over the years, the entire design of the mansion revolved around revealing as little as possible of its grandness to the city below, masterfully making use of the rough hills that lied beneath it.

But once I got closer than any outsider was ever meant to, there was no longer hiding the absurd wealth and power that the owner, Gabriel, obviously wielded over Zagoravia. Of course, I was expected and none too soon did the ambushes begin.

Vampires flocking to their death one after another, countless meaningless deaths, paving the way to the one that matters - Gabriel. He knew I was coming for him.
New Translation:
一幅截然不同的情景正在展開。

藏於蒸汽區的終年迷霧後面，無法看清加百列府邸的壯闊。但當我爬上那遮掩莊園身形的黑山之後，才看清莊園的幅員遼闊。確實，除了大得嚇人的壓迫感，其奢華和奇特的外牆也描繪出扎古拉維亞權力舞台的另一面。

很明顯地，雖經持續擴建，但建築巧妙地運用腳下的粗獷山脈，將莊園盡可能地隱藏起來，不讓山下的人看出建築的宏偉。

但當我接近這個從未有人想接近的莊園，那個無疑操弄扎古拉維亞的加百列所掌控的金錢與權力都無所遁形了。當然了，我預期的伏擊也正巧開始。

吸血鬼們一擁而上，卻一個個倒下，無數沒有意義的死亡，舖出了通往目標的道路──加百列。他知道我是來取他的命的。

Text:
Can evil ever be truly defeated? Or is it eternal, like a dark seed, always finding new ways to sprout and corrupt the world?

The soul of the elder vampire now belongs to the Solicitor, bound by the pact signed with his own unholy blood. In the end, he fell victim to his own plot. Poetic justice, maybe? Some kind of justice, to be sure.

Queen Katarina's pact was destroyed in the final fight. A difficult task lied ahead of her - rebuilding Zagoravia and dealing with the aftermath of all bad decisions in the past.

She was not the only one who has to rebuild. Even in death, Gabriel accomplished his goals, tilting the balance of powers in the world for the worse. The Family, our order of hunters, was all but vanquished. Bearing my curse, I was not the person to restore it.

I knew the right hunter for the job, but this is a different story...
New Translation:
邪惡能被徹底打敗嗎？或者它是永恆的，就像一顆黑暗的種子，總能找到新的土壤發芽，然後腐化這個世界？

這個古老吸血鬼的靈魂現在屬於誘魂者的了，被自己不淨之血所簽訂的契約束縛。最終，他淪為了自己計畫的犧牲品。是惡有惡報嗎？也算是某種報應吧。

卡特蓮娜女王的契約在決戰中被摧毀了。她面臨一項艱巨的任務──重建扎古拉維亞，設法彌補她過去的決定所帶來的後果。

她並不是唯一一個必須去重建的人。即使死了，加百列還是完成了他的目標，把世界力量的平衡向不好的方向傾斜。我們的家、獵魔組織被擊垮了。背負詛咒的我，並不是適合去恢復組織的人。

我知道適合這份工作的獵人，但這是另一個故事了……

Text:
Increase Damage - Combine a weapon with 3 Weapons of the same or better rarity.

Increase Critical Chance - Combine a weapon with 3 Destiny Cards of the same or better rarity.

Add a Property - Combine a rare or uncommon weapon with a specific combination of 3 legendary Demon Powers to add a Property the weapon does not have yet. Note: This will replace any Property added in a previous transmutation.

Improve a Property - Combine a weapon with the combination of three Demon Powers associated with the Property. The Demon Powers do not have to be legendary, but the effect will be stronger when legendary Demon Powers are used.
New Translation:
提升傷害：將1把武器與3把相同或更高稀有度的武器合成。

提升暴擊率：將1把武器與3張相同或更高稀有度的命運牌合成。

附加屬性：將1把稀有或罕見的武器與特定的3個傳奇惡魔之力合成，可給武器附加沒有的屬性。注意：這會取代任何先前合成所附加的屬性。

提升屬性：將1把武器與3個屬性相關的惡魔之力合成。惡魔之力不必是傳奇的，但使用傳奇的惡魔之力效果更強。

Text:
Transmute 3 common (white) weapons to create a new random uncommon (green) weapon.

Transmute 3 uncommon (green) weapons to create a new random uncommon (green) or rare (yellow) weapon.

Transmute 3 rare (yellow) weapons to create a new random rare (yellow) or a very small chance for a legendary (purple) weapon.

Three weapons of a given type always create a new weapon of the same type, except legendary weapons which are always of a random type. For example 3 common swords will transmute into a new uncommon sword.
New Translation:
將3把普通（白色）武器合成會得到新的隨機罕見（綠色）武器。

將3把罕見（綠色）武器合成會得到新的隨機罕見（綠色）或稀有（黃色）武器。

將3把稀有（黃色）武器合成會得到新的隨機稀有（黃色）武器，有極小機率得到傳奇（紫色）武器。

3把同種武器進行合成時，得到的新武器也會是同一種，只有傳奇武器得到的種類是隨機的。例如：3把普通長劍會合成為1把罕見長劍。

Text:
Colorization - combine an outfit with a Dye or combination of Dyes. Not all Dye combinations are possible.

Improve Armor - combine an Outfit with a legendary Demon Power.

Improve special Property - combine an Outfit with a legendary Destiny Card.
New Translation:
染色：將1件服裝與1種染料或多種染料合成。並非所有染料的組合都行得通。

提升防禦：將1件服裝與1個傳奇惡魔之力合成。

提升特殊屬性：將1件服裝與1張傳奇命運牌合成。

Text:
Improve base Property - combine a Demon Power with three Demon Powers of the same type with the same or better rarity.

Improve secondary Property - combine a Demon Power with three Demon Powers of other types with the same or better rarity.

Create a random Demon Power - combine 3 Demon Powers to create a random Demon Power of the same rarity.
New Translation:
提升基本屬性：將1個惡魔之力與3個同類且具有相同或更高稀有度的惡魔之力合成。

提升第二屬性：將1個惡魔之力與3個不同類且具有相同或更高稀有度的惡魔之力合成。

創造隨機的惡魔之力：將3個惡魔之力合成，可隨機創造1個相同稀有度的惡魔之力。

Text:
Improve Rarity - three cards of the same rarity and type produce one card of the higher rarity, if it exists. If all cards are Divine or Wicked, the resulting card will also be Divine or Wicked.

Make a card Divine or Wicked - combine a normal card with 3 Divine or 3 Wicked cards of the same or better rarity.

Improve Divine Property - combine a Divine card with 3 Divine cards.

Improve Wicked Property - combine a Wicked card with 3 Wicked cards.
New Translation:
提高稀有度：3張同類且同稀有度的牌可以生成1張更高稀有度的牌（如果有的話）。如果所有牌都是神聖牌或邪惡牌，生成的牌也會是神聖牌或邪惡牌。

製作神聖牌或邪惡牌：將1張普通牌與3張相同或更高稀有度的神聖牌或邪惡牌合成。

提升神聖屬性：將1張神聖牌與3張神聖牌合成。

提升邪惡屬性：將1張邪惡牌與3張邪惡牌合成。

Text:
Power Stones are used to directly upgrade an item. 

Each Power Stone has a description of what the upgrade will be and what item is required as a base. 

Only one Power Stone can be used per transmutation.
New Translation:
能量石是用來直接升級物品的。

每顆能量石都有描述升級的項目和需要滿足的條件。

每次合成只能使用一顆能量石。

Text: Castle Zagore is the only remaining beacon of hope in this god-forsaken city. There are survivors here - tough, grim and desperate. I wonder for how long I can use this place as my base of operations before the forces of darkness sniff the living souls hidden behind its thick walls.
New Translation: 扎古爾城是這個被上帝遺棄之地僅存的最後希望。這裡仍有些倖存者──艱苦、沮喪又絕望。在黑暗勢力嗅出高牆背後還躲著活人前，不知道我還可以將這個地方作為作戰基地多久。

Text: I released the Guards from the cruel fate of the undead and took whatever I could from the Fallen Keep. I can see the imposing silhouette of Castle Zagore, standing proud like the tallest headstone in this graveyard of a city. I think I can make out lights on the upper floors. Perhaps there are survivors behind the tall walls of the castle.
New Translation: 我把守衛從不死的殘酷命運中解放了出來，並搜括了淪陷的堡壘。從這裡能看到扎古爾城的宏偉輪廓傲然挺立，仿佛這墓園中最高聳的墓碑一樣。我依稀能看到上層有微弱的燈光，也許在那厚厚的高牆背後還有倖存者。

Text: I have persuaded GebaN, the demon broker, to grant me access to a mysterious void-world known as the Bottomless Pit. An experienced merchant's gamble no doubt. The lower I descend into this starry hell, tougher demons increase the odds that GebaN will have new stock to sell after he loots it from my dead body.
New Translation: 我已經說服了惡魔仲介商．Ｇ瘦，讓我進入名為無底洞的神祕虛空世界。毫無疑問，這一定是老奸商的一場賭博。我在這地獄中走得越深，惡魔就越強大，Ｇ瘦從我屍體上找到新貨來出售的機會就越大。

Text: The gates of the keep are shut tight. I found an alternative route through a broken sewer grate. By the looks of it, something else passed through before me. The place reeks of death and I am beginning to doubt that there are any survivors here.
New Translation: 堡壘的大門緊閉著。我找到了另一條經由破損的下水道柵欄進去的路。看樣子，有什麼東西在我之前就通過了。到處瀰漫著死亡的氣息，我開始懷疑這裡是否還有倖存者了。

Text: The pavilion was drunk in the abnormality of the supernatural. I somehow knew that I was walking into a cursed place that defied the twisted, yet familiar, ways of darkness. But I wasn't prepared to find not monsters but hunters who attacked me with ferocious savagery. Who were they, creations of the demon energies or wanderers from across the endless Void? I didn't know for certain rest for the elation of the arena itself, as if it was a creature feeding on the pain of the dying and the triumph of the victors.
New Translation: 帳篷由於超自然的力量變得畸形了。不知怎麼，我知道自己正走進一個扭曲、卻又熟悉的詛咒之地、黑暗之道。但我沒想到攻擊我的不是怪物，而是狂暴且凶殘的獵人。他們是什麼？惡魔之力的創造物？還是無盡虛空的流浪者？我不知道為什麼舞台顯得興高采烈，仿佛它是以死亡的痛苦和勝利的喜悅為食的生物一般。

Text: The descent into the depths is a harrowing experience. Every step makes me feel even more frail and mortal, as if my soul is descending into the Underworld only to be lost forever. For the first time since I laid step upon the soil of Zagoravia I feel utter fear of the future - the Howling Abyss and its secret may prove to be a bite too large even for me. I can only clench the handle of my trusted weapon and try to shake the uneasy feeling that the shrieking wails coming from beneath are calling for my death.
New Translation: 深入下層是十分痛苦的經驗。每一步都讓我感覺自己更加的虛弱與不堪，仿佛我的靈魂會永遠迷失在冥界一樣。自踏入扎古拉維亞以來，我第一次對未來感到恐懼──即使是我也可能無法承受哀嚎深淵和它的祕密。我現在只能握緊武器，盡力把腳下傳來向我索命的尖嘯和這種不安拋在腦後了。

Text: Deals damage every second (<number1> + <number2>% of the maximum health). When a cursed enemy dies, nearby enemies regain <number3>% of their health
New Translation: 每秒造成傷害（<number1> + 最大生命<number2>%）。<red></red>當一<red></red>個被詛咒的敵人死亡時，附近的敵人會恢復自身<number3>%生命。

Text: Outgoing damage is increased by <number>% for <number2> sec.
Absorbs a single attack and explodes, damaging nearby foes
New Translation: 吸收一次攻擊和爆炸，對附近敵人造成傷害。

Text: Deals damage every second (<number1> + <number2>% of the maximum health)
New Translation: 每秒造成傷害（<number1> + 最大生命<number2>%）。

Text: The target is possessed by a Puppeteer demon. It has more health, deals more damage and is quicker
New Translation: 目標被傀儡師惡魔控制。生命更高，傷害更大，速度更快。

Text: The magic movements of the dance enchant and compel
New Translation: 舞步的魔力會使敵人陶醉並隨之起舞。

Text: Stack 10 charges to unleash powerful effects from legendary weapons
New Translation: 累積10次聚能後可釋放傳奇武器強大的力量。

Text: The scythe's cursed blade rips a piece of the enemy soul with each hit, empowering the next special attack
New Translation: 巨鐮受詛咒的刀刃每一擊都會扯下<red></red>一片敵人<red></red>的靈魂，為下一發招式提供力量。

Text: Use Arcane Power stacks to recharge Tome attacks instantly
New Translation: 累積的祕能可立即冷卻法典招式。

Text: Overdrive is not gained from any sources.
New Translation: 無法以任何方式凝聚超能。

Text: Gain <number>% health every second while you are below 50% Health.
New Translation: 在生命低於50%時，每秒恢復<number>%生命。

Text: Outgoing damage is increased by <number1>% but incoming attacks deal <number2>% more damage
New Translation: 提升<number1>%輸出傷害，但也提升<number2>%所受傷害。
降低生命和傷害（休閒模式）。

Text: This unit can perform more powerful attacks.
This unit is poisoned. Healing and regeneration decreased.
New Translation: 中毒，降低治療和生命再生的效果。

Text: This unit is immune to damage, fear and daze.
You are about to activate a cheat. If you do so, no further achievements will be unlocked from this save slot.
New Translation: 你正在啟動作弊。如果繼續的話，你將無法從這個存檔解鎖任何成就。

Text: Equip a Potion or Bomb here
You already have equipped a copy of this card.
New Translation: 你已經裝備了一張同類的牌。

Text: Unique. You can't equip more than 1 copy of this card
New Translation: 獨特牌，與此同類的牌你只能裝備一張。

Text: <divine_color>Divine: Gain <condition_name> for <number> sec. when below <param>% health (<cooldown> sec. cooldown)</divine_color><condition_description>
New Translation: <divine_color>神聖：生命低於<param>%時獲得<condition_name>，<red></red>持續<number>秒<red></red>（冷卻時<red></red>間<cooldown>秒）。</divine_color><condition_description>

Text: <divine_color>Divine: <param>% chance to get an additional drop from chests</divine_color>
New Translation: <divine_color>神聖：<param>%機率從寶箱獲得額外物品。</divine_color>

Text: <divine_color>Divine: Lightning strike to ranged attackers (<damage> damage, <param>% chance) that inflicts Weakness</divine_color>
New Translation: <divine_color>神聖：雷擊遠距離的攻擊者（<damage>傷害，<param>%<red></red>機率）並造<red></red>成<red></red>力竭。</divine_color>

Text: <divine_color>Divine: <param>% chance to negate a critical hit</divine_color>
<divine_color>Divine: Gain <param> health when the overdrive is filled</divine_color>
<divine_color>Divine: Remove a negative condition on kill (<cooldown> sec. cooldown)</divine_color>
New Translation: <divine_color>神聖：擊殺時消除一項負面狀態（冷卻時間<cooldown>秒）。</divine_color>

Text: <wicked_color>Wicked: Gain <lightgreen><param>%</lightgreen> of max overdrive on overkill</wicked_color>
<wicked_color>Wicked: Gain <condition_name> for <number> sec. on overkill (<cooldown> sec. cooldown)</wicked_color><condition_description>
New Translation: <wicked_color>邪惡：絕殺時獲得<condition_name>，持續<number>秒<red></red>（冷卻時間<cooldown>秒）。</wicked_color><condition_description>

Text: <wicked_color>Wicked: Gain <condition_name> for <param> sec. on kill (<cooldown> sec. cooldown)</wicked_color><condition_description>
New Translation: <wicked_color>邪惡：擊殺時獲得<condition_name>，持續<param>秒<red></red>（冷卻時間<cooldown>秒）。</wicked_color><condition_description>
<wicked_color>邪惡：縮短<param>%負面狀態的持續時間。</wicked_color>

Text: Lowers the cooldown of consumables by <lightgreen><number>%</lightgreen>
Release an explosion when hit in melee (<lightgreen><damage></lightgreen> damage, <lightgreen><chance>%</lightgreen> chance) that ignores armor. The explosion has a chance to Electrocute foes
New Translation: 近戰擊中時引發無視防禦的爆炸（<lightgreen><damage></lightgreen>傷害，<lightgreen><chance>%</lightgreen>機率 ）。<red></red>爆炸有機率會使敵人觸電。

Text: Cause a frost explosion on crit (<lightgreen><damage></lightgreen> damage, <cooldown> sec. cooldown) that ignores armor. All targets gain the <lightgreen2><condition_name></lightgreen2> condition.<condition_description>
New Translation: 暴擊時引發無視防禦的冰霜爆炸（<lightgreen><damage></lightgreen>傷害，冷卻時間<red></red><cooldown>秒）。<red></red>所有目標附加<lightgreen2><condition_name></lightgreen2>狀態。<condition_description>

Text: Cause an explosion on overkill (<lightgreen><damage></lightgreen> damage, <cooldown> sec. cooldown) that ignores armor
New Translation: 絕殺時引發無視防禦的爆炸（<lightgreen><damage></lightgreen>傷害，冷卻時間<cooldown>秒<red></red>）。

Text: Leave a <lightgreen2><bomb_name></lightgreen2> behind when you dodge (<cooldown> sec. cooldown).<bomb_description>
New Translation: 翻滾時留下一枚<lightgreen2><bomb_name></lightgreen2>（冷卻時間<cooldown>秒）。<bomb_description>

Text: I've had it with these ______ spiders in this ______ town!
New Translation: 我受夠這些____鎮裡的____蜘蛛了！

Text:
Why did the chicken cross the road?
To explode on the other side!
New Translation:
小雞為什麼要過馬路？
為了在另一邊爆炸！

Text: A man in a movie theater notices what looks like a spider sitting next to him. "Are you a spider?" asked the man, surprised. "Yes." The spider replied. "What are you doing at the movies?" "Well, I liked the book."
New Translation: 一個男人坐在電影院裡，發現似乎有一隻蜘蛛正坐在他旁邊。「你是蜘蛛？」男人很吃驚地問道。「是的。」蜘蛛答道。「你在電影院幹嘛？」「嗯，我喜歡原著小說。」

Text:
Why did the spider cross the road?
There was no spider. There was no road. The spider is a metaphorical manifestation of your pathological and subconcious fear.
New Translation:
蜘蛛為什麼要過馬路？
其實沒有蜘蛛也沒有馬路。蜘蛛只是你病態潛意識中恐懼的隱喻表現。

Text:
Who won the skeleton beauty contest?
No body!
New Translation:
誰贏了骷髏選美大賽？
沒有人！

Text:
Why couldn't the skeleton cross the road?
He didn't have the guts!
New Translation:
為什麼骷髏無法過馬路？
因為它沒膽！

Text:
What does a vampire fear most?
Tooth decay!
New Translation:
吸血鬼最怕什麼？
蛀牙！

Text:
What do romantic vampires do?
Neck!
New Translation:
浪漫的吸血鬼最愛什麼？
脖子！

Text:
What's a vampire's favourite animal?
A giraffe!
New Translation:
吸血鬼最喜歡的動物是什麼？
長頸鹿！

Text:
How many gargoyles does it take to change a lightbulb?
None - they are always stoned!
New Translation:
換一個燈泡需要多少石像鬼？
多少都沒用，他們都是石頭！

Text: Gain <lightgreen2><condition_name></lightgreen2> for <duration> sec. when your score a crit with a <weapon> <ability1> and <ability2> attacks.<condition_description>
New Translation: 當你用<weapon>的<ability1>和<ability2>造成暴擊時，會獲得<lightgreen2><condition_name></lightgreen2>，<red></red>持續<duration>秒。<condition_description>

Text: <skill> now grants <lightgreen2><condition_name></lightgreen2> in addition to its normal effect.<condition_description>
New Translation: 除了原本效果外，<skill>現在附加<lightgreen2><condition_name></lightgreen2>狀態。<condition_description>

Text: Hammer attacks gain a <lightgreen><number>%</lightgreen> damage bonus against foes at full health
New Translation: 戰鎚的攻擊對未受傷的敵人會多<lightgreen><number>%</lightgreen>傷害。
對觸電的敵人提升<number>%傷害。

Text: -<number1>% Ball Lightning cooldown, +<number2>% Ball Lightning duration
New Translation: 縮短<number1>%電光球冷卻時間，延長<number2>%電光球持續時間。

Text: Gain <lightgreen2><condition_name></lightgreen2> for <duration> sec. when you kill an enemy with the rapier's Flurry attack.<condition_description>
New Translation: 使用細劍的疾風刺殺死敵人時會獲得<lightgreen2><condition_name></lightgreen2>，持續<duration>秒。<condition_description>

Text: Coup de Grace causes <lightgreen2><condition_name></lightgreen2> for <number> sec. on hit.<condition_description>
New Translation: 致命恩刺擊中目標時會造成<lightgreen2><condition_name></lightgreen2>，持續<number>秒。<condition_description>

Text: Gain <lightgreen2><condition_name></lightgreen2> for <duration> sec. per foe hit with a grenade.<condition_description>
New Translation: 使用榴彈每擊中一個敵人會獲得<lightgreen2><condition_name></lightgreen2>，持續<duration>秒。<condition_description>

Text: Explosive Jump causes <lightgreen2><condition_name></lightgreen2> for <number> sec. on foes.<condition_description>
New Translation: 爆炸跳對敵人會造成<lightgreen2><condition_name></lightgreen2>，持續<number>秒。<condition_description>

Text: +<number> max Soul Shards. Shockwave and Whirlwind refund 33% of the spent Soul Shards
New Translation: 增加<number>片最大靈魂碎片。衝擊波和旋風斬會回收33%消耗的<red></red>靈<red></red>魂碎片。

Text: The Scythe's Shockwave attack now deals <number>% base damage per Sould Shard spent
New Translation: 巨鐮的衝擊波現在每消耗一片靈魂碎片可造成<number>%基本傷<red></red>害。
每裝備一張神聖牌提升<lightgreen><number></lightgreen>防禦。

Text: Enemies drop health orbs on hit that restore <lightgreen><number></lightgreen> health when picked up (<number2> sec. cooldown)
New Translation: 敵人被擊中時會掉落生命寶珠，拾取後會恢復<lightgreen><number></lightgreen>生命（冷卻時間<number2>秒）。

Text: +<lightgreen><number></lightgreen> armor penetration per equipped Wicked card
New Translation: 每裝備一張邪惡牌提升<lightgreen><number></lightgreen>護甲穿透。

Text: Enemies drop orbs on hit that give Brutality when picked up
New Translation: 敵人被擊中時會掉落寶珠，拾取後會獲得殘暴狀態。

Text: Each time you pick up an Orb all cooldowns are reduced by 1 second.
New Translation: 每拾取一顆寶珠，所有冷卻時間縮短1秒。

Text: Increased pick up distance for Orbs.
Use in Transmutation to change the color of your outfit
New Translation: 用於合成可改變服裝的顏色。

Text: <lightgreen><number>%</lightgreen> chance to negate a critical hit damage

New Translation: 提升從寶箱裡找到的物品品質。

Text: Doubles the damage and increases the effects and range of bombs
New Translation: 炸彈的傷害加倍，且效果與範圍提升。

Text: +<lightgreen><number>%</lightgreen> damage for each destiny card in your hand
New Translation: 每裝備一張命運牌提升<lightgreen><number>%</lightgreen>傷害。

Text: +<lightgreen><number>%</lightgreen> critical damage for each destiny card in your hand
New Translation: 每裝備一張命運牌提升<lightgreen><number>%</lightgreen>暴擊傷害。

Text: +<lightgreen><number1>%</lightgreen> damage against enemies with health below <number2>%
Gain <lightgreen><number1>.<number2>%</lightgreen> of maximum health (<lightgreen><number3></lightgreen> health) on crit (<cooldown> sec. cooldown)
New Translation: 暴擊時恢復<lightgreen><number1>.<number2>%</lightgreen>最大生命（<lightgreen><number3></lightgreen>生命，冷卻時間<cooldown>秒）。

Text: Gain <lightgreen><number1>.<number2>%</lightgreen> of maximum health (<lightgreen><number3></lightgreen> health) on kill (<cooldown> sec. cooldown)
New Translation: 擊殺時恢復<lightgreen><number1>.<number2>%</lightgreen>最大生命（<lightgreen><number3></lightgreen>生命，冷卻時間<cooldown>秒）。

Text: Gain <lightgreen2><condition_name></lightgreen2> for <duration> sec. on kill (<cooldown> sec. cooldown).<condition_description>
New Translation: 擊殺時獲得<lightgreen2><condition_name></lightgreen2>，持續<duration>秒（冷卻時間<cooldown>秒）。<condition_description>

Text: Gain <lightgreen2><condition_name></lightgreen2> for <duration> sec. on overkill (<cooldown> sec. cooldown).<condition_description>
New Translation: 絕殺時獲得<lightgreen2><condition_name></lightgreen2>，持續<duration>秒（冷卻時間<cooldown>秒）。<condition_description>

Text: Gain <lightgreen><number>%</lightgreen> of max overdrive on overkill
Gain <lightgreen><number>%</lightgreen> of max overdrive on overkill with a melee weapon
New Translation: 使用近戰武器絕殺時凝聚<lightgreen><number>%</lightgreen>最大超能。
暴擊時震退敵人（冷卻時間<lightgreen><cooldown></lightgreen>秒）。

Text: Inflict <lightgreen2><condition_name></lightgreen2> for <duration> sec. on crit (<cooldown> sec. cooldown).<condition_description>
New Translation: 暴擊時造成<lightgreen2><condition_name></lightgreen2>，持續<duration>秒（冷卻時間<cooldown>秒）。<condition_description>

Text: Inflict <lightgreen2><condition_name></lightgreen2> on crit with a ranged weapon (<chance>% chance).<condition_description>
New Translation: 使用遠程武器暴擊時有<chance>%機率造成<lightgreen2><condition_name></lightgreen2>。<condition_description>

Text: Gain <lightgreen><number></lightgreen> health when the overdrive bar is filled
Refresh all cooldowns when the overdrive bar is filled
New Translation: 超能聚滿時重置所有冷卻時間。

Text: Gain <lightgreen2><condition_name></lightgreen2> for <duration> sec. when you fill the overdrive bar.<condition_description>
Gain <lightgreen2><condition_name></lightgreen2> for <duration> sec. when your health falls below <lightgreen><threshold>%</lightgreen> health (<cooldown> sec. cooldown).<condition_description>
New Translation: 生命低於<lightgreen><threshold>%</lightgreen>時獲得<lightgreen2><condition_name></lightgreen2>，持續<duration>秒（冷卻時間<cooldown>秒）。<condition_description>

Text: Gain <lightgreen2><condition_name></lightgreen2> for <duration> sec. when your health falls below <lightgreen><number>%</lightgreen> health (<cooldown> sec. cooldown).<condition_description>
New Translation: 生命低於<lightgreen><number>%</lightgreen>時獲得<lightgreen2><condition_name></lightgreen2>，持續<duration>秒（冷卻時間<cooldown>秒）。<condition_description>

Text: Gain <lightgreen2><condition_name></lightgreen2> for <duration> sec. when your health falls below <number>% health (<cooldown> sec. cooldown).<condition_description>
New Translation: 生命低於<number>%時獲得<lightgreen2><condition_name></lightgreen2>，持續<duration>秒（冷卻時間<cooldown>秒）。<condition_description>

Text: Gain <lightgreen2><condition_name></lightgreen2> for <duration> sec. when your health falls below <number>% health.<condition_description>

Gain <lightgreen2><condition_name></lightgreen2> for <lightgreen><duration></lightgreen> sec. when you lose more than <number>% health in a single hit (<cooldown> sec. cooldown).<condition_description>
New Translation: 受到一擊超過<number>%生命的傷害時獲得<lightgreen2><condition_name></lightgreen2>，持續<lightgreen><duration></lightgreen>秒<red></red>（冷卻<red></red>時間<cooldown>秒）。<condition_description>

Text: Remove a debuff when you overkill an enemy (<cooldown> sec. cooldown)
New Translation: 絕殺時消除一項負面狀態（冷卻時間<cooldown>秒）。

Text: Removes all curses and debuffs from the hero
New Translation: 消除身上所有詛咒和負面狀態。

Text: Lower attack cooldowns by <duration> sec. when you overkill an enemy
New Translation: 絕殺時招式冷卻時間縮短<duration>秒。

Text: Become invisible for <duration> seconds or until activating an offensive action
New Translation: 隱形<duration>秒，攻擊會解除隱形。

Text: Enemies drop gold piles when critically hit.
New Translation: 暴擊時敵人會掉落金幣。

Text: Enemies drop gold piles when critically hit.
New Translation: 暴擊時敵人會掉落金幣。

Text: Triggers a Meteor storm when your health drops below 40%. (<cooldown> sec. cooldown)
New Translation: 生命低於40%時引發隕石風暴（冷卻時間<cooldown>秒）。

Text: Random Electrocuted enemy is struck by Lightning every <cooldown> seconds.
New Translation: 每<cooldown>秒隨機使觸電的敵人受到雷擊。

Text:
<description>

<xp>% increased XP gain
find <drop>% more items
New Translation:
<description>

提升<xp>%經驗獲得量。
提升<drop>%物品掉落數。
怪物獲得<number>防禦和生命再生。

Text: Monsters hit for <damage>% more damage and cause <debuff> for <duration> sec. on crit
New Translation: 怪物的攻擊會多<damage>%傷害，暴擊時還會造成<debuff>，持續<duration>秒。
怪物的移動和攻擊速度更快。

Text: Some monsters become Champions. Tyrant Champions are not counted towards challenges
New Translation: 部分怪物會變成悍將。暴君悍將並不計入挑戰之中。

Text: Slay all monsters in the vicinity

Contains a random piece of equipment

Combine with other Gift Boxes in Transmutation to get better items
New Translation:
內含一件隨機的裝備。

與其它禮物箱合成可獲得更好的物品。

Text: Eat the whole pie or leave some for later?
New Translation: 吃掉整片派，還是留下一些待會吃？

Text: This pie smells unbelievably delicious. Would you take a bite?
New Translation: 這片派聞起來超好吃，要吃一點嗎？

Text: Congratulations! You can now equip Destiny Cards which grant various passive abilities! Each Destiny Card requires Destiny Points and a free Destiny Slot. Your slots and points will increase at certain levels.
New Translation: 恭喜！你現在可以裝備命運牌了，以獲得各種被動能力！每張命運牌都需要命運點和空的牌槽。牌槽和點數會在特定等級增加。

Text: You can now equip a second weapon of your choice. In combat you can switch freely between your first and second weapon.
New Translation: 你現在可以裝備第二欄武器了。戰鬥中你可以任意切換第一欄和第二欄武器。

Text: You can now equip a second consumable item. Potions grant healing or buffs, while bombs hit all enemies around you.
New Translation: 你現在可以裝備第二欄消耗品了。藥劑可以治癒傷勢或強化能力，炸彈可以擊中身邊所有敵人。

Text: Your overdrive maximum has increased. Overdrive allows you to activate demon powers.
New Translation: 你的最大超能提升了。超能可讓你施展惡魔之力。

Text: Hexes are special items that allow you to customize the game difficulty. Each Hex changes the gameplay in a unique way. If you seek a greater challenge, activate a Hex from your Inventory.
New Translation: 禁咒是能讓你自訂遊戲難度的特殊物品。每種禁咒都能改變遊玩的方式。如果你想尋求更大的挑戰，就從物品欄啟用禁咒。

Text: You are playing in Hard Mode. Your Hexes are always active.
New Translation: 你進行的是困難模式。禁咒會永遠啟用。

Text: You can now equip and use a second Demon Power. Demon Powers deplete your Overdrive on use. Deal damage to monsters to increase your Overdrive.
New Translation: 你現在可以裝備並使用第二欄惡魔之力了。施展惡魔之力會消耗超能。對怪物造成傷害可凝聚超能。

Text: Transmutation allows you to upgrade your items or create new items by combining what you have. You can transmute your items in the Hub. Don't forget to check out the basic transmutation recipes in the Codex.
New Translation: 合成能讓你融合已有的物品來強化或創造物品。你可以在基地進行合成。別忘了查看百科全書裡的基礎合成配方。

Text: Outfits affect the way you gain Overdrive and use Demon Powers. You can inspect the Outfits from your Inventory.
New Translation: 服裝能影響你凝聚超能和使用惡魔之力。你可以從物品欄查看服裝。

Text: You can now equip more Destiny Cards. The Destiny Points cost of all equipped cards cannot exceed your total DP.
New Translation: 你現在可以裝備更多命運牌了。所有裝備的牌所消耗的命運點不能超過你的總命運點。

Text: Congratulations! Your Health pool has increased, allowing you to endure more damage.
New Translation: 恭喜！你的最大生命提升了，可讓你承受更大傷害。

Text: You can now equip more powerful Destiny Cards. The Destiny Points cost of all equipped cards cannot exceed your total DP.
New Translation: 你現在可以裝備更強力的命運牌了。所有裝備的牌所消耗的命運點不能超過你的總命運點。

Text: <armor_icon> Armor gives a chance to deflect incoming attacks and significantly reduce their damage
New Translation: <armor_icon>防禦有機率使攻擊擊偏，並顯著降低所受傷害。

Text: <armor_penetration_icon> Armor penetration reduces the Armor of the target
New Translation: <armor_penetration_icon>護甲穿透會降低目標的防禦。

Text: <damage_icon> The amount of damage dealt on hit
<crit_chance_icon> Chance to score critical damage on hit
<crit_damage_icon> The amount of additional damage dealt on crit
Hold <Attack1> to continuously attack your target
Hold <X> to continuously attack your target
Press <Attack1> while mid-air to push back all nearby enemies
New Translation: 在空中按<Attack1>震退附近所有敵人。

Text: Press <X> while mid-air to push back all nearby enemies
New Translation: 在空中按<X>震退附近所有敵人。

Text: Press <lightgreen><MapProgress></lightgreen> to see the current map and its Challenges
Tap <RS> to see the current map and its Challenges
Use <SwitchWeapon> to switch between your equipped weapons
Use <RB> to switch between your equipped weapons
Some Demon Powers can be targeted by holding the button when casting them
New Translation: 某些惡魔之力可以在施展時按住按鈕以定位目標。

Text: You can jump or dodge to cancel your attacks
New Translation: 你可以用跳躍或翻滾來取消攻擊。

Text: All Rapiers have high Armor Penetration
The special attacks of the Sword have additional effects on crit
New Translation: 長劍的招式暴擊時會附加狀態。

Text: The Hammer's Smash special attack grants you Life Steal
New Translation: 戰鎚的粉碎擊具有生命竊取效果。

Text: Use the Hand Mortar's special Explosive Jump attack to reach higher ground
New Translation: 使用迫擊炮的爆炸跳可前往更高處。

Text: Split timing the Shotgun attacks will cause enemies to become Vulnerable
New Translation: 霰彈槍的間段攻擊可造成敵人脆化。

Text: Lightning Gun attacks jump between Electrocuted enemies
New Translation: 閃電槍的攻擊會在觸電的敵人之間傳導。

Text: Scythe attacks grant Soul Shards that increase the effect of its special attacks
New Translation: 巨鐮的攻擊會獲得靈魂碎片，可增強巨鐮招式。

Text: Split timing the Scythe basic attack will cause enemies to become Vulnerable
New Translation: 巨鐮的間段攻擊可造成敵人脆化。

Text: Overkill skeletons to prevent them from rising again
New Translation: 絕殺骷髏可防止其重生。

Text: Wraiths conjure magic circles which apply effects to heroes standing inside
New Translation: 怨靈會召喚出魔法陣，其內的玩家會被附加狀態。

Text: Gargoyles' stone form is immune to damage
New Translation: 石像鬼的石化形態對傷害免疫。

Text: Kill Champions and Bosses to gain Demon Powers
New Translation: 殺死悍將和頭目可獲得惡魔之力。

Text: Complete Map Challenges to gain additional rewards
New Translation: 完成地圖挑戰可獲得額外獎勵。

Text: The demon mask on your HUD will glow when you're close to a secret chest
New Translation: 當你接近祕密寶箱時介面上的惡魔面具會發光。

Text: You can always activate Hexes to make your game more challenging. Hexes grant additional XP and more item drops
New Translation: 你可以啟用禁咒使遊戲更具挑戰性。禁咒還會提升經驗獲得量和物品掉落數。

Text: Destiny Cards grant you passive abilities when equipped
New Translation: 裝備命運牌時可獲得被動能力。

Text: Destiny Points represent your capacity to equip Destiny Cards
New Translation: 命運點代表你能裝備命運牌的最大限度。

Text: Try to place Destiny Cards in all your Destiny Slots. Empty slots grant you nothing
New Translation: 設法將命運牌插滿牌槽。空的牌槽沒有效果。

Text: The damage of your Legendary weapons increases as you level up
New Translation: 傳奇武器的傷害會隨你的等級提升。

Text: Your Outfit changes the way you gain Overdrive
New Translation: 服裝會改變凝聚超能的方式。

Text: You need Overdrive to cast Demon Powers
New Translation: 你需要超能來施展惡魔之力。

Text: Deal damage to monsters to gain Overdrive. The more damage you do, the more Overdrive you gain
New Translation: 對怪物造成傷害可凝聚超能。傷害越高，凝聚的超能越多。

Text: In multiplayer you share challenge progress only with those in range
New Translation: 多人遊戲時，你只與範圍內的玩家共享挑戰進度。

Text: Press F1 to notify us about any issues you have encountered while playing
New Translation: 按<lightgreen>F1</lightgreen>回報你在遊戲中遇到的任何問題。

Text: Your game progress is saved automatically
Transmutation allows you to add new properties to your existing weapons
New Translation: 合成能讓你附加新屬性到已有的武器上。

Text: You can maximize the characteristics of your items using the transmutation system
New Translation: 你可以利用合成系統充分發揮你物品的特性。

Text: You can add divine and wicked properties to any destiny card through transmutation
New Translation: 你可以透過合成系統附加神聖或邪惡屬性到命運牌上。

Text: You can use transmutation to upgrade your equipment once you reach level <number>
New Translation: 當等級達到<number>級，你就可以使用合成來升級裝備。

Text: Use dyes in transmutation to change the color of your outfit
New Translation: 在合成中使用染料可改變服裝顏色。

Text: Unable to redeem treasure key. Error code: <error>
New Translation: 無法兌換密碼。錯誤代碼：<error>

Text: Invalid Treasure Key. Please make sure that you have entered the code correctly.
New Translation: 無效的密碼。請確保你輸入的密碼正確。

Text: Unable to redeem code. The Treasure Key has expired.
New Translation: 無法兌換密碼。密碼已過期。

Text: Unable to redeem code. Treasure Key use limit has been reached.
New Translation: 無法兌換密碼。密碼已達使用上限。

Text: Unable to redeem code. Your account has already redeemed this Treasure Key.
New Translation: 無法兌換密碼。你的帳號已兌換過這個密碼。

Text: Collected all other Victor Vran trophies
New Translation: 已收集所有《獵魔奇俠》獎盃

Text: Step right up! Enter the Freakshow Arena where you may resolve who is the top hunter - by a fight to the bitter end! You may now enter the Freakshow PvP Arena to duel your fellow hunters through the world map.
New Translation: 狂歡吧！進入怪胎秀競技場，在這裡，你可以證明誰才是頂尖獵人──就看誰能血戰到底！你現在可以進入怪胎秀對戰競技場，與陪你走遍世界各地的伙伴一決高下了。

Text: The way down the Bottomless Pit has now been revealed to you - a loathsome journey into an unknown void consisting of demon infested arenas. No one knows the true origin and purpose of this ethereal place. Find it on the world map.
New Translation: 無底洞的入口現在已向你開放──那裡是由群魔盤踞的競技場所構成的未知虛空，是一段令人厭惡的旅程。沒有人知道這個地方的起源和建造目的。你可以在世界地圖上找到它。

Text: Gift Boxes offer better drops and higher chances to gain legendary items
New Translation: 禮物箱有更好的寶物，還有更高的機會獲得傳奇物品。

Text: Once you set this as the active emote you can use it with <DPadUp>
New Translation: 設成常用表情時，你可以按 <DPadUp> 直接使用。

Text: Once you set this as the active emote you can use it with <DefaultEmote>
New Translation: 設成常用表情時，你可以按 <DefaultEmote> 直接使用。
Warnings:
Tag <DefaultEmote> not present in translated text
Tag <UseDefaultEmote> not present in original text

Text: Can be used by typing /dance in the chat window.
New Translation: 可以在聊天視窗下輸入/dance使用。

Text: Can be used by typing /point in the chat window.
New Translation: 可以在聊天視窗下輸入/point使用。

Text: Can be used by typing /wave in the chat window.
New Translation: 可以在聊天視窗下輸入/wave使用。

Text: Can be used by typing /sit in the chat window.
New Translation: 可以在聊天視窗下輸入/sit使用。

Text: Can be used by typing /kneel in the chat window.
New Translation: 可以在聊天視窗下輸入/kneel使用。

Text: Can be used by typing /flex in the chat window.
New Translation: 可以在聊天視窗下輸入/flex使用。

Text: Can be used by typing /beckon in the chat window.
New Translation: 可以在聊天視窗下輸入/beckon使用。

Text: Can be used by typing /bow in the chat window.
New Translation: 可以在聊天視窗下輸入/bow使用。

Text: Can be used by typing /cheer in the chat window.
New Translation: 可以在聊天視窗下輸入/cheer使用。

Text: Can be used by typing /cry in the chat window.
New Translation: 可以在聊天視窗下輸入/cry使用。

Text: Can be used by typing /laugh in the chat window.
New Translation: 可以在聊天視窗下輸入/laugh使用。

Text: Can be used by typing /no in the chat window.
New Translation: 可以在聊天視窗下輸入/no使用。

Text: Can be used by typing /salute in the chat window.
New Translation: 可以在聊天視窗下輸入/salute使用。

Text: Can be used by typing /threaten in the chat window.
New Translation: 可以在聊天視窗下輸入/threaten使用。

Text: Can be used by typing /yes in the chat window.
New Translation: 可以在聊天視窗下輸入/yes使用。

Text: Steam virtual keyboard requires Steam Big Picture Mode to be enabled. Please restart the game from Big Picture Mode in order to use the Steam virtual keyboard.
New Translation: Steam虛擬鍵盤需要Big Picture模式才能啟用。請使用Big Picture模式重啟遊戲以啟用Steam虛擬鍵盤。
武器招式冷卻時間加快<param>%。

Text: While equipped: Monsters drop <param>% more gold
New Translation: 提升<param>%敵人的金幣掉落數。

Text: Damage increased by <param>% when the overdrive meter is full
Damage increased by <param>% when health is below <number>%
Damage increased by <param>% when health is above <number>%
Damage increased by <param>%. While equipped: Minimal gold drops
New Translation: 提升<param>%傷害，極少金幣掉落。

Text: Critical hits knock back enemies (<cooldown> sec. cooldown)
New Translation: 暴擊會震退敵人（冷卻時間<cooldown>秒）。

Text: Gain <number1>.<number2>%<diff> of max health (<number3><dhealth> health) on crit (<cooldown> sec. cooldown)
New Translation: 暴擊時恢復<number1>.<number2>%<diff>最大生命（<number3><dhealth>生命，<red></red>冷卻時間<cooldown>秒）。

Text: Inflicts Daze on crit (<seconds>.<tenths><diff> sec. cooldown)
New Translation: 暴擊時造成暈眩（冷卻時間<seconds>.<tenths><diff>秒）。

Text: Attack cooldowns reduced by <seconds>.<tenths><diff> seconds on overkill  (<cooldown> sec. cooldown)
New Translation: 絕殺時招式冷卻時間縮短<seconds>.<tenths><diff>秒<red></red>（冷卻時間<cooldown>秒）。

Text: Gain <param> health on overkill (<cooldown> sec. cooldown)
New Translation: 絕殺時恢復<param>生命（冷卻時間<cooldown>秒）。

Text: <purple>Enemies drop gold piles when critically hit</purple>
<purple>Larger Daze area. Dash attack inflicts damage to all dazed enemies</purple>
New Translation: <purple>大範圍暈眩。直劈攻擊會對所有暈眩的敵人造成傷害。</purple>

Text: <purple>Smash attack creates a lake of molten fire</purple>
<purple>Crush attack creates a vortex that pulls enemies towards you</purple>
New Translation: <purple>蓄力擊會產生旋風把敵人拉向你。</purple>

Text: <purple>Attacks cause a meteor to fall down from the sky</purple>
<purple>Spawns exploding pumpkins on overkill (<cooldown>.<tenths> s cooldown)</purple>
New Translation: <purple>絕殺時產生爆裂南瓜（冷卻時間<cooldown>.<tenths>秒）。</purple>

Text: <purple>Bouncing Betty fires three grenades but fires less often</purple>
New Translation: <purple>彈跳彈會一次射出三枚榴彈，但射擊頻率降低。</purple>

Text: <purple>Fast rate of fire. Grenades inflict less damage and bounce more times</purple>
New Translation: <purple>提升射擊頻率。榴彈傷害降低但彈跳更多次。</purple>

Text: <purple>Bouncing Betty fires three exploding chickens instead of a single granade but also fires less often</purple>
New Translation: <purple>彈跳彈會一次射出三隻爆裂小雞以取代榴彈，但射擊頻率降低。</purple>

Text: <purple>Oil Spill attack (replaces Fire Lake) creates a pool of oil which causes Daze on hit and can be ignited by other mortar attacks.</purple>
New Translation: <purple>潑油彈會取代火海彈噴出一灘油，擊中時會造成暈眩，還能用炮擊點燃。</purple>

Text: <purple>Basic attack fires a powerful, slow moving projectile</purple>
New Translation: <purple>基本攻擊會射出一枚強力但緩慢的投射物。</purple>

Text: <purple>Charge attack leaves a trail of fire</purple>
<purple>Grants additional Charge use without triggering a cooldown</purple>
New Translation: <purple>獲得不需冷卻的額外衝鋒刺。</purple>

Text: <purple>The Coup De Grace attack fires a piercing projectile that pushes back foes</purple>
New Translation: <purple>致命恩刺會射出銳利的投射物震退敵人。</purple>

Text: <purple>Stacks Aether Charges on hits with the Charge attack. At 10 charges the Flurry attack grants Quickness and inflicts Frost to all foes in the area.</purple>
New Translation: <purple>衝鋒刺會累積以太聚能。10次聚能後，疾風刺會附加<red></red>快手，並對範圍內的敵人造成結霜。</purple>

Text: <purple>The fourth and final Flurry attack unleashes a burst of projectiles that strike random foes. Enemies killed by those projectiles are turned into exploding chickens.</purple>
New Translation: <purple>第四下和最後一下疾風刺會釋放大量投射物隨機攻擊敵人。被投射物殺死的敵人會變成爆裂小雞。</purple>

Text: <purple>The Whirlwind attack releases a second spinning scythe that damages foes.</purple>
New Translation: <purple>旋風斬會釋放第二波迴旋巨鐮攻擊敵人。</purple>

Text: <purple>Monsters hit with this weapon release souls. Gather souls to gain overdrive.</purple>
New Translation: <purple>使用這把武器擊中的怪物會溢出靈魂。收集靈魂可獲得超能。</purple>

Text: <purple>The Shockwave attack hits in a large circle and inflicts Frost.</purple>
New Translation: <purple>衝擊波的範圍更大並造成結霜。</purple>

Text: <purple>Triggers a Meteor storm when your health drops below 40%. Cannot trigger more than once every 60 seconds</purple>
New Translation: <purple>生命低於40%時引發隕石風暴。每60秒只能<red></red>引發一次。</purple>

Text: <purple>Dodging leaves a Lightning Trap behind (5 sec. cooldown)</purple>
New Translation: <purple>翻滾時留下一個雷電網（冷卻時間5秒）。</purple>

Text: <purple>Random Electrocuted enemy is struck by Lightning every 3 seconds</purple>
New Translation: <purple>每3秒隨機使觸電的敵人受到雷擊。</purple>

Text: <purple>The Shock attack uses a wider beam that piercese enemies and doesn't overheat. However it also doesn't chain to electrocuted enemies.</purple>
New Translation: <purple>電擊會射出更廣的電流，能穿透敵人且不會過熱。但也不會在觸電的敵人之間傳導。</purple>

Text: <purple>Basic attacks pulls targetted enemy periodically. Lightning Trap pulls enemies before the explosion.</purple>
New Translation: <purple>基本攻擊會定時拉近目標敵人。雷電網在爆炸前會把敵人拉近。</purple>

Text: <purple>Reflect projectiles by hitting them with the Hack attack</purple>
<purple>Stack Aether Charges when you deliver a critical hit. At 10 charges the Hack attack unleashes a powerful explosion that steals life from nearby enemies.</purple>
New Translation: <purple>暴擊時會累積以太聚能。10次聚能後，劍砍會釋放一股<red></red>強力爆炸，竊取附近敵人生命。</purple>

Text: <purple>Slash and Dash unleash a slow-moving projectile that pierces and weakens enemies</purple>
New Translation: <purple>橫斬和直劈會釋放一枚緩慢的投射物可貫穿並弱化敵人。</purple>

Text: <purple>Aimed Shot causes Cripple. Extra <param>% damage against crippled enemies.</purple>
New Translation: <purple>瞄準射擊會造成癱瘓。對癱瘓的敵人會多<param>%傷害。</purple>

Text: <purple>The Fire and Aimed Shot attacks pierce targets</purple>
New Translation: <purple>射擊和瞄準射擊可貫穿多個目標。</purple>

Text: <purple>Stack Aether Charges on Split Timing. At 10 charges the Fire attack unleashes a spread of fireworks.</purple>
New Translation: <purple>間段攻擊時會累積以太聚能。10次聚能後，射擊會釋放<red></red>整片煙火。</purple>

Text: <purple>Stack Aether Charges on overkill. At 10 charges the Pound attack unleashes crows in all directions that damage and pierce foes.</purple>
New Translation: <purple>絕殺時會累積以太聚能。10次聚能後，重鎚擊會向四周<red></red>釋放烏鴉攻擊並貫穿敵人。</purple>

Text: <purple>Stack Aether Charges when picking up power orbs. At 10 charges the Magic Missiles attack calls down neon cats from the heavens.</purple>
New Translation: <purple>拾取祕能寶珠時會累積以太聚能。10次聚能後，魔法飛<red></red>彈會從天堂召喚彩虹貓下凡。</purple>

Text: <purple>A zone of yellow flames appears around the caster while channeling the Magic Missile attack dealing damage to foes in the area.</purple>
New Translation: <purple>當施法者施展魔法飛彈時，四周會圍繞一圈黃色烈焰對範圍內的敵人造成傷害。</purple>

Text: <purple>Trigger an explosion every time you pick up a power orb</purple>
New Translation: <purple>每拾取一顆祕能寶珠就會引發爆炸。</purple>

Text: <purple>Magic Missiles has longer range and higher damage but they no longer pierce targets</purple>
New Translation: <purple>魔法飛彈具有較長的距離和更高的傷害，但無法貫穿目標。</purple>

Text: <purple>Dimension Wave leaves a trail of flame that damages foes</purple>
New Translation: <purple>次元波會留下一道火痕以傷害敵人。</purple>

Text: +185% Health - +460% Damage - -50% Cooldown Reduction - Faster Projectiles - Cripples

Text: +450% Health - +200% Damage - +33% Speed - -66% Attack Cooldowns - Faster Projtectiles

Text: Gain <lightgreen><value>%</lightgreen> of the damage taken as Overdrive

Select this outfit if you favor a balanced playstyle or you like to be at your strongest in dire circumstances.

The Hunter's Outfit's grants additional Overdrive when you suffer damage which allows you to use your demon powers more often in tough encounters. It offers a balanced playstyle and will serve you well in every situation.
New Translation:
如果你偏好平衡的遊戲風格或希望在危難時能保持最佳狀態，那就選擇這套服裝吧。

獵人服裝會在承受傷害時凝聚額外超能，可讓你在遭遇勁敵時更頻繁地施展惡魔之力。它提供一種平衡的遊戲風格，讓你能很好地應付各種狀況。

Text:
You gain <lightgreen><value></lightgreen> Overdrive every second, but attacks no longer grant Overdrive.

<white>This outfit forever signifies your support. Wear it proudly!</white>
New Translation:
每秒凝聚<lightgreen><value></lightgreen>超能，但攻擊不會凝聚超能。

<white>這套服裝永遠彰顯您對我們的支持。自豪地穿出去吧！</white>

Text:
This outfit offers the same stats as the Cavalier's Outfit. It is our special gift to everyone who supported us!

The Wanderer's Outfit grants Overdrive automatically over time, but your weapon attacks will not generate Overdrive. It will allow you to use Demon Powers reliably and start encounters at full Overdrive.
New Translation:
這套服裝與紳士服裝的效果相同，是我們贈與所有支持者的小禮物！

浪人服裝會隨時間自動凝聚超能，但武器攻擊將不會凝聚超能。它讓你能穩定地運用惡魔之力，而且在開始戰鬥時超能會聚滿。

Text: High Armor. Increases maximum Overdrive by <max_overdrive_add>. Overdrive doesn't diminish outside of combat but Overdrive gain is decreased by <lightgreen><value>%</lightgreen>.
New Translation: 高防禦。提升<max_overdrive_add>最大超能。超能不會在戰鬥後減少，但<red></red>降低<lightgreen><value>%</lightgreen>超能凝聚量。

Text: Increases the Destiny Slots by <destiny_slots>. Increases maximum Overdrive by <max_overdrive_add>. Increases Overdrive gain by <lightgreen><value>%</lightgreen>.
New Translation: 增加<destiny_slots>格命運牌槽。提升<max_overdrive_add>最大超能。提升<lightgreen><value>%</lightgreen>超能凝<red></red>聚<red></red>量。

Text: Critical hits grant <lightgreen><value>%</lightgreen> more Overdrive. Normal attacks no longer grant Overdrive.
New Translation: 暴擊時會凝聚<lightgreen><value>%</lightgreen>超能，但其它攻擊不會凝聚超能。

Text:
Select this outfit if you want to create a specialized build focused on precision and critical strikes.

The Vigilante's Outfit grants Overdrive only when you score critical hits against your enemies. The Armor provided by the outfit will reduce the damage of some of the attacks that you suffer.
New Translation:
如果你想創造一個專精於精準和暴擊的角色，那就選擇這套服裝吧。

警探服裝只會在對敵人造成暴擊時凝聚超能。服裝提供的防禦也會降低你所受的一些攻擊傷害。

Text: You gain <lightgreen><value></lightgreen> Overdrive every second, but attacks no longer grant Overdrive
New Translation: 每秒凝聚<lightgreen><value></lightgreen>超能，但攻擊不會凝聚超能。

Text:
Select this outfit if you favor playing a 'caster' hero.

The Cavalier's Outfit grants Overdrive automatically over time, but your weapon attacks will not generate Overdrive. It will allow you to use Demon Powers reliably and start encounters at full Overdrive.
New Translation:
如果你偏好「法師系」角色，那就選擇這套服裝吧。

紳士服裝會隨時間自動凝聚超能，但武器攻擊將不會凝聚超能。它讓你能穩定地運用惡魔之力，而且在開始戰鬥時超能會聚滿。

Text:
You gain <lightgreen><value></lightgreen> Overdrive when you use a weapon special attack, but attacks no longer grant Overdrive.

Reduces weapon cooldowns by <cooldown_reduction>%
New Translation:
使用招式時會凝聚<lightgreen><value></lightgreen>超能，但基本攻擊不會凝聚超能。

招式冷卻時間縮短<cooldown_reduction>%。

Text: Select this outfit if you don't want to lose your head.
New Translation: 如果還想保住你的頭，那就選擇這套服裝吧。

Text: Restores 100% health and refreshes the cooldowns of all attacks and Demon Powers
New Translation: 恢復100%生命並重置所有招式和惡魔之力的<red></red>冷卻時間。

Text: Unlimited use. Restores <number> health and removes one negative effect. Heals extra <number2> health if an effect is removed.
New Translation: 無限使用。恢復<number>生命並消除一項負面狀<red></red>態。如果消除<red></red>了一<red></red>項狀態再額外恢復 <number2>生<red></red>命。

Text: Gain <number> armor and immunity to daze, interrupts and push effects for <duration> sec
New Translation: 獲得<number>防禦並對暈眩、中斷和震退效果免疫<red></red><duration>秒。

Text:
Teleport next to the target dealing damage and applying the <lightgreen2><condition_name></lightgreen2> condition to it. Also, gain speed for several seconds.

Damage: <lightgreen><min_damage> - <max_damage></lightgreen>
Accelerated speed: <lightgreen2><buff_duration_s>.<buff_duration_d></lightgreen2> sec<condition_description>
New Translation:
瞬移到目標身邊造成傷害，並給目標附加<lightgreen2><condition_name></lightgreen2>狀態。同時<red></red>獲得<red></red>加速，持續數秒。

傷害：<lightgreen><min_damage>-<max_damage></lightgreen>。
加速：<lightgreen2><buff_duration_s>.<buff_duration_d></lightgreen2>秒。<condition_description>

Text:
Summon a magical shield that absorbs damage and reflects ranged attacks. The shield slowly decays over time. You don't gain Overdrive while this Demon Power is active.

Absorbed Damage: <lightgreen><points></lightgreen>
Chance to Reflect Projectiles: <lightgreen><deflect_chance>%</lightgreen>
New Translation:
召喚一個魔法盾，吸收傷害並反彈遠程攻擊。護盾會隨時間逐漸消失。此惡魔之力作用時不會凝聚超能。

吸收傷害：<lightgreen><points></lightgreen>。
反彈投射物機率：<lightgreen><deflect_chance>%</lightgreen>。

Text:
Create an aura that increases the damage dealt by all enemies and allies inside. Gain <lightgreen2><condition_name></lightgreen2> for <lightgreen><duration_s>.<duration_d></lightgreen> sec. You don't gain Overdrive while this Demon Power is active.

Duration: <lightgreen><duration_s>.<duration_d></lightgreen> sec
Allies: +<lightgreen><ally_damage>%</lightgreen> more damage
Enemies: +<lightgreen><enemy_damage>%</lightgreen> more damage<condition_description>
New Translation:
產生一圈氣場，提升範圍內所有敵人和戰友的輸出傷害。獲得<lightgreen2><condition_name></lightgreen2>，持續<lightgreen><duration_s>.<duration_d></lightgreen>秒。此惡魔之<red></red>力作用時不會凝聚超<red></red>能。

持續時間：<lightgreen><duration_s>.<duration_d></lightgreen>秒。
戰友：提升<lightgreen><ally_damage>%</lightgreen>傷害。
敵人：提升<lightgreen><enemy_damage>%</lightgreen>傷害。<condition_description>

Text:
Hurl a boomerang that deals damage to each enemy on its path.

Damage per Second: <lightgreen><min_damage> - <max_damage></lightgreen>
Boomerang Radius: <lightgreen><radius_m>.<radius_cm></lightgreen> m
New Translation:
投出一支迴旋鏢，對路徑上的所有敵人造成傷害。

每秒傷害：<lightgreen><min_damage>-<max_damage></lightgreen>。
迴旋鏢半徑：<lightgreen><radius_m>.<radius_cm></lightgreen>公尺。

Text:
Call for a number of meteors to strike an area ahead of you. Each meteor deals damage to all enemies in <radius_m>.<radius_cm> m radius.

Number of Meteors: <lightgreen><num_projectiles></lightgreen>

每顆隕石傷害：<lightgreen><min_damage>-<max_damage></lightgreen>。
隕石數量：<lightgreen><num_projectiles></lightgreen>。

Text:
Unleash 3 consecutive shockwaves that push back all enemies dealing damage and <lightgreen2>Crippling</lightgreen2> them for <buff_duration> seconds.

Damage per Shockwave: <lightgreen><min_damage> - <max_damage></lightgreen>
Shockwave Radius: <lightgreen><radius_m>.<radius_cm></lightgreen> m<condition_description>
New Translation:
釋放三道連續的衝擊波震退敵人，造成傷害並導致敵人<lightgreen2>癱<red></red>瘓</lightgreen2>，<red></red>持續<buff_duration>秒。

每道衝擊波傷害：<lightgreen><min_damage>-<max_damage></lightgreen>。

Text:

Duration: <lightgreen><duration_s>.<duration_d></lightgreen> sec

持續時間：<lightgreen><duration_s>.<duration_d></lightgreen>秒。
緩速氣泡半徑：<lightgreen><radius_m>.<radius_cm></lightgreen>公尺。

Text:

Duration: <lightgreen><duration_s>.<duration_d></lightgreen> sec

持續時間：<lightgreen><duration_s>.<duration_d></lightgreen>秒。

Text:

Text:

持續時間：<lightgreen><duration_s>.<duration_d></lightgreen>秒。
每秒恢復生命：<lightgreen><hps>%</lightgreen>。<condition_description>

Text:
Fire a number of seeking projectiles in a target direction. Hit enemies are immediately pulled towards you and <lightgreen2>Dazed</lightgreen2> for several seconds.

Daze Duration: <lightgreen><duration_s>.<duration_d></lightgreen> sec

注意：你之後可以隨時切換普通或休閒模式。

Text:
Recommended for players who are new to aRPGs or want a more relaxed gameplay experience.

 Note: You will be able to change between Casual and Normal Mode at will.

推薦給動作角色扮演遊戲的新手，或想要輕鬆遊玩的玩家。

The standard game difficulty, strongly recommended for your first game.

標準遊戲難度，第一次遊玩強烈推薦此難度。

Text:
The standard game difficulty, recommended for players that have some experience with aRPGs.

Note: You will be able to adjust the game difficulty later, by switching Hexes on and off.

標準遊戲難度，推薦給有玩過動作角色扮演遊戲的玩家。

注意：你之後可以通過啟用或停用禁咒來調整遊戲難度。

Text:
Select this option if you want to test yourself against the most challenging enemies and encounters. Selecting this mode will make all monsters stronger and activate five Hexes that raise the difficulty of the game. You will not be able to turn Hexes off while playing on Hard Mode.

Note: Playing in Hard Mode is not recommended for your first character.
New Translation:
如果你想考驗自己的能耐，對抗最具挑戰性的敵人和戰鬥的話，那就選擇這個模式吧。選擇這個模式會使所有怪物更加強大，還會
啟用5個禁咒提高遊戲難度。玩困難模式時無法停用禁咒。

注意：第一個角色不推薦玩困難模式。

Text:
Transmutation allows you to create new items and improve your existing items.

To improve an existing item put it in the top slot and combine it with up to 3 ingredients in the bottom slots.

To create a new item, combine the ingredients in the bottom slots and leave the top slot empty.

Check your Codex to see the standard recipes. Some recipes are secret and will not be shown in the Codex.
New Translation:
合成讓你能創造新物品，或強化已有物品。

若要強化已有物品，將其放入上方欄位，並在下方欄位加入最多3個原料以進行合成。

若要創造新物品，在下方欄位加入原料，並將上方欄位留空以進行合成。

在百科全書中可以查看普通配方。某些配方祕而不宣，未被收錄在百科全書內。
