（左）使用消耗品1<newline>（右）使用消耗品2

Text: Zone of Flame - Summons Aspects - Ranged

As Apocalypse fell into oblivion, I realized that I survived death itself. I fought War, Conquest, Famine and Pestilence and somehow I live past that day. But I know that I shouldn't let my hubris take over me, for I have destroyed a mere shard of the essence of Apocalypse. Priests tell of the End Day when his true form would manifest and bring the end of everything. I now have the faith that if this day ever comes, humanity would be able to fight him and win.
New Translation: 當天啟墜落到湮沒之地後，我才發現我逃過了一劫。我對抗戰爭、征服、饑荒和死亡，我都挺過來了。但我知道不能狂妄自大，因為我消滅的僅僅是天啟的一小部分。司鐸們都提及天啟降臨之日，祂的真身將會化現並摧毀一切。我現在堅信，如果這一天真的到來，我們人類會有能力戰勝祂的。

Text: Slay the aspects of Apocalypse to make him vulnerable
New Translation: 殺死天啟的化身讓祂容易受到攻擊。
天啟目前對攻擊已無防備能力。

Text: The unique sinister trait of the Ravenous Souls is that they actively seek their prey. Unlike other Wraiths they do not haunt a location or a person - instead they hunt their quarry, most usually unwary travelers, quickly devouring their life force and then rushing to find another victim.
New Translation: 餓鬼唯一的邪惡之處就是會主動地尋找獵物。不同於其它怨靈，祂們並不會死守一地或死纏一人，祂們獵食的，反倒通常是粗心的過路者，迅速吞噬他們的生命後立即尋找下一位受害者。

Text: Spectral Binders are heinous Wraiths which usurp the souls of mortals they devour. With ages passing, a Spectral Binder would accumulate a swarm of bound souls which it would use as living weapons for the subdual of its prey.
New Translation: 聚魂者是極度邪惡的怨靈，祂們會吞噬強奪而來的人類靈魂。隨著歲月流逝，聚魂者會累積到一大群的靈魂，而這些靈魂將會被當成生命武器來對付祂的獵物。

Text: Seeking Projectiles - Zone of Crippling on Death

It was a common practice among ancient sovereigns to seek a way to cheat death with the use of a dark ritual that bound their souls to conjured Wraiths. This ritual draws the attention of the Wraith towards its mortal host and usually resulted in a quick death. Then the unified essence of host and Wraith would be reborn as a Forgotten King gifted with ancient lore of arcane destruction.
New Translation: 這在古代君王中很常見，他們尋求一種欺騙死神的方法，利用一種黑暗儀式將自己的靈魂與召喚出來的怨靈綁在一起。這個儀式會引起怨靈對宿主的注意，通常會導致宿主快速死亡。然後宿主與怨靈會融為一體，成為忘卻之王，並擁有毀滅性祕術的古老知識。

Text: Reapers are Wraiths that enjoy the pain of their victims. Once they pick their quarry, they would stalk it, usually hidden inside solid objects or the ground itself, waiting for the perfect moment to fly forward with a piercing shriek. The sudden assault aims to catch the unprepared target off-guard, giving it little chance to avoid the bladed claws of the Reaper. The rest is a tale of bloody, gruesome agony as the Wraith tears its screaming victim apart.
New Translation: 收割者是以受害者的痛苦為樂的怨靈。一旦祂們鎖定獵物，就會偷偷跟蹤，平時只會藏在物體或地下等待尖嘯飛出的時機。突然襲擊是為了使目標措手不及，讓他們難以避開收割者的利爪，只留下受害者被怨靈撕碎的血腥傳說和可怕創痛。

Text: Flying Scythes - Zone of Pestilence on Death
New Translation: 飛行鐮刀、瘟疫陣（死亡時）

Text: The most ravenous of all Wraiths are called Tortured Souls, not because they suffer the anguish of mortals but because they are the epitomes of accumulated fear, pain and despair. Feeding upon the souls of its doomed victims, the Tortured Soul would eventually collect all sorts of nightmares which it lets out in agonizing wails of anguish.
New Translation: 所有怨靈中最飢渴的就是受虐魂，不只是因為祂們受過人間之苦，還因為祂們是恐懼、痛苦和絕望的化身。受虐魂以受害者的靈魂為食，最終使祂們積聚了各式各樣的噩夢，讓祂們發出令人難以忍受的痛苦悲鳴。

Text: Ranged - Seeking Arcane Blast - Armor Penetration
New Translation: 遠程、追蹤祕術衝擊、護甲穿透

Text: Beam Attack - Crippling Jump - Armor Penetration
New Translation: 光束攻擊、致癱跳、護甲穿透

Text: Charges - Spawns Minions - Lifesteal Smash - Armor Penetration
New Translation: 衝鋒、召喚爪牙、吸血粉碎擊、護甲穿透

Text: A living anomaly, the Chromatic Essence was a tough and unpredictable opponent that almost caught me off-guard. I had to summon all of my cunning and reflexes to defeat all the aspects of the ever-changing elemental vortex. The destruction of one would bring forth three others until either you or it yields.
New Translation: 一種活生生的異常之物，五彩原質是非常頑強和變化莫測的對手，幾乎讓我措手不及。我必須絞盡腦汁使出我的渾身解數，才能擊敗所有千變萬化的原質分身。一個分身被毀還會分裂成三、四個，直到你死或者它亡為止。

Text: Quite true to the violent nature of fire, this incredibly dangerous weapon of the demons spews out raging flames in an attempt to sear the flesh of its prey. Even after its destruction the smaller fragments will self-annihilate in their last resort attempt to burn you down along with them. Hunters on average agree that no distance is safe enough to tackle this opponent.
New Translation: 就跟炙熱燃燒的火一樣，這個極端危險的惡魔兇器會吐出熊熊烈火以企圖烤熟它的獵物。即使摧毀它，其碎片也會自爆意圖與敵人同歸於盡。獵人們普遍都認同對抗這種敵人在任何距離都很危險。

Text: Using the darkest and most dreaded, detested chapters of Zagoravian history as a foundation for this misery of an opponent, the Plague Essence also doubles as the Essence of Cheap Shots in Hunters' lore. The major form of this living weapon spews out swarms of vile rodents and sows the ground with moats of plague similar to the one carried by its smaller shards.
New Translation: 扎古拉維亞最黑暗可怕的一段歷史，就是這種令人痛苦的對手造成的，在獵人的經驗中，瘟疫原質也比其它幾種原質加倍難纏。這個活體兇器的主要攻擊方式是吐出大群噁心的老鼠，把跟它一樣的瘟疫散播在大地上。

Text: Essences of Lightning manifest in the form of whirling vortices of electricity which they send towards unlucky Hunters that cross their paths. When broken into smaller shards the lightning storm will intensify and cover the ground in randomly flying bolts of electricity. An unaware Hunter could easily find himself in quite the predicament should he attempt to use charged-energy weapons against these volatile enemies.
New Translation: 閃電原質會以電流漩渦的形式旋轉，電擊一切路徑上倒霉的獵人。擊碎後會裂成較小的閃電風暴碎片，隨機釋放電流覆蓋大片地面。沒有警覺的獵人會發現自己處於困境之中，試著使用帶電武器對付這種變化多端的敵人吧。

Text: The potent and foul magic that accompanied the demons from their world into our own seems to be quite capable to sow malice where there is none to be found. In this particular case - in rocks. Not quite aware, these self-propelled, magical boulders seem hell-bent on smashing anything - both at a distance and close by - that makes the mistake to cross their wandering path.
New Translation: 惡魔從他們的世界帶來的既邪惡又致命的魔法，似乎完全能將惡意散播至荒蕪之地。而岩石，就是其中一例。這些魔法巨石會不顧一切撞爛任何誤闖它們領域的人，不論何種距離。

Text: The epitome of entropy, the Essence of Ice has the sole purpose of draining the energy of the reality around itself until nothing else but a lifeless world is left in its wake. Hunters could only be grateful that its powers are not that great for its chilling touch could sap the strength of even the bravest ones.
New Translation: 無序的化身，冰凍原質的唯一目的就是不停地吸收周圍的能量，直到整個世界只剩下一片荒蕪。獵人們該慶幸的是它們的力量並不強勁，因為它們的寒冰之觸會削弱甚至是最勇敢的人的活力。

Text: This soulless and highly lethal adversary is the result of demonic magic giving form and hostile intent to magic of our own creation, then turning it against us. Destroying the arcane core of the Essence doesn't truly solve the problem as its wandering smaller shards extend their cursed grasp to their immediate reach. Magic users being spread mostly within the layer of society with a means to elite education, one learns to expect encounters with these essences in the richer districts of Zagoravia.
New Translation: 這種沒有靈魂又極度致命的對手，是我們自己創造出來的產物，以魔力賦予外形並灌輸敵意產生的，然而卻轉而攻擊我們。摧毀原質的祕術核心也無法徹底解決問題，因為它遊走的碎片反而會擴大其影響範圍。魔法師大多分布在社會上受過精英教育的階層，所以請預期在扎古拉維亞的貴族區會遇上這種原質。

Text: Chained in place by demonic tethers these Gargoyles are capable of dealing with me in a matter of seconds. Their breath comes forth in the form of dozens of cutting shards of stone-hard ice no less dangerous than a volley of musket fire.
New Translation: 這些被惡魔鎖鏈定在原地的石像鬼，具有在幾秒內把我殺死的能力。它們的吐息會夾帶無數石頭般堅硬的碎冰，跟槍林彈雨一樣危險。

Text: I could only be grateful that these Gargoyles are chained in place for the churning steam inside of their marble cavities could easily burn me alive in a matter of seconds. I curse the fact that I keep encountering these monstrosities only in the most confined spaces where I could do little to avoid their burning breath.
New Translation: 我要慶幸這些石像鬼都是被鍊在原地，否則大理石體內的沸騰蒸氣能在幾秒內瞬間把我燒死。討厭的是，這些怪物總是出現在狹窄的地方，讓我很難避開它們的炙熱吐息。
靜止、錐形攻擊、石頭形態

Text: Guarding the narrow passages in Zagoravia the Frost Sentinels are bound to their duties by demonic tethers that prevent them from chasing me. The problem is that they really don't need that - their frost breath can easily cripple my movements, keeping me where the monstrosity wants me - within its reach. On the other hand I have no intention to run away...
New Translation: 看守著扎古拉維亞的狹窄通道，這些冰霜哨兵被惡魔鎖鏈束縛以執行任務，因此它們無法追擊我。但問題是，其實它們也不需要，它們的冰霜吐息能輕易地限制我的移動能力，讓我逃不出它們的手掌心。但另一方面，我也沒打算逃走……

Text: Death has many faces in the cursed city of Zagoravia, but I really loathe when it manifests in the visage of the Dark Knight. A demon engine of destruction this mighty Gargoyle is driven only by its malicious desire to pulp my dead body to a bloody stain on the ground with its powerful charge and devastating shockwave attacks.
New Translation: 被詛咒的扎古拉維亞到處充斥著死亡危機，但說到我最討厭的莫過於黑暗騎士。這種專搞破壞的石像鬼只被惡意的慾望驅動著，唯一渴望的就是用強力衝鋒和毀滅性的衝擊波將我轟成肉醬，化成地上的一灘血水。

Text: A true menace, the Frostfall combines the unnatural resilience of a marble-built Gargoyle with the unbound power of a raging blizzard. I have to rely on my strong hand and quick reflexes to exploit the short moments when it stops bombarding me with icy shards to find a weak spot in its formidable form.
New Translation: 真正麻煩的傢伙，霜落同時具備大理石製成的石像鬼的韌性，以及釋放暴風雪的力量。我必須依靠我強壯的雙手和快速的反應力，趁它停止使用冰雹炮轟我的短暫瞬間，找出它驚人身軀下的弱點。

Text: The Lesser Gargoyles are the living proof that this city wants me dead. I was almost caught off-guard when an apparently inanimate statue rose to its feet and flew on its stony wings to carve my flesh with its beak.
New Translation: 小型石像鬼是這座城市想要我死的活生生證據。當一座看似無生命的雕像突然抬起雙腳，並拍動翅膀飛過來用尖嘴攻擊我的那一刻，我真是差點措手不及。

Text: Grotesque seem to be imbued with a bit more of demon power than the lesser Gargoyles. These monsters are capable of emitting a wave of demonic energy from a distance which could prove quite dangerous should I find myself cornered. I've found out that the reverberating energies held inside of their stony bodies make them a tad more fragile than the rest of their accursed kin.
New Translation: 怪誕魔似乎比一般的石像鬼擁有更強大的惡魔之力。這些怪物能夠從遠距離釋放惡魔能量波，把我逼至絕境，相當危險。不過我也發現這股在它們體內迴盪的能量，卻也導致它們比一般的石像鬼更加脆弱。

Text: Only a fool would think that defeating Vail the Immortal could banish a creature of such power forever. The world has not seen a true Lich for thousands of years and I should deem myself extremely lucky that I survived this encounter. Truly I have destroyed his phylactery here, in Zagoravia, but the legends tell that Liches used to have hundreds of phylacteries scattered across the world inside long-forgotten places of power. Vail would make no difference - sooner or later he will command his undead minions to drag the new phylactery back to his Mausoleum and he will continue to haunt this cursed land.
New Translation: 只有傻子才相信擊敗了不朽者．汎爾就代表永遠消滅了如此強大的怪物。這個世界已經數千年沒見過巫妖了，我真是走運竟然能遇到，還能活下來。雖然我摧毀了祂在扎古拉維亞的命匣，但是傳說中巫妖通常擁有數百個命匣，散布在世界各處被遺忘的力量之地。汎爾當然也不例外──祂早晚會叫自己的不死爪牙拖個新的命匣到陵墓，好讓祂繼續在這個詛咒之地興風作浪。

Text: Slay the Lich and follow his soul to the Phylactery
New Translation: 殺死巫妖並跟蹤祂的魂魄以找到命匣。

Text: Follow the Soul of the Lich to find his Phylactery
New Translation: 跟蹤巫妖的魂魄以找到祂的命匣。

Text: Kill the Lich one last time to defeat him forever
New Translation: 最後一次殺死巫妖以永久消滅祂。

Text: Seeking Projectiles Cause Frailty - Vampiric Totems

It is said that the first vampires have somehow conjured the vampirism curse in their greed for power and immortality. It was part of his grand plan to trick Katarina into dooming her own people and to create an elaborate trap for hunters, who are the only ones who could harm him. He played dirty tricks with the minds of everybody in the city, goading them to their own deaths. In the end, Gabriel fell victim to his own plot, his immortal essence now belonging to the demon called the Solicitor. It might sound strange, but I am grateful of this lesson of power and fate.
New Translation: 傳說中，吸血鬼真祖為了追求永生和力量，以某種方式創造出了吸血鬼詛咒。他計畫的一部分就是欺騙卡特蓮娜使她害死自己的子民，並且佈下複雜的陷阱來對付唯一有能力傷害他的獵人們。他玩弄整座城市的人，讓他們一步步邁向死亡。最終，加百列自食惡果，他不朽的靈髓落到了一個被稱為誘魂者的惡魔手上。聽起來或許有點奇怪，但我還是很開心上了這權力與命運的一課。

Text: Immobile - High Crit - High Penetration - Exploding Pumpkins - Darkness
New Translation: 靜止、高暴擊、高穿透、爆裂南瓜、黑暗
惡魔之力、惡魔種子、瞬移

Text: The worst demons are those who speak. The Solicitor is one of those entities that you could only pray to never encounter. A being of ancient power, he is the one who oversees the fulfilment of demonic contracts signed by various foolish mortals. He has a symbiotic connection to the binding force of those contracts - while he protects them, he can also channel the power they provide. This allows him to call upon them in time of need, making him a resourceful and crafty opponent.
New Translation: 最棘手的惡魔就是會說話的那種。誘魂者就是你祈禱一輩子都不想遇上的存在。遠古力量的化身，牠監管著所有愚蠢凡人所簽訂的惡魔契約的履行。牠以那些契約的約束力與簽約者產生共生關係──雖然牠會保護他們，但也能利用他們提供的力量。這讓牠在需要的時候能夠召喚他們，使牠成為機智和狡猾的對手。

Text: Undead Berserkers are mortals who suffered greatly, before giving up their lives and host the spark of rage and denial. Undead Berserkers swing between their will to die and the curse that binds them to sow destruction upon the world. When it comes to fulfilling their purpose, they are desperately trying to resist the urge to kill, resulting in a crazed whirlwind of bones and weapons.
New Translation: 不死狂戰士生前是受過極大痛苦的凡人，懷著滿腔怒火和不願接受的心情放棄生命。它們總是在尋死和束縛它們去毀滅世界的詛咒之間搖擺不定。每當它們要完成目標的時候，它們又會拼命地抗拒衝動的殺意，其結果就導致瘋狂的迴旋攻擊。

Text: Not like anything I've ever seen, the Undead Fools are a mockery of life and the Hunters' attempt to save the city. They must be the creation of a dark, distorted entity that enjoys playing with his victims like a cat would play with mice.
New Translation: 從來沒見過這種傢伙，不死小丑是對生命和想拯救城市的獵人的一種嘲諷。它們肯定是黑暗又扭曲的變態，喜愛玩弄獵物，猶如貓捉老鼠。

Text: Curses - Cures Negative Conditions when Defeated
New Translation: 詛咒、消除負面狀態（擊敗時）

Text: Zagoravia must be under the influence of extremely powerful curse for I find no other explanation for the presence of Pyromancers. The ancient scripts claim that these Undead host the souls of only the most evil-minded mortals who were drawn out of the hellfire of the Underworld. Still bearing the mark of their sins, they are wreathed in a halo of flames that torments them incessantly.
New Translation: 扎古拉維亞肯定是受到非常強大的詛咒，否則無法解釋這些操火者的存在。根據古書記載，這些不死生物寄宿著最惡毒人類的靈魂，全都取自於地獄的業火。它們無時無刻背負著罪惡的烙印，被火焰環繞受著無盡的折磨。

Text: Slaves to the curse that sustains them, those lowly skeletons are the most deprived of them all. Fully aware of their cruel fate but unable to break free, they are driven to a silent madness. I can only end their suffering with a well-placed blow.
New Translation: 被詛咒奴役著，這些低等骷髏被剝奪了它們的一切。它們很清楚自己悲慘的命運卻無力擺脫，被無聲的瘋狂驅使著。我唯一能終結它們痛苦的辦法就是一擊讓它們安息。

Text: I have only heard legends about Undead that are able to control and animate others of their kind. Probably the Gravediggers are the answer to the large hordes of Undead that fill the streets of Zagoravia. So far I haven't found any proof of them possessing the intelligence and free will required to summon and control a horde of that size, yet they remain the harbingers of trouble. Luckily, slaying the Gravedigger makes its minions perish with it.
New Translation: 我聽說過不死生物有能力控制和驅使其它同類的傳說。或許掘墓者就是造成扎古拉維亞滿街都是不死生物的罪魁禍首。至少目前我沒發現它們擁有足夠智慧和自主意識能夠驅使那麼大量的不死生物，但還是留下了不少麻煩。幸運的是，殺死掘墓者會讓它的爪牙和它一起滅亡。

Text: Those Zagoravian soldiers died with guns in their hands and this is how the binding curse found them. Their creator and lord must be a master of the art of necromancy, as it takes more than I have ever witnessed to fuse a soldier with his gun and produce anything other than withered corpse.
New Translation: 這些扎古拉維亞的士兵死的時候手裡還拿著火槍，這也是詛咒找上它們的原因。創造它們的人肯定是精通死靈術的大師，因為我從沒見過除了召喚乾枯的死屍外，還能召喚出持槍的士兵。

Text: Undead abominations of immense size, the Undead Brutes are some of the toughest opponents a Hunter could encounter. The curse of undeath influenced these unfortunate souls the most, twisting and distorting their forms, until their bodies only resemble hulking humanoids. If I ever underestimate their brutish strength and long reach, I would quickly join their shambling march.
New Translation: 體積最龐大的不死生物，不死壯漢是獵人能遇到的最強壯對手之一。不死的詛咒造成這些不幸的大量靈魂，糾結、扭曲了外表，使它們的身體像似笨重的人形。如果低估它們的蠻力和攻擊範圍，那很快就會加入它們的行列了。

Text: Probably the most solid testament to the notion that demons may find inspiration in weapons designed by human hand, these over-bloated arachnids serve as incredibly flexible mobile artilleries. Defenseless once you end up close to them, they will give you and everything around you chemical hell from a distance to make sure you don't. I found out that I can goad the wrath of the Bombardier Spider to make it vanquish its allies.
New Translation: 惡魔會從人類設計的武器中找到靈感，這些作為移動大炮的臃腫蜘蛛也許就是最好的證明。牠們一旦被靠近就毫無反抗之力，所以牠們會從遠處把你周圍變成生化地獄，確保你無法靠近。但我發現我可以激怒投彈蜘蛛，讓牠們誤殺自己的同伴。
致癱彈幕、潛伏上方、遠程

Text: Now that the corpse of Rachnoss, the Host lies before me I begin to wander what kind of wicked pact was broken to allow such a monstrosity to pass the wall between worlds? Rachnoss possessed power, awareness and cunning beyond the capabilities of any demon I have faced so far. I can feel the mark his icy essence imprinted inside my very soul.
New Translation: 看著倒在我面前的宿主．拉諾斯的屍體，我不禁好奇到底是什麼樣的邪惡契約被破壞，讓如此怪物能穿梭兩個世界的屏障？拉諾斯擁有的力量、警覺、以及狡詐遠遠勝過我對抗過的所有惡魔。我甚至能感覺到牠的冷冽氣息印在我的靈魂深處。

Text: Destroy a support column to bring Rachnoss to the ground.
New Translation: 摧毀石柱讓拉諾斯墜落地面。

Text: Destroy to bring Rachnoss to the ground
New Translation: 摧毀以讓拉諾斯墜落地面

Text: Mordra, the Broodmother is an intelligent demon that prefers to send her spider progeny to do her bidding instead of risking it herself. This strategy allowed her to preserve all of her strength for the moment when she would be cornered in her deep lair. She plans to undermine the walls of Castle Zagore and spew her countless progeny into the belly of the ancient corridors to seek the destruction of the few survivors there. I wonder for how long I would be able to keep her at bay.
New Translation: 蛛后．莫卓是非常聰明的惡魔，只會命令她的蜘蛛兒女們做事，而不親身犯險。這種戰略讓她在老巢被逼急時能保留實力。她計劃破壞扎古爾城的城牆根基，並在古老走廊的腹地送入無數的蜘蛛兵，以剷除當地僅存的倖存者。我不知道我還能抵擋她多久。

Text: Far from being thorough in their design, demonic spiders' existences are usually violent and short. That is why, in order to better serve their creators, some remain in their eggs until the need for them arises.
New Translation: 牠們的構造並不完美，惡魔蜘蛛的壽命通常急劇短暫。這也是為什麼有些蜘蛛留在卵裡沒有孵化，以便在需要時為主人效力。

Text: There is no shortage of debate and speculation over what happens when demonic spiders are given the chance to feed for an extended period of time. Some say they have short lifespans meant for quick gains, others are certain they are created with evolving in mind. Whether a new breed or not, nothing changes the reality that these incredibly heavy and powerful spiders are a menace to be reckoned with.
New Translation: 當惡魔蜘蛛有機會長期進食時會有什麼變化，一直是個爭論不休，猜測不斷的議題。有的人說牠們的生命短暫所以會快速長大，有的人則認為牠們是為進化而創造的。無論是不是新物種，都不會改變這些重量級的大蜘蛛是個不好對付的敵人的事實。

Text: Always at the forefront of demonic advances, demon spiders are obviously tasked with being the cannon fodder in this war between worlds. This particular breed excels at the role in a most unique manner. Whether the result of intelligent design or that of mixing random unknown chemicals, it's hard to deny how effective these explosive buggers are. I noticed that their explosion slays friend and foe alike and I intend on using this in my favor.
New Translation: 永遠是惡魔進軍的前線戰力，惡魔蜘蛛的任務顯然是這場世界之戰的炮灰部隊。這一特殊品種更是善於執行這種獨特任務。無論是精心設計的成果還是不經意的產物，無可否認這種自爆蜘蛛是非常管用的。我也發現牠們的自爆是敵友不分的，我打算利用這一點取得優勢。

Text: Shards of demon power oozed through the walls of the world, these diminutive spiders are little more than chomping mandibles that crave the taste of living flesh and the opportunity to grow and sustain themselves in this reality.
New Translation: 穿過世界屏障的惡魔能量碎片形成了這些小蜘蛛，牠們比寄生在皮膚上渴望鮮肉美味的蹣蟲還要細小。

Text: Demon spiders are the stuff of chaos. Bags of bio-chemicals crafted into many-legged horrors, relying on their numbers quite more so than their individual capacity to spread dread into the mortal realm. However, even chaos can give birth to perfection every now and then, and these large, incredibly agile and armored mega-arachnids are indeed the perfect apex predator that no natural environment can spawn.
New Translation: 惡魔蜘蛛是混沌的產物。大量的生化之物造就了多足怪物，牠們依靠數量，而不是個體能力將恐懼蔓延到凡人之地。然而在混沌不時的強化下，這些擁有超凡敏捷和裝甲的巨型蜘蛛，無疑是自然生態無法產生的頂端掠食者。

Text: It is no wonder that the inborn horror and nightmare-fueling hatred humans harbor for spiders has leaked its way to the world of demons. They, on the other hand, readily oblige said fears and raise nature with a sort of ultra-arachnids the size of dogs. A feeble adversary for the experienced hunter, spider hatchlings can still take out an unwary traveler when in greater numbers.
New Translation: 毫不奇怪，人類先天對來自魔界的蜘蛛就懷有引發恐懼和噩夢的憎恨。另一方面，他們對這種長得跟狗一樣大的蜘蛛更容易喚起恐懼的天性。蜘蛛幼雛雖然不是經驗豐富的獵人的對手，不過以蛛海戰術還是能圍死粗心的過路者。

Text: Death is nothing short of a gift for this accursed creation, condemned to ever spawn soulless monstrosities, which then regard it as a god and devour their way through the realm of man with heightened fury.
New Translation: 死亡對這種可恨的生物是最好的禮物，牠的罪行是不斷產下沒有靈魂的怪物，其孩子們都視牠為神，並憤怒地朝人類世界一路吞噬而來。

Text: Growing like tumors in the midst of a demon infestation, the Nests spread their progeny across the cursed lands of Zagoravia. Scriptures claim that demon Nests could spew out spiders in an uncontrollable stream of flesh until the end of the world. I have found the hard way that the only way to put an end to that is to slay the nest.
New Translation: 在惡魔肆虐期間長出的腫瘤狀之物，巢穴會將蜘蛛散布到整個被詛咒的扎古拉維亞。根據記載，巢穴會不停地生出蜘蛛，直到淹沒整個世界。我經過教訓才發現：唯一消滅牠們的方法，就是先除掉巢穴。

Text: An elite version of the lesser Frostcrawler, this type of creeping, crawling blasphemy is both tougher and faster and its chilling spit projectile can freeze you in your tracks.
New Translation: 冰霜爬蛛的精英版本，這種變態的爬行生物不但更強壯、更敏捷，吐出的冰彈還能把你凍結。

Text: Oozing a liquid substance not known to any alchemist of this world, these peculiar spiders have evolved to tackle opponents at a distance. The sticky blue chemical sucks the warmth out of anything it hits, causing frostbite and hypothermia.
New Translation: 嘴裡分泌著這個世界未曾見過的液體，這些古怪的蜘蛛已經進化成遠距離攻擊對手的怪物。任何被不明藍色黏液擊中的目標都會被吸走溫度，造成凍傷和失溫。

Text: Unlike their lesser kin, the Thrall Hulks are tough killing machines. They lie in ambush or simply reveal themselves to their chosen prey and throw themselves into battle in cold blood, trying to corner and maul their target. But after a couple of well-placed blows they are thrown in a dark rage and charge with wild abandon, trying to claw their torturer to pieces.
New Translation: 跟矮小的同類不同，死徒巨人是粗暴的殺人機器。它們會伏擊鎖定的獵物，以殘忍的方式進行攻擊，試圖困逼並重創目標。一旦受到幾次的猛烈反擊，它們會發狂咆哮陷入狂暴，試圖撕碎對方。

Text: Like bloodhounds the Thralls strike from the shadows at their unsuspecting prey. Designed especially to master the hit and run tactics they would hastily retreat to the embrace of darkness should they find their prey to be a bite too large for their fangs.
New Translation: 像獵犬一樣，死徒喜歡從黑暗中偷襲毫無戒心的獵物。它們尤其擅長打游擊，一旦發現獵物太強就會匆忙地退回黑暗之中。

Text: Acolytes are destructive spellcasters with inhuman resilience and the ability to move unseen through the shadows. Relying purely on their supernatural strength and mastery of the arcane they always employ the same tactics, seeking me with beams of unholy energy. Facing one acolyte is a challenge, but two or more of them spell mortal danger, for their interlocking beams could burn me to cinders in the matter of mere seconds.
New Translation: 侍祭是有著異常恢復力和透過影子隱身行動的毀滅施法者。依賴自身的超自然力量以及對祕術的精通，他們總是採用同樣的招數，使用邪惡能量的光束向我攻擊。對付一個侍祭是挑戰，但同時對付兩個以上是自殺，因為他們接連不斷的光束能在幾秒內就把我燒成灰燼。

Text: I curse the moment you stepped on the cursed streets of Zagoravia, Adrian, dear friend. I always knew that ours is a dangerous craft, but I couldn't imagine that I would have to face and best the perverted mockery of your past self in the form of a Vampiric abomination. I know that you never betrayed my secret or the reasons why you summoned me to this cursed place - and I swear that you will be avenged, my friend.
New Translation: 艾德里安，我的老友啊，我詛咒你踏入扎古拉維亞的那一刻。我知道我們這是非常危險的職業，但我萬萬沒想到我會有這麼一天，必須面對並擊敗變成吸血鬼的你。我知道你沒有洩露我的祕密，不然你就不會召喚我來這鬼地方了──我發誓，我會為你報仇的，老友。

Text: Lurkers carefully plot the way they would engage me. My intuition tells me that they watch me carefully as I carve my path through the streets of the city. Only when they think I have dropped my guard, they strike from the shadows - swiftly and silently. A single well-placed blow from a lurker can easily incapacitate me. Whenever I manage to avoid their treacherous attacks they send out arcane projectiles to seek me while they prepare for their next assault.
New Translation: 潛伏者會精心策劃攻擊我的方式。我的直覺告訴我，當我經過城鎮的街道時，他們都會很小心地監視著我。只要認為我放鬆戒心，就會從黑暗中偷襲我──迅速且無聲無息。潛伏者的一次偷襲能輕易地將我了結。每當我成功避開他們奸詐的攻擊時，他們就會施放祕術彈追擊我，同時會為下一次偷襲作好準備。

Text: Truly sadistic fiends, the Counts like to play cat and mouse with their prey. The ease with which they rip the life-force out makes me wonder if it is their pervert whim to toss it around instead of absorbing it directly. It could be just my imagination, but I feel their sinister excitement while I run around, trying to collect the blood orbs.
New Translation: 貨真價實的虐待狂，這些伯爵們喜歡玩弄獵物。他們能夠輕易地吸取獵物的生命，卻沒有直接這麼做，讓我懷疑他們是不是一時興起在玩什麼遊戲。或許是我的錯覺，但每當我東奔西跑收集那些生命寶珠時，都能感受到他們變態的快感。

Text: There are little differences between mortal and vampire noblemen, both preferring to send others to do their dirty work. The Vampire King is always trying to goad me with a barrage of arcane bolts while stirring his kindred after me.
New Translation: 人類貴族和吸血鬼貴族其實沒有太大的分別，都愛派小弟當跑腿。吸血鬼君主總是愛用祕術彈幕讓我四處逃竄，同時煽動小弟們追殺我。
遠程、隱形、強化其他吸血鬼

Text: Most vampires tend to avoid being close to me as if the proximity of my blade makes them feel mortal again. The Knights are a nasty exception - tough, methodical killers with little tolerance for games. Their brutish swords can cut a man in two with a single swipe. Maintain a safe distance is always thricky as they use both invisibility and arcane grasping claws to catch me flat-footed.
New Translation: 大多數吸血鬼都會傾向於避免靠近我，因為我的利刃能讓他們再次感受凡人的滋味。但騎士們是個例外──頑強有序，不耍花招。他們的巨劍能夠一刀將人斬成兩半。想與他們保持安全距離都很棘手，因為他們會利用隱形和鈎爪祕術將我拖住。
範圍攻擊、爆裂護盾、隱形

Text: The Hammer is a slow but powerful melee weapon. It deals high damage and can easily overkill many foes
New Translation: 戰鎚是一種非常緩慢但威力強大的近戰武器。它能造成極高傷害，輕易絕殺眾多敵人。

Text: Use the Smash attack to gain the Life Steal buff and steal life whenever you deal damage. Then power up the Crush attack to deal high damage and steal more life
New Translation: 使用粉碎擊來獲得生命竊取，在造成傷害的同時竊取生命。接著使出蓄力擊，可造成極高傷害並竊取更多生命。

Text: A set of area attacks that deal collateral damage. The third attack deals higher damage and knocks enemies back.
New Translation: 一連串可造成間接傷害的範圍攻擊。第三下可造成更高傷害並震退敵人。

Text:
Deals high damage and applies the <lightgreen2><condition></lightgreen2> condition in an area. Hold the button to increase the damage dealt by the attack. Gains Armor Penetration when fully channeled.

<lightgreen2><condition></lightgreen2>: <description>
New Translation:
造成極高傷害，並在範圍內施放<lightgreen2><condition></lightgreen2>狀 態。 按 住 按 鍵 可 提 升 攻 擊 造 成 的 傷 害。 完 全 蓄 力 後 可 獲 得 護 甲 穿 透 效 果。

<lightgreen2><condition></lightgreen2>：<description>

Text:
Jump to an enemy and deal damage around your target. Applies the <lightgreen2><condition></lightgreen2> buff.

<lightgreen2><condition></lightgreen2>: <description>
New Translation:
跳向敵人並造成範圍傷害。施放<lightgreen2><condition></lightgreen2>。

<lightgreen2><condition></lightgreen2>：<description>

Text: The Hand Mortar is a slow but powerful ranged weapon. It shoots bouncing, exploding grenades
New Translation: 迫擊炮是一種非常緩慢但威力強大的遠程武器。它能射出會彈跳的爆炸榴彈。

Text: Combine the Explosive Jump attack with Fire Lake to push back your enemies delivering high damage and slowing down their advances
New Translation: 結合爆炸跳和火海彈可震退敵人，造成極高傷害並使他們寸步難行。

Text: Fires a grenade that bounces off the ground and deals AoE damage. Holding down the attack button increases the lenght of the intial trajectory.
New Translation: 射出一枚可在地面彈跳的榴彈並造成範圍傷 害。按住攻擊鍵可增長初始彈道射程。

Text:
Fires a grenade that creates an area of liquid fire that damages enemies inside it. Lasts <number1> sec and has a radius of <number2>m. Units caught in the initial blast get the <lightgreen2><condition></lightgreen2> condition.

<lightgreen2><condition></lightgreen2>: <description>
New Translation:
射出一枚可產生一灘液態火焰的榴彈，對範圍內的敵人造成傷害。持續時間<number1>秒，半徑範圍<number2>公尺。 受到初始爆炸衝擊的敵人會造成<lightgreen2><condition></lightgreen2>。

<lightgreen2><condition></lightgreen2>：<description>

Text:
Fire a grenade at your feet. The resulting explosion will send you flying up. Pushback and damage enemies at launch and on the landing. Units caught in the blast get the <lightgreen2><condition></lightgreen2> condition.

<lightgreen2><condition></lightgreen2>: <description>
New Translation:
往腳下射出一枚榴彈，其爆炸的衝擊能將你炸入空中。升空和落地時能震退並傷害敵人。受到爆炸衝擊的敵人會造成<lightgreen2><condition></lightgreen2>。

<lightgreen2><condition></lightgreen2>：<description>

Text:
Fires 3 chickens in a line in front of you. Chickens explode dealing AoE damage and push enemies back from the epicenter of the explosion.
Recharge <number> ms.
New Translation:
朝前方射出一排三隻小雞。小雞會爆炸造成範圍傷害，並以爆炸中心將敵人震退。
填彈時間<number>毫秒。

Text:
Fires a big grenade that doesn't bounce but deals large AoE damage and pushes back enemies from the epicenter of the explosion. Holding down the attack button increases the length of the initial trajectory.
Recharge <number> sec.
New Translation:
射出一枚大型榴彈，雖然不會彈跳，但會造成大範圍傷害，並以爆炸中心將敵人震退。按住攻擊鍵可增長初始彈道射程。
填彈時間<number>秒。

Text: Fires 3 bouncing grenades that deal AoE damage. Holding down the attack button increases the length of the initial trajectory
New Translation: 射出三枚可造成範圍傷害的榴彈。按住攻擊鍵可增長初始彈道射程。

Text:
Fires a grenade that creates a pool of oil that that Cripples enemies inside it and can be ignited by other mortar attacks. The area lasts for <number1> sec. Units caught in the initial blast are affected by <lightgreen2><condition></lightgreen2>.

<lightgreen2><condition></lightgreen2>: <description>
New Translation:
射出一枚可產生一灘汽油的榴彈，汽油可使範圍內的敵人癱瘓，也可被其它炮擊點燃。汽油持續時間<number1>秒。 受 到 初 始 爆 炸 衝 擊 的 敵 人 會 造 成 <lightgreen2><condition></lightgreen2> 。

<lightgreen2><condition></lightgreen2>：<description>

Text: The Lightning Gun is a multi-target ranged weapon. Its attacks channel between Electrocuted enemies
New Translation: 閃電槍是一種多目標的遠程武器。它的攻擊能在觸電的敵人之間傳導。

Text: Combine the Ball Lightning attack with Shock to Electrocute your enemies again and attract the Ball Lightning back to them. You can keep up to three active Ball Lightnings at the same time
New Translation: 結合電光球和電擊不僅可使敵人再次觸電，還可將電光球吸引回他們身上。電光球最多只能同時存在三顆。

Text:
Single target. Hold the attack button to continue attacking. Enemies hit by this attack become <lightgreen2><condition></lightgreen2>. The attack chains to other <lightgreen2><condition></lightgreen2> enemies. In its last phase the attack deals additional damage.

<lightgreen2><condition></lightgreen2>: <description>
New Translation:
單一目標。按住攻擊鍵以持續進行電擊。受到電擊的敵人會造成<lightgreen2><condition></lightgreen2>。 電擊會傳導給其他<lightgreen2><condition></lightgreen2>的 敵 人。 電 擊 的 最 後 階 段 會 造 成 更 大 傷 害。

<lightgreen2><condition></lightgreen2>：<description>

Text: Fire a tracking ball lighting that bounces between <lightgreen2><condition></lightgreen2> targets. This attack can hit you and your allies.
New Translation: 射出一顆會追蹤的電光球，這 顆 球 會 在<lightgreen2><condition></lightgreen2>的 目 標 之 間 來 回 反 彈。 此 招 也 會 對 自 己 和 隊 友 造 成 傷 害。

Text:
Fire a slow ball lightning that transforms into a Lighting Trap in several seconds. The Lightning Trap deals damage and inflicts <lightgreen2><condition></lightgreen2> to all enemies in its radius every <number>.<number2> seconds, then explodes. Hold the button to increase the ball's initial speed. The explosion can hit you.

<lightgreen2><condition></lightgreen2>: <description>
New Translation:
射出一顆慢速電光球並在幾秒後變成雷電網。 雷 電 網 每<number>.<number2>秒會對範圍內 的 所 有 敵 人 造 成 傷 害 並 使 其<lightgreen2><condition></lightgreen2>， 最 後 還 會 爆 炸。 按 住 按 鍵 可 提 升 電 光 球 的 初 始 速 度。 爆 炸 也 會 對 自 己 造 成 傷 害。

<lightgreen2><condition></lightgreen2>：<description>

Text:
Single target. Hold the attack button to create a beautiful rainbow that damages everyone that it passes through. Enemies hit by this attack become <lightgreen2><condition></lightgreen2>.

<lightgreen2><condition></lightgreen2>: <description>
New Translation:
單一目標。按住攻擊鍵以產生一道美麗的彩虹，對其穿透的所有敵人造成傷害。受到攻擊的敵人會造成<lightgreen2><condition></lightgreen2>。

<lightgreen2><condition></lightgreen2>：<description>

Text:
Single target. Hold the attack button to continue attacking and periodically pull the targeted enemy towards you. Enemies hit by this attack become <lightgreen2><condition></lightgreen2>. The attack chains to other <lightgreen2><condition></lightgreen2> enemies. In its last phase the attack deals additional damage.

<lightgreen2><condition></lightgreen2>: <description>
New Translation:
單一目標。按住攻擊鍵以持續進行電擊並把目標敵人拉近。受到電擊的敵人會造成<lightgreen2><condition></lightgreen2>。 電 擊 會 傳 導 給 其 他<lightgreen2><condition></lightgreen2>的 敵 人。 電 擊 的 最 後 階 段 會 造 成 更 大 傷 害。

<lightgreen2><condition></lightgreen2>：<description>

Text:
Fire a slow ball lightning that explodes shortly after fired pulling all nearby enemies to its epicenter. All targets in its blast area get damage and become <lightgreen2><condition></lightgreen2>. Hold the button to increase its initial speed. This attack can hit you.

<lightgreen2><condition></lightgreen2>: <description>
New Translation:
射出一顆短時間內會爆炸，並將附近所有敵人拉至爆炸中心的電光球。所有在爆炸範圍內的目標都會受到傷害並造成<lightgreen2><condition></lightgreen2>。 按 住 按 鈕 可 提 升 其 初 始 速 度。 此 招 也 會 對 自 己 造 成 傷 害。

<lightgreen2><condition></lightgreen2>：<description>

Text: The Rapier is a fast melee weapon effective against armored enemies. Its attacks have additional effects on kill

Text: Those who are unaware of the true nature of demons could easily mistake the giant spiders infesting Zagoravia for beasts of the twisted wilderness. These spiders are nothing more but the material form chosen for the demons unleashed by the curse that holds sway over Zagoravia. While the forms in which they manifest in our world are often chosen arbitrarily, they always share the same traits - wicked cruelty and unquenchable hunger of mortal souls.
New Translation: 不了解惡魔本質的人很容易誤以為侵襲扎古拉維亞的巨型蜘蛛是變種的野生動物。這些蜘蛛只不過是被選來作為惡魔的介質，是由支配扎古拉維亞的詛咒所釋放出來的。雖然牠們在我們世界顯化的方式不盡相同，但牠們總是擁有相同的特徵──殘忍邪惡，強烈渴望人類的靈魂。

Text: The ordinary folk wrongly deem the Wraiths for being the ghosts of the departed. These spectral apparitions are shards of living essence that wander seamlessly between the worlds in the same fashion as parasites in a search of a host. Should a Wraith find a place of power or a mortal soul to haunt, it would anchor itself towards it until it devours its life force. Should the sinister activities of the Wraith be disturbed it would unleash all sorts of arcane mayhem upon its opponent, among which are areas of spectral taint that sap the strength of mortals.
New Translation: 一般人都錯誤的認為怨靈只是亡者的鬼魂。其實這些鬼魅幻影是在世間徘徊的生命精華碎片，以同樣的方式不斷尋找宿主的寄生蟲。如果怨靈鎖定了力量之地或人類靈魂，祂們就會一直糾纏不休，直到將其生命之力完全吞噬。萬一怨靈的奸險行動受到了妨礙，祂們就會施展各種祕法攻擊對手，尤其是以鬼魅污穢之陣削弱人類的力量。

Text: The only fate worse than death is to become an Undead - a creature bound in the grey fringe between two worlds by dark magic. Anyone without a vast knowledge of the supernatural could only be blessed with the lack of awareness that Undead are no animated puppets or mere constructs of bone bound by their vile masters; the twisted frame of each one of them is sustained into unlife by the imprisonment of the soul of the deceased person. I fail to imagine the tortures upon which the imprisoned soul is condemned. A well-placed blow can destroy their bony case and release the soul for good.
New Translation: 比死亡還悲慘的命運就是變成不死生物，一種被黑魔法束縛於生死之間的怪物。沒有超自然知識的人們只能慶幸他們的無知：不死生物並不是會動的傀儡也不單單是被卑鄙主人束縛的骨架，每一個扭曲的骨架中都是被囚禁的亡者靈魂。我無法想像這些被囚禁的靈魂究竟遭受了怎樣的折磨。徹底粉碎它們的骨身才能永遠釋放其內的靈魂。

Text: Legends tell of a distant past when the mighty Elemental Forces roamed unbound and in their constant struggle shaped the forms of the world as we see it today. The Essences I found in Zagoravia are nothing more than fragments of these forces, enslaved by the demon forces and used as self-aware weapons that manifest to sow destruction upon the world they once created. But the core of elemental force is not even the final form of the Essence - after destroying them they would break apart in lesser shards which would continue to follow their unrelenting path of destruction.
New Translation: 傳說在遙遠的過去，浩瀚的元素之力隨處漫遊，而在它們不斷地努力下，形成了現今我們所見的世界。我在扎古拉維亞發現的原質只不過是那些力量的碎片，現被惡魔之力控制，作為有意識的武器，在這個它們曾經所創造的世界散播毀滅。但元素之力的核心甚至並非原質的最終形態──在破壞之後，它們會分裂成更小的碎片，持續不斷地散播毀滅。

Text: The fleeting madness of the curse has taken another wicked form - the stone statues scattered across the city had descended upon the denizens to make sure no one stays alive. Carved from massive stone and imbued with demonic energy, the Gargoyles hold tireless guard on any mortal activity on the streets. Their stone forms make them almost impossible to destroy and allows them to quickly seize the initiative in battle.
New Translation: 詛咒的瞬間失控產生了另一種邪惡形態──這些散布在城市各處的石頭雕像突然襲擊居民們，企圖趕盡殺絕。這些石像鬼是由巨大石塊雕刻而成，並被灌注惡魔能量，它們永不疲倦，持續監視街道上人類的一舉一動。它們的石頭形態堅不可摧，也因此讓它們在戰場上能快速取得先機。

Text: The Thralls are mindless slaves of the mysterious vampires. I could only guess what is their role in the dark fate of Zagoravia but now that I have encountered their servants I know that my every step is being watched. I have to be very careful if I want to avoid the fate of Adrian.
New Translation: 死徒是神祕吸血鬼所控制的無思維奴隸。我無法猜到吸血鬼和扎古拉維亞的黑暗命運有著什麼樣的關聯，但如今遇到了他們的奴僕們，我知道自己的一舉一動都在監視之下。如果不想重蹈艾德里安的覆轍，我就必須非常小心。

Text: Vampires are not spawned in any of the demon worlds. Their evil originates here, in our own ancient history. The very fact that I have been confronted by vampires means that a deeper plot is involved here. If I survive Zagoravia my experience could become a valuable weapon for mankind in the clandestine war against the forces of the supernatural.
New Translation: 吸血鬼並不是誕生於魔界。他們的邪惡就源自於此，於我們古老的歷史中。我一直遭遇吸血鬼，這一事實就說明有更深的陰謀牽涉其中。如果我能度過扎古拉維亞的劫難，我的經驗可以成為人類與超自然力量暗中對抗的有力武器。

Text: A sign-out from PSN has occurred. You have been disconnected from your multiplayer game.
New Translation: 已從PSN登出。你的多人遊戲連線已被中斷。

Text: A sign-out from PSN has occurred. You will not be able to use any of the multiplayer features of the game until you sign in again.
New Translation: 已從PSN登出。在重新登入之前你將不能使用任何多人遊戲功能。

Text: The controller was disconnected. Please reconnect it in order to continue.
New Translation: 手把失去連接，請重新連接手把以繼續遊戲。

Text: The chat has been disabled due to parental control.
New Translation: 由於家長監護的限制，你的聊天功能已被禁用。

Text: You are suspended for this round. Wait until next round starts.
New Translation: 你被停賽這一輪。請等待下一輪的開始。

Text: You are suspended for this round. Wait until next round starts.
New Translation: 你被停賽這一輪。請等待下一輪的開始。

Text: You are suspended for this round. Wait until next round starts.
New Translation: 你被停賽這一輪。請等待下一輪的開始。

Text: Gabriel is protected by an indestructible diamond shield. Find and destroy the 3 Aether Traps to bring the shield down.
New Translation:
加百列現在被堅不可摧的鑽石護盾保護著。
找到並摧毀3個以太聚能器以破壞護盾。

Text: Return to the arena and defeat Gabriel!
New Translation: 返回中央廣場擊敗加百列！

Text: Slay the Aether Guardians to make the Aether Trap vulnerable
New Translation: 殺死以太守護者讓以太聚能器失去防備能力。

Text: This is a multiplayer free-for-all PvP Arena. Invite friends to fight!
New Translation: 這是一個多人大亂鬥的對戰競技場。邀請好友來一決高下吧！

Text: Destroy the Phylactery to prevent the Lich from reviving
New Translation: 摧毀命匣以阻止巫妖復活

Text: Defeat the Right and the Left Arm of the Pumpking
New Translation: 擊敗南瓜王的右手和左手

Text: Defeat the Hunter of Wishes and the Reapers of Dreams
Defeat Blad the Inhaler and the Puppeteers
New Translation: 擊敗吸血者．巴雷德和傀儡師

Text: The Pumpking is dead! Long live...err?
The Long Arms of the Pumpking
We are One, I am Many
We are One, I am Many
We are One, I am Many
We are One, I am Many
We are One, I am Many
We are One, I am Many
We are One, I am Many
We are One, I am Many
We are One, I am Many
We are One, I am Many
We are One, I am Many
We are One, I am Many
We are One, I am Many
We are One, I am Many
We are One, I am Many
We are One, I am Many
We are One, I am Many
We are One, I am Many
We are One, I am Many
We are One, I am Many
We are One, I am Many
We are One, I am Many
We are One, I am Many
We are One, I am Many
We are One, I am Many
We are One, I am Many
We are One, I am Many
We are One, I am Many
We are One, I am Many
We are One, I am Many
We are One, I am Many
We are One, I am Many
...and the Choir of the Singing Dead

New Translation: 石像鬼與蜘蛛之母．艾薇奈德……

Text: ...and the Old Portal in the Mud
Point and press <Attack1> to move to that point
New Translation: 指向某點並按 <Attack1> 移動到該處。

Text: Press or Hold <Attack1> to attack in the direction of the mouse pointer
New Translation: 按或按住 <Attack1> 向游標方向進行攻擊。

Text: Click on a monster with <Attack1> to approach it and attack. Hold <ForceAttack> to attack at your current position
New Translation: 使用 <Attack1> 點擊怪物以接近並進行攻擊。按住 <ForceAttack> 可在原地進行攻擊。

Text: Hold <CameraRotate_Mouse> and move the mouse to rotate the camera
New Translation: 按住 <CameraRotate_Mouse> 並移動滑鼠以旋轉鏡頭。

Text: Hold <CameraRotate_Mouse> and move the mouse to rotate the camera
New Translation: 按住 <CameraRotate_Mouse> 並移動滑鼠以旋轉鏡頭。

Text: Press <MapProgress> or click on the <color 119 230 30>Maps & Challenges</color> button in the menu to view a map of the area
New Translation: 按 <MapProgress> 或點擊選單中的<color 119 230 30>地圖與挑戰</color>以查看區域地圖。

Text: Press <MapProgress> or click on the <color 119 230 30>Maps & Challenges</color> button in the menu to view a map of the area
New Translation: 按 <MapProgress> 或點擊選單中的<color 119 230 30>地圖與挑戰</color>以查看區域地圖。

Text: Press <RS>  or use the <color 119 230 30>Maps & Challenges</color> option in the menu to view a map of the area
New Translation: 按 <RS> 或使用選單中的<color 119 230 30>地圖與挑戰</color>以查看區域地圖。

Text: Press <Jump> and jump down to the street
Use <JumpCursor> and jump down to the street
Press <A> and jump down to the street
Checkpoint Activated. If you die you will be returned to this point.
New Translation: 紀錄點已啟動。如果你死了將會回到這裡。

Text: Press <Dodge> while moving or <color 119 230 30>double tap</color> a direction key to dodge and avoid attacks
New Translation: 在移動時按 <Dodge> 或<color 119 230 30>雙擊</color>方向鍵以翻滾來閃避攻擊。

Text: Use <Dodge_CameraForward> to dodge forward (camera relative). Use <Dodge_CameraBackward> to dodge back (camera relative). Use <Dodge_CursorForward> to dodge to pointer.
New Translation: 使用 <Dodge_CameraForward> 向前翻滾（相對於鏡頭）。使用 <Dodge_CameraBackward> 向後翻滾（相對於鏡頭）。使用 <Dodge_CursorForward> 向游標方向翻滾。

Text: Use <LB> + <LS> to dodge and avoid attacks
New Translation: 使用 <LB> + <LS> 以翻滾來閃避攻擊。

Text: Press <JumpCursor> to jump towards the mouse pointer
New Translation: 按 <JumpCursor> 向游標方向跳躍。

Text: <color 119 230 30>Jump</color>, then press <Jump> again when close to a wall to do a wall jump and climb up
New Translation: 靠近牆壁跳起，再按 <Jump> 以使出蹬牆跳來翻越高牆。

Text: <color 119 230 30>Jump</color>, then press <JumpCursor> again when close to a wall to do a wall jump and climb up
New Translation: 靠近牆壁跳起，再按 <JumpCursor> 以使出蹬牆跳來翻越高牆。

Text: Jump, then press <A> again when close to a wall to do a wall jump and climb up
New Translation: 靠近牆壁跳起，再按 <A> 以使出蹬牆跳來翻越高牆。

Text: Attack the dummies using your weapon's special attacks (<Attack2> and <Attack3>). Each weapon has a basic attack and two powerful special attacks with short cooldowns
New Translation: 使用武器的招式（<Attack2> 和 <Attack3>）攻擊假人。<red></red>每種武器都有一個基本攻擊和兩個強力但需要短暫冷卻的招式。

Text: Attack the dummies using your weapon's special attacks (<Y> or <B>). Each weapon has a basic attack and two powerful special attacks with short cooldowns
New Translation: 使用武器的招式（<Y> 和 <B>）攻擊假人。<red></red>每種武器都有一個基本攻擊和兩個強力但需要短暫冷卻的招式。

Text: Looks like you took some damage. Press <UseConsumable1> to use a healing potion
New Translation: 你似乎受了點傷。按 <UseConsumable1> 使用治療藥水。

Text: Looks like you took some damage. Press <DPadLeft> to use a healing potion
New Translation: 你似乎受了點傷。按 <DPadLeft> 使用治療藥水。

Text: Press <InventoryPC> to open your inventory and equip your new shotgun
New Translation: 按 <InventoryPC> 打開物品欄並裝備新的霰彈槍。

Text: Press <Back> to open your inventory and equip your new shotgun
New Translation: 按 <Back> 打開物品欄並裝備新的霰彈槍。

Text: Test your new shotgun and its special attacks on the dummies
New Translation: 用假人測試你的霰彈槍和招式。

Text: The yellow bar next to your health bar is called Overdrive. Attack the dummies to build up Overdrive!
New Translation: 生命右邊的那條黃色就是超能。攻擊假人來凝聚超能吧！

Text: Press <UseRune1> to activate a Demon Power. You can hold <UseRune1> to aim the demon power
New Translation: 按 <UseRune1> 施展惡魔之力。按住 <UseRune1> 可以進行瞄準。

Text: Press <LT> to activate a Demon Power. You can hold <LT> to aim the demon power
New Translation: 按 <LT> 施展惡魔之力。按住 <LT> 可以進行瞄準。

Text: Zagoravia, the Fallen City. The land of no return.
New Translation: 淪陷之城，扎古拉維亞。一個不歸之地。

Text: Where darkness won and we demon hunters lost.
New Translation: 在那裡，黑暗猖獗，獵魔人衰敗。

Text: One year ago, a plea for help summoned hunters to Zagoravia.
New Translation: 一年多前，一條求救訊息把獵人們號召到了扎古拉維亞。

Text: I couldn't answer, I was trapped in the Tower of Dreams.
New Translation: 當時我被困在夢境之塔，我無法回應。

Text: Many answered the call, no one returned.
New Translation: 許多人回應了號召，卻都有去無回。

Text: I thought Adrian dead until a raven delivered his message.
New Translation: 我以為艾德里安死了，直到烏鴉送來了他的信。

Text: He too summoned me to Zagoravia. He saw what I seek.
New Translation: 信裡他要我到扎古拉維亞。他說發現了我所追尋之物。

Text: Adrian is a friend. One of the precious few I have.
New Translation: 艾德里安是我的同伴，我極少的知心好友之一。

Text: And the only man who knows of my past.
New Translation: 也是唯一瞭解我過去的人。

Text: Of the pact I made, and the demon powers I wield.
New Translation: 知道我曾簽下契約，擁有惡魔之力。
無論這座詛咒之城有什麼鬼怪，

Text: I will face to find my friend.
New Translation: 我都會對抗，並找到我的朋友的。

Text: Not a human soul in sight.

New Translation: 怪物們占據了大街小巷。

Text: Dim lights shine through the dusty windows.
New Translation: 布滿灰塵的窗戶透出著黯淡的微光。

Text: I wonder what horrors hide behind them.
New Translation: 不知道牠們背後隱藏著什麼樣的恐怖。

Text: I sense something hidden, something far more sinister than the monsters.
New Translation: 我能感覺到，某種遠比怪物更險惡的東西。

Text: Something faint. Like a whisper in the back of my mind.
New Translation: 幽幽地，像是我腦海中的耳語。

Text: A voice in my head? What else?
New Translation: 哪來的聲音？腦裡發出來的？

Text: If you can hear me jump now!
New Translation: 要是能聽到的話，就跳一下吧！

Text: Come on! Jump, jump, jump, jump...
Good boy! Now roll-over... Heh, just kidding!
New Translation: 乖孩子！接下來翻個滾吧……哈，開玩笑的啦！

Text: You're wondering how to get past that keep?
New Translation: 你想知道怎麼通過那座堡壘嗎？

Text: <sarcastic>I'm sure that NOBODY put a giant, easy to get through sewer grate on the left side of the keep. That would be preposterous!
New Translation: <sarcastic>我保證絕不會有人把又大，又可以輕易穿過的下水道柵欄設在堡壘的左邊。那實在太可笑了！

Text: Look, hunter, a treasure chest! Up there on the balcony.
New Translation: 看哪，獵人，有個寶箱耶！上去陽台吧。

Text: Come on, go get it. You can use the exercise.
New Translation: 快啊，快去開啊。你可以練習練習。

Text: I love these boxes. You never know what you're going to get. So exciting!
New Translation: 我超愛這些寶箱的。你永遠不知道會拿到什麼。超興奮的！

Text: You know there are more of these lovely chests lying around. Can you find them?
New Translation: 你知道附近有很多迷人的寶箱了吧。你能全找出來嗎？

Text: Ooh! Watch out, hunter. Those dummies look tough.
New Translation: 哦！小心啊，獵人。那些假人看起來挺棘手的。

Text: They outnumber you. You should consider retreating.<laughter>
New Translation: 它們人數比你多。你應該考慮撤退囉。<laughter>

Text: Look at those dummies with their red eyes and long noses.
New Translation: 你看那些紅眼睛、長鼻子的假人。

Text: They are laughing at you feeble attacks!<laughter>
New Translation: 它們正在笑你的攻擊軟趴趴的！<laughter>

Text: Wait, are you still fighting the dummies?
New Translation: 等等，你還沒搞定那些假人啊？

Text: Come on! Put your back in to it. Hit harder.
New Translation: 加油！再加把勁啊。打用力點。

Text: Maybe I should stop wasting my time on you, hunter, and make friends with the dummies instead!
New Translation: 也許我不該在你身上浪費時間的，獵人，你乾脆和那些假人做朋友吧！

Text: <surprised>Ooh! A demon power! <impressed>Where did you learn to do that?
New Translation: <surprised>哦！惡魔之力！<impressed>你是從哪學來的？

Text: <unsecure><cough>Anyway... Come, meet me in the next room!
New Translation: <unsecure><cough>不管了……來吧，我們下個房間見！

Text: I’m trapped in that box. Come on, break it!
New Translation: 我被困在那個箱子裡了。快幫我打破它！

Text: Wait. That's not me. Oh well I must be in another dungeon.<laughter>
New Translation: 等等，那個不是我。哦，好吧，我一定是在別的地方。<laughter>
我感覺附近有閃亮亮的玩意！

Text: Let me give you a hint. It's bigger than a spider, but it is also full of treasure and it is sitting on top looking down at you.
New Translation: 給你點提示吧。那玩意比蜘蛛還大，但滿滿都是寶物，而且正坐在高處俯看著你呢。

Text: Yes you found it, good boy! What did you get? Something shiny?
New Translation: 好耶，你找到了，乖孩子！你拿到了什麼？閃亮亮的玩意嗎？

Text: Seriously, you give up on the treasure?
New Translation: 不是吧？你不要寶物了嗎？

Text: Good! I knew your greed would get the better of you.
New Translation: 很好！我就知道你會被貪婪牽著走。

Text: There is something about that voice. Something I can't quite place.
New Translation: 那個聲音我有印象，但想不起來。

Text: I've fought and slain many monsters in my line of work.
New Translation: 我做獵人以來殺過的怪物不計其數。

Text: The ones that talk are  <emphasis>always the worst.
New Translation: 會說話的傢伙，<emphasis>永遠是最棘手的。

Text: <surprised>There are survivors after all this time!
New Translation: <surprised>過了那麼久竟然還有生還者！

Text: Castle Zagore still stands – a refuge from the horrors outside.
New Translation: 扎古爾城仍聳立著，這座把恐怖隔絕於外的庇護所。

Text:
Welcome to Zagoravia, hunter! Thank you for answering our summons and bringing your sword to our cause.

Soon we will push back the enemy. If you hurry you will be rewarded.
New Translation:
歡迎來到扎古拉維亞，獵人！感謝你回應了號召，與我們一起並肩作戰。

我們馬上就要反攻了。如果你動作夠快，你就能獲得獎勵。

Text: Your Majesty, I would gladly see you to safety.
New Translation: 女王陛下，很高興看到您平安無事。

Text: It is not safety that we want. We are going to win this war and free my kingdom from the demons.
New Translation: 這不是我想要的平安。我們要打贏這場戰爭，從惡魔手中解放我的王國。

Text: No further help is coming, Your Majesty. What brought me here is the fate of a fellow hunter by the name of Adrian.
New Translation: 不會再有援助了，女王陛下。我是為了一個獵人伙伴的生死而來，他名叫艾德里安。

Text: You may believe no help is coming and have given up but we stand strong. <pause> But if it is your friend you seek you must go south - to the Royal Gardens.
New Translation: 你也許認為不會再有援助而放棄了，但我們絕不退縮。<pause>如果你找的人是你朋友的話，那你必須往南走──去皇家花園。

Text: The Queen is strong willed. It must be how she got this far.
New Translation: 女王的意志堅強，一路支撐她到現在。

Text: But it changes nothing. The city is overrun.
New Translation: 但這改變不了什麼。城市已經淪陷了。

Text: I'm Damian the Alchemist. I can help you with useful supplies, like potions and bombs, and you can help me with your gold, he-he-he. We Alchemists are said to transmute gold into air, but it is all for the benefits of science! Take a look through my inventory, there’s not much demand from hunters these days.
New Translation: 我是鍊金術師．戴米恩。我可以提供你一些有用的補給，像是藥劑、炸彈，而你可以提供一些金錢給我，呵呵呵。人們都說我們鍊金術師會把金子變空氣，但這可都是為了科學啊！來看看我的貨吧，這些日子已經沒多少獵人來了。

Text: <sarcastic>Great! Another hunter comes to save the day! Maybe we stand a chance against the countless hordes now! Or maybe you'll die like all the others.
New Translation: <sarcastic>太好了！又一個獵人來扭轉敗局了！或許我們有機會打敗無數大軍了！也或許你只是另一個來送死的。

Text: My name is Victor Vran and I didn't expect this kind of warm welcome in Zagoravia. I am looking for a friend. I won't stay a minute longer after I find him.
New Translation: 我叫維克多．弗蘭，沒想到會在扎古拉維亞受到如此熱烈的歡迎。其實我正在找一位朋友。找到他之後，我馬上就會離開的。

Text:
Listen, Vran. I don't care. Just one rule - don't promise the impossible to Her Majesty.

Every day I endeavor to convince her to give up hope of saving this city. With you around, she will become even more determined to stay and die in this cursed castle. If this happens, I'll hold you personally responsible, you hear me?
New Translation:
聽著，弗蘭，你要做什麼我不管。只有一個原則──別對女王陛下許下無法實現的承諾。

每天我都竭盡所能地說服她放棄拯救這座城市的希望。現在有你在，她肯定會更加堅定與這座詛咒之城共存亡的決心。要是發生這種事，我唯你是問，聽清楚了嗎？

Text: I'm back! Did you miss me?
Now that I think about it we weren't properly introduced.
New Translation: 對了，我們還沒互相介紹呢。

Text: You can call me Voice. I'm currently without a body, so this seems to fit.
New Translation: 你可以叫我謎之聲。我目前沒有身體，所以滿貼切的。

Text: Now what should I call you?
John... Nah you don't look like a John. Victor... well that's just stupid. Genady... No that doesn't suit you either...
New Translation: 約翰……不好，你看起來不像。維克多……呃，蠢斃了。根納迪……不，也不太適合……

Text: I know! I'll call you Vicky. Yes, that seems to fit perfectly.<laughter>
New Translation: 有了！就叫你維琪吧。好耶，太適合了。<laughter>

Text: Look, Vicky, a maze. That looks fun, let's go there.
New Translation: 看哪，維琪，有迷宮耶。好像挺有趣的，走吧。

Text: Now, can you find your way out?<laughter>
Vicky, this is such a fun place full of ancient things, terrible things, things that go KABOOM!<laughter>
New Translation: 維琪，這裡可是充滿樂趣的地方，裡面有一堆古老、可怕，還有會爆炸的傢伙喔！<laughter>

Text: Too bad that you can't go inside. Perhaps when you are a little bit taller.
New Translation: 可惜你不能進去。也許要等你再長大一點。

Text: Riddle me this, Vicky! What has large fangs, acid breath and 4000 legs?
New Translation: 猜一猜，維琪！什麼東西有長長的尖牙、酸酸的吐息、還有4000條腿呢？

Text: Go inside and you'll find out!<laughter>
Oh, I sense something young and delicious up ahead.
New Translation: 哦，我感覺到前方有鮮美的嫩妹。

Text: Don’t be jealous, Vicky! I’ll be back.<laughter>
New Translation: 別吃醋嘛，維琪！我馬上回來。<laughter>

Text: The smell hits you right away.
Not the stale dry smell of a tomb.
No this is another all too familiar smell.
New Translation: 是的，這是再熟悉不過的氣味了。

Text: Another dead body. Could that be Adrian?
New Translation: 又一具死屍。會是艾德里安嗎？

Text: One of ours has fallen here, but it isn’t Adrian.
New Translation: 我們的一位兄弟在此陣亡了，但並不是艾德里安。

Text: I will cleanse this tomb so you can rest in peace, brother.
New Translation: 我會清理這座墓窖以讓你安息的，兄弟。

Text: The death of a hunter is like the death of a brother or sister.
New Translation: 獵人的死如同自己兄弟姊妹的死。

Text: We mourn and raise a toast to celebrate the deeds and lives of those we lose.
New Translation: 我們為失去的兄弟們哀悼，為他們的英勇行為乾杯。

Text: Thank the Gods, you came to save me! I was on patrol with some of the hunters to carry their provisions and trophies. We were attacked and I made a tactical retreat.
Section: Act1 03-11 Meeting Private Stash in Royal Gardens Crypt
New Translation: 感謝上帝，謝謝您來救我！我原本和一些獵人在巡邏，替他們搬運糧食和戰利品。後來我們被襲擊了，我就戰略性撤退了。

Text: You just ran and left the hunters to die?
Section: Act1 03-11 Meeting Private Stash in Royal Gardens Crypt
New Translation: 你丟下他們獨自逃跑了？

Text: Well, you see, I’m a coward and that has kept me alive in this hell. I was sure that someone would come along to rescue me. So, the coast is clear? Can I get back home?
Section: Act1 03-11 Meeting Private Stash in Royal Gardens Crypt
New Translation: 唔，如您所見，我、我是個懦夫，我也因此才在這地獄中活了下來。我、我一直確信會有人來救我的。所以，沒有危險了嗎？我能回家了嗎？

Text: Even a coward's life will feed the evil brewing here. I’ve cleared the way to the castle. You can go.
Section: Act1 03-11 Meeting Private Stash in Royal Gardens Crypt
New Translation: 即使是懦夫的生命也會使邪惡壯大。我已經掃清了通往城堡的路。回去吧。

Text: Oh, thank you, thank you, thank you! I promise I’ll find a way to repay you.
Section: Act1 03-11 Meeting Private Stash in Royal Gardens Crypt
New Translation: 哦！非常、非常感謝您！我會想辦法報答您的。

Text: You know, I used to be a hunter like you until I took an arrow to the knee!
New Translation: 你知道嗎，我以前和你一樣是個獵人，直到我膝蓋中了一箭！

Text: I'm way too witty to be a hunter.
New Translation: 我這麼幽默，怎麼會是獵人呢。
等等！<sniffing>我嗅到有東西隱藏著。是寶藏！

Text: Come on, Vicky! Go get it!
What did you get, what did you get?
New Translation: 你拿到了什麼？你拿到了什麼！？

Text: I sense it nearby - a treasure chest filled with shiny, shiny loot!
New Translation: 我感覺到它就在附近，一個裝滿閃亮亮寶物的寶箱！

Text: Come on, search! I know you want it!
New Translation: 快，認真找！我知道你很想要的！

Text: Ooh, who's that glowing, blue fellow?
New Translation: 哦，那個發光的藍色傢伙是誰？

Text: The day is done, and the darkness
Falls from the wings of night,
As a feather is wafted downward
From an eagle in his flight.
Wait! Don't go! Was it something I said?
New Translation: 等等！別走！我說錯了什麼嗎？

Text: And here I thought I was the last living hunter in this damned city.
New Translation: 我還以為自己是這座詛咒之城唯一存活的獵人。

Text: Victor Vran. Just arrived. Don't plan on staying long.
New Translation: 我是維克多．弗蘭。剛到這裡。但沒打算久待。

Text: That's what I said when I arrived a year ago. Yet here I am, still killing demons and trying to make sense of what happened.
New Translation: 我一年前剛來的時候也是這麼說。但至今我依然在此獵殺惡魔，試圖弄清到底發生了什麼。

Text: Do you know a hunter by the name of Adrian?
New Translation: 妳認識一位叫艾德里安的獵人嗎？

Text: I've heard of him but we never crossed paths. The only hunters I've seen recently lie lifeless.
New Translation: 聽說過，但我們沒有碰過面。我最近見過的獵人只有倒在地上的。

Text: You could check the crypts. I haven't been down there for a while, but I wouldn't get my hopes up – there are demons everywhere.
New Translation: 你可以去墓窖找看看。我有一陣子沒去了，但我認為希望不大──那裡到處都是惡魔。

Text: Thank you. I didn't catch your name.
New Translation: 謝謝妳。我剛剛沒記住妳的名字。

Text: Because I didn't say it. My name is Irene. See you around, Victor Vran.
New Translation: 因為我還沒說。我叫艾琳。後會有期，維克多．弗蘭。

Text: "Trying to make sense of what happened"<pause> She has another reason to stay here this long, I'm certain.
New Translation: 「試圖弄清到底發生了什麼」<pause>我敢肯定她有別的原因才長期待在這裡。

Text: Irene paints a bleak picture. Zagoravia is lost.
New Translation: 艾琳描繪了慘淡的景象。扎古拉維亞已經淪陷了。

Text: Adrian is a skilled hunter, but can he survive this place?
New Translation: 艾德里安雖經驗豐富，但這種地方他能撐下去嗎？

Text: And  why would he keep fighting for a lost cause?
New Translation: 而且為什麼他要堅持打一場敗仗？

Text: One less sword on our side, one more life claimed by the void.
New Translation: 我們又少了一位戰友，虛空又多奪走了一條生命。

Text: Locked! Is it to keep people out or to keep something in?
New Translation: 鎖住了？這是不讓人進去，還是不讓什麼東西出來？

Text: You'll have to talk to that Queen again. She can let you in. She is good at letting things in where they don't belong.<laughter>
New Translation: 你得再去找那位女王談談。她能讓你進去。她特別擅長讓東西進去不該進的地方。<laughter>

Text: I rise in the dawn, and I kneel and blow
Till the seed of the fire flicker and glow.
This spirit doesn't seem hostile. More like... confused?
New Translation: 這鬼魂似乎沒有敵意。反而像是……癡呆了？

Text: <reciting>And his head now resides on a stick.<laughter>
Victor ran through the dusty corridors of the royal crypt with a singular goal - to find his best friend.
New Translation: 維克多穿過布滿灰塵的皇室陵寢長廊，只為一個目的──尋找他的摯友。

Text: When Victor stepped into the large hall he was presented with a choice.
New Translation: 當維克多踏入大廳的那一刻起，他面臨了一個抉擇。

Text: Go left or go right, Victor pondered, as the monsters in the hall tried to claw at his flesh.
New Translation: 往左還是往右？在維克多猶豫的同時，大廳裡的怪物們向他伸出了魔爪。

Text: Not bothered by the monsters, Victor ran past them and took the wrong path.
New Translation: 無視這些怪物，維克多穿過它們，走進了錯誤的路。

Text: Having slain the last enemy, Victor made a choice and took the wrong path.
New Translation: 在殺了敵人後，維克多作出決定，走進了錯誤的路。

Text: Left or Right? The choice was proving too difficult for Victor.
New Translation: 往左還是往右？這決定對維克多來說太難了。

Text: Little did he suspect that the choice was meaningless.
New Translation: 他絲毫沒有想到決定根本毫無意義。

Text: Trying to be smart, Victor opted for a third choice.
New Translation: 自作聰明的維克多選擇了第三條路。

Text: But that was also wrong. There was nothing back at the entrance.
New Translation: 但這也是錯誤的決定。回到入口什麼也沒有。

Text: Moving on, Stanley... I mean - Victor discovered the lifeless corpse of a fellow hunter.
New Translation: 繼續前進，史丹利……我是說，維克多發現了一位獵人伙伴的屍體。

Text: "Weakling!" he thought "Dead at the start of the dungeon."
New Translation: 「弱雞！」他心想「怎麼剛進地城就掛了。」

Text: Running through the corridor, Victor noticed the body of a hunter.
New Translation: 穿過長廊時，維克多發現了一具獵人的屍體。

Text: Victor kept calm and carried on.
New Translation: 維克多故作鎮定地繼續前進。

Text: Coming up to another intersection, Victor continued forward.
New Translation: 來到了另一個路口，維克多繼續向前。

Text: Apparently lost, Victor realized that he had taken the wrong turn and decided to go back.
New Translation: 看來迷路了，維克多發現自己好像走錯了路，決定折回。

Text: Again on the right track, Victor pushed forward.
New Translation: 這次走對路了，維克多奮勇前進。

Text: Going in the wrong direction, Victor miraculously arrived at the entrance to the lower sections of the crypt.
New Translation: 朝著錯誤的方向前進，維克多奇蹟般地到達了下一層墓窖的入口。

Text: Being a good sport, however, Victor decided to stay a bit longer and have some more fun with his friend the Voice.
New Translation: 但為了展現運動家精神，維克多決定再多待一會兒陪他的朋友謎之聲玩玩。

Text: A beautifully arranged trail of blood and guts guided Victor forward.
New Translation: 布置華麗的血跡和內臟指引著維克多前進。

Text: As the corridor reached its end, Victor noticed the bodies of hunters and soldiers littered around the large hall.
New Translation: 走到走廊的盡頭，維克多發現大廳到處都是獵人和士兵的屍體。

Text: <singing>He bravely turned his tail and fled.
Coming up to yet another intersection, Victor decided to continue forward.
New Translation: 來到了另一個路口，維克多決定繼續向前。

Text: Coming back full circle, Victor realized that the choice he made just minutes ago was meaningless.
New Translation: 繞了一大圈，維克多發現剛剛下的決定根本毫無意義。

Text: As most choices in life often are.
New Translation: 正如人生中大多數的決定一樣。

Text: Have you changed your mind, hunter? Will you join our fight?
New Translation: 你改變主意了嗎，獵人？要加入我們的行列了嗎？

Text: The city is lost, Your Majesty. You should find a way to safety.
New Translation: 城市已經淪陷了，女王陛下。您應該想辦法逃生。

Text:
Battles are won by brave and noble men who see beyond their own immediate needs. In time you will realize that we have no other option but victory.

So, what brings you here before me?
New Translation:
戰爭是靠勇敢、崇高、願意犧牲小我的人打贏的。終有一天你會發現我們除了取勝之外別無選擇。

那麼，你找我是有什麼事嗎？

Text: I seek permission to enter the Royal Crypt, Your Majesty.
New Translation: 我想請女王陛下恩准，讓我進入皇室陵寢。

Text: These are difficult times and we need every man. <pause> If you report what you find there you have my permission.
New Translation: 在這艱困的時期，我們需要每一份力量。<pause>我准許你進去，但你要回報那裡的狀況。

Text:
This place is doomed, Victor. I know it. I have seen that same desperate, delusional hope in the past.

Zagoravia is already a lost cause. Yet, there is still money to be made here, so here I am.
New Translation:
這個地方已經沒救了，維克多，我很清楚。我過去曾見過同樣的絕望和虛假的希望。

扎古拉維亞注定要滅亡了。不過，這裡還是有錢可賺的，所以我還在這裡。

Text:
Many hunters came before you, Victor. Many brave men ventured into the night, but only a few returned. I made good money off them, though. My scientific expertise was greatly rewarded. Their absence is a loss but they left a few things with me.

Don't be alarmed, take a look. For science.
New Translation:
你來之前已經有許多獵人來過了，維克多。不少勇士冒險進入了黑夜，卻沒幾個人再回來。不過我從他們身上賺了不少錢。我的科學知識派上了極大的用處。他們的離開是種損失，但至少留下了一些裝備在我這裡。

別驚慌，隨便看看吧。科學萬歲！

Text:
That fire-headed girl, Irene, she is a good hunter - brave, but not reckless. She brought back some interesting items from her forays.

It's too bad she will die so young and pretty. Demons will have her, no doubt. Care to browse my inventory?
New Translation:
那位紅髮女郎，艾琳，她是位高超的獵人──勇敢，但不魯莽。
她從冒險中帶回了不少有趣的裝備。

可惜的是，她紅顏薄命，終究會死在惡魔手上。要來看看我的貨嗎？

Text: Another dead body. This is fast becoming a common sight.
New Translation: 又一具屍體。都快要習以為常了。

Text: I fear that someday I will get used to death.
New Translation: 我怕有一天我會對死亡麻木。

Text: Then I would be no different than the monsters I fight.
New Translation: 到時候我就跟那些怪物毫無區別了。

Text: Killed off one by one. Something is stalking these halls.
New Translation: 一個一個地被殺。有什麼正潛伏在大廳裡。

Text: Why didn't the hunters retreat and regroup?
New Translation: 為什麼獵人不撤退再集結呢？

Text: What was keeping them in this cursed city?
New Translation: 是什麼讓他們留在這座詛咒之城？

Text: The pieces are forming a disturbing pattern.
New Translation: 種種線索都指向一個令人不安的方向。

Text: Victor, is that you, old friend?
I have lured you to this place for a specific reason, Victor.
New Translation: 我把你引來這裡是有原因的，維克多。

Text: Come down and I will tell you.
New Translation: 下來吧，我再好好告訴你。

Text: Adrian, brother, what has become of you?
New Translation: 艾德里安，兄弟，你到底怎麼了？

Text: The time of the hunters is over, Victor.
New Translation: 獵人的時代已經過去了，維克多。

Text: This city will be their grave.
New Translation: 這座城市將會是他們的墳墓。

Text: I can make you stronger than you can imagine, Victor
New Translation: 我能讓你變得超乎你想像的強大，維克多。

Text: A single bite, Victor. That’s all it takes.
New Translation: 只需咬一口，維克多。就這麼簡單。

Text: You are blind, Victor! Like I was before I received this gift.
New Translation: 你被蒙蔽了雙眼，維克多！就像接受恩賜之前的我。

Text: Give in and I will make you see, old friend.
New Translation: 放棄掙扎，我會讓你看見的，老友。

Text: This city holds great power, Victor.
New Translation: 這座城市擁有強大的力量，維克多。

Text: Join me and we can take it for ourselves.
New Translation: 加入我，我們可以一起奪取這股力量。

Text: We always knew this could happen, old friend.
New Translation: 我們一直都知道會有這麼一天，老友。

Text: That we could become monsters ourselves, that we fall to the darkness.
New Translation: 知道自己可能會變成怪物，墮入黑暗。

Text: I came for my friend. What do you seek in Zagoravia, Irene?
New Translation: 我來是為了找朋友。妳來扎古拉維亞是為了什麼，艾琳？

Text: Nothing in particular. Exciting place, isn't it? Adventurous, you might call it.
New Translation: 沒什麼特別的事。令人興奮的地方，不是嗎？冒險吧，你也可以這麼說。

Text: Yeah, the nightlife seems to be booming. Seriously, why are you here?
New Translation: 是啊，夜生活似乎很熱鬧。說真的，妳為什麼來這裡？

Text: No business of yours. A girl has to keep some secrets, you know.
New Translation: 不關你的事。女人必須保守一些祕密，你知道的。

Text:
Feeling lonely, Vran? Come to chat? I have a story for you, then.

Have you ever seen the city you swore to protect being overrun by the enemy? Have you ever witnessed the agony in the eyes of your dying comrades? I doubt it; you hunters always roam alone, don't you?
Section: Act1 091 Sir Krum on hunters failure
New Translation:
感到孤獨嗎，弗蘭？要來聊天？那我講個故事給你聽。

你可曾見過自己誓言守護的城市被敵人攻占？你可曾目睹過戰友臨死前眼中的痛苦？我想不曾吧。你們獵人總是獨來獨往，不是嗎？

Text: The hunters were supposed to save the day. Her Majesty was adamant, she was convinced beyond reason, that you would turn the tide of the war. Yes, your kind came here, but you bled and you died just like my men.
Section: Act1 091 Sir Krum on hunters failure
New Translation: 獵人一直被期望著能扭轉敗局。女王陛下意志堅定，毫無理由地深信你們會力挽狂瀾。沒錯，你們是來了，但跟我們的人一樣，你們照樣流血，照樣死去。

Text: The story in a nutshell? My men died to give the hunters a fighting chance that they never took. I hear the voices of my men, whispering in my head, and they want retribution - can you give it to them?
Section: Act1 091 Sir Krum on hunters failure
New Translation: 簡單地說，我們的人陣亡才讓獵人有大顯身手的機會。我能聽到他們的聲音，一直在我的腦海中迴盪著，他們渴望復仇──你能完成他們的遺願嗎？

Text: You? Why are you parading around here instead of hunting monsters? Or have you tired of that?
Section: Act1 092 Sir Krum biting remarks on Victor
New Translation: 是你啊？你怎麼不去殺怪，反倒在這裡閒晃？你累了嗎？

Text: The survivors are gathered around the war table.
New Translation: 倖存者們聚集在桌子的周圍。

Text: There is tension in the air. There is also fear.
New Translation: 空氣中瀰漫著緊張的氣氛，也夾雜著恐懼。

Text: There are not enough guards to hold the castle.
New Translation: 沒有足夠的兵力來鎮守城堡了。

Text: Irene has been missing for a while now and they think that I have left them for good.
New Translation: 艾琳已經失蹤了一段時間，而他們也以為我不辭而別了。

Text: The Queen still insists on continuing the fight. She asks them to do the impossible.
New Translation: 女王依然堅持繼續奮戰。這等於要他們完成不可能的任務。

Text: What they need now is a sliver of hope.
New Translation: 他們現在所需要的是一絲希望。

Text: "At last you see. We will overcome the invasion."
New Translation: 「你終於想通了。我們會戰勝這場侵略的。」

Text: "This is not an invasion! I know what's happening here. The city is a trap. A trap for hunters."
New Translation: 「這並不是侵略！我知道現在的狀況。這座城市是個陷阱，針對獵人而設的。」

Text: I am going to look for Irene. Do you know where she went?
Section: Act1 13 sir Krum after cut scene
New Translation: 我打算去找艾琳。你知道她去哪裡了嗎？

Text: She is searching for something all over Zagoravia.  She left for the old tower in the Hunting Grounds but she did not return. I looked for her before the war council but I was unable to find her.
Section: Act1 13 sir Krum after cut scene
New Translation: 她正在扎古拉維亞到處找某樣東西。她已經去了狩獵場的舊哨塔，卻再也沒有回來。我在戰略會議之前找過她，但我沒有找到。

Text:
A crazy decision, Victor - to stay and fight. Try not to lose your mind like our beloved Queen and all the rest. They are doomed, all of them. No point in trying to save them.

But I will gladly sell you some potions, regardless.
Section: Act1 131 Alchemist on the decision to stay
New Translation:
留下來奮戰是個瘋狂的決定，維克多。別像我們敬愛的女王以及其他人一樣失去了理智。他們全都沒救了，別白費力氣了。

話雖如此，但我還是很樂意賣你一些藥劑。

Text: You are looking for your delicious little girlfriend.
New Translation: 你正在尋找你那鮮嫩的小女友啊。

Text: I'll help you find the doll.
New Translation: 我會幫你找到那位小妞的。

Text: And now - the amazing jumping spiders!
New Translation: 現在歡迎──神奇的跳躍蜘蛛！

Text: Using their terrifying demon powers to defy the laws of physics.
New Translation: 牠們能利用駭人的惡魔之力違反物理法則。

Text: Choices, choices... which way to go, hmmm?
New Translation: 往東，往西……該走哪一條路呢？

Text: If you feel so inclined to take the west road, give my regards to the hangman, will you?
New Translation: 如果你真的那麼想走西邊那條的話，請代我向吊死鬼問好，好嗎？

Text: Haven't had the chance to HANG out with him for a while now.
New Translation: 我好一陣子沒有機會和祂一起閒吊了。

Text: You know, I find you hunters a bit hypocritical.
New Translation: 我說，我發現你們獵人都挺虛偽的。

Text: You claim to be the protectors of humankind but the truth is that all you care about is killing for loot and gold.
New Translation: 你們自稱是人類的保護者，但事實上你們只是為了金錢和戰利品而屠殺。

Text: Come on, Victor, follow the gold coins!
New Translation: 來吧，維克多，跟著金幣走！

Text: Maybe there is even more treasure at the end of the golden trail or perhaps a big bad monster.
New Translation: 或許在黃金路的盡頭會有更多寶藏，也或許是一隻大怪物唷。

Text: I think you're going to like this place, hunter!
New Translation: 我覺得你會愛上這裡的，獵人！

Text: It has treasure, even more things to slay and a nice, colorful surprise at the end.
New Translation: 裡面有寶藏、有肉靶，最後還有多采多姿的驚喜。

Text: <sinister>Or are you too scared to enter?<laughter>
Have you always been a hunter, Victor?
New Translation: 你一直都在當獵人嗎，維克多？

Text: Doesn't it get old, doing the same things over and over - slaying monsters, looting chests, saving damsels?
New Translation: 不覺得過時了嗎？一直重複做同樣的事──殺怪、打寶、救美女？

Text: Perhaps it is your time to try a new craft. Something exciting. Like... a pirate!
New Translation: 或許你該考慮改行了。做點刺激的。比如說……當海盜！

Text: <singing>A pirate I was meant to be!
<singing>Trim the sails and roam the sea!
to the waters and the wild
with a faery, hand in hand,
for the world's more full of weeping
The woods are lovely, dark and deep,
But I have promises to keep,
And miles to go before I sleep,
And miles to go before I sleep.
Reach high, for stars lie hidden in your soul.
New Translation: 目標要高，因為理想藏於心中。

Text: Dream deep, for every dream precedes the goal.
New Translation: 夢想要深，因為有夢才有目標。

Text: The monsters just don’t belong here.
A hunter's job is often a grim and bloody affair.
New Translation: 獵人的工作多半殘忍血腥。

Text: But every now and then you get a view like this.
New Translation: 但有時還是會見到這樣的美景。

Text: Gives you a bit of perspective. Helps you remember what you're fighting for.
New Translation: 讓你能轉換心境，想起奮鬥的目標。

Text: Beware that, when fighting monsters, you yourself do not become a monster...
New Translation: 與怪物戰鬥之人，應當小心自己不要成為怪物……

Text: For when you gaze long into the abyss. The abyss gazes also into you.
New Translation: 因為當你凝視深淵時，深淵也在凝視你。

Text: This spirit knows the burdens of those that hunt monsters. Perhaps he was a hunter long ago.
New Translation: 這個鬼魂竟然了解獵殺怪物所背負的重擔。也許祂以前是位獵人。

Text: This place bears the taint of undead.
New Translation: 這裡被不死生物盤據了。

Text: The first time I faced a wraith I mistook it for an ordinary wandering spirit.
New Translation: 我第一次碰見怨靈時，還誤以為是普通的遊魂。

Text: I still bear the scar from that mistake.
New Translation: 我身上還留著當時的傷疤。

Text: Though they go mad they shall be sane.
New Translation: 縱然他們發瘋必定還會清醒。

Text: Though they sink through the sea, they shall rise again.
New Translation: 縱然他們溺沉必定還會浮起。

Text: Though lovers be lost, love shall not,
New Translation: 縱然愛人會失去，愛卻不會，

Text: And death shall have no dominion.
The spirit is right. As long as the curse over Zagoravia remains, death will not claim these poor souls.
New Translation: 鬼魂說得有道理。只要扎古拉維亞的詛咒一日不除，死亡也無法帶走這些可憐的靈魂。

Text: They are bound to reform and rise as undead again and again.
New Translation: 祂們會以不死之態不斷地站起。

Text: Welcome, welcome! This is my favorite place in Zagoravia. I call it "The cave of warm and fuzzy."
New Translation: 歡迎，歡迎！這是我在扎古拉維亞最喜歡的地方。我叫它「溫暖又舒服的小穴」。

Text: And what do we have here? This one looks special.
New Translation: 看看是誰來啦？這傢伙看起來真特別。

Text: Ohh, they are multiplying. Aren't they cute?
New Translation: 哦，它們正在分裂。不是很可愛嗎？

Text: Persistent, aren't you? If every time you kill one three more appear, this is bound to end up well for you.
New Translation: 真頑強，不是嗎？每殺一隻就會分裂成三隻，你注定要死在這囉。

Text: You should consider retreating. Oh, you can't, can you?<laughter>
New Translation: 你應該考慮撤退囉。哦，無路可退嗎？<laughter>

Text: Noooo! You slaughtered them all. Even the cute little ones... You MONSTER!
New Translation: 不──！你把它們全殺了。就連小隻的你也殺……你這畜牲！

Text:
Forget about Irene. She was doomed the moment she set foot in this wretched land. Her beautiful body is now no more than worm food. I warned her and I am warning you: do not venture into the dark! 

Now, how can I help you in this foolish endeavor?
Section: Act1 141 Alchemist in hub nags Irene is doomed
New Translation:
忘了艾琳吧。她踏入這片悲慘之地的那一刻起，就注定沒命了。現在她美麗的身軀不過是蟲子的食物罷了。我曾提醒過她，現在我也要提醒你：不要冒險進入黑暗！

好了，你那愚蠢的努力，我該怎麼幫呢？

Text:
I always knew this city is a trap, Victor. But you got it wrong. It is not just a trap for hunters, it is a trap for every last one of us!

Now, did you plan your escape in advance as I did? No? Well then, what can I offer you today?
Section: Act1 151 (During Looking For Irene Quest) Alchemist why its not a trap for hunters
New Translation:
我早就知道這整座城市是個陷阱，維克多。但你有一點錯了。這並不是針對獵人們的陷阱，而是針對我們所有人的陷阱！

你有沒有像我一樣，事先做好了逃脫的準備呢？沒有？好吧，那我現在能為你提供什麼呢？

Text: How did Zagoravia end up as a trap for hunters?
New Translation: 扎古拉維亞是怎麼淪為誘殺獵人的陷阱的？

Text: What kept them all from leaving? Not even one returned home.
New Translation: 到底是什麼阻止大家離開？甚至沒有人再歸來。

Text: The trap is effective - few of us are still alive.
New Translation: 陷阱真的很有效──我們的人所剩無幾了。

Text: With so few of us left, who will stop the next demon incursion?
New Translation: 僅靠我們幾個人，怎麼抵擋得住下一次的惡魔入侵？

Text: No point thinking about that now. I have to find Irene.
New Translation: 現在想這些也沒用。我得先找到艾琳。

Text: A truth that's told with bad intent
Beats all the lies you can invent.
<angrily>Yes, yes, but what does that mean?
What is the Well of Worlds? Is it the reason for the demon invasion? It couldn't be...
New Translation: 異界之井是什麼？是惡魔入侵的原因嗎？怎麼會……

Text: The Queen must know more than she lets on. She's hiding something.
New Translation: 女王肯定有很多事情沒說。她有所隱瞞。

Text:
Victor! How did you find me?

Can you see the spirit too? Can you make sense of his ramblings?
Section: Act1 19 Meeting Irene in the Mine
New Translation:
維克多！你是怎麼找到我的？

你也能看到那個鬼魂嗎？你聽得懂祂在說些什麼嗎？

Text: Irene, I’m glad to find you ... busy. I’ve seen this strange ghost before...
Section: Act1 19 Meeting Irene in the Mine
New Translation: 艾琳，很高興見到妳……這麼忙。我之前也見過這個古怪的鬼魂……

Text: You don’t recognize him? This is Tzar Borimir. His statues are all over the city.
Section: Act1 19 Meeting Irene in the Mine
New Translation: 你不認得祂？這位是波利密爾沙皇啊。祂的雕像遍布整座城市。

Text:
Seven stars in the still water,

And seven in the sky;

Seven sins on the King's daughter,

Deep in her soul to lie.
Section: Act1 19 Meeting Irene in the Mine
New Translation:
七星閃閃耀於靜水

七星遙遙懸於夜幕

七罪之恥深藏於心

國王之女因此安臥

Text: Again a cryptic poem. Every time he appears it's the same thing. It's like he's trying to tell me something but I can't understand.
Section: Act1 19 Meeting Irene in the Mine
New Translation: 又是隱晦的詩。每次祂出現都是這樣。好像想告訴我什麼，但我都聽不懂。

Text: The King's daughter? Are you talking about Queen Katarina? Speak to me, spirit!
Section: Act1 19 Meeting Irene in the Mine
New Translation: 國王之女？你說的是卡特蓮娜女王嗎？回答我，鬼魂！

Text: The daughter... unsealed... the Well of Worlds!
Section: Act1 19 Meeting Irene in the Mine

Text: Welcome back, hunters! We are happy to see you both alive and well.
New Translation: 歡迎回來，獵人！很高興看到你們兩個安然無恙。

Text: I believe you know something you're not telling us, Your Majesty. What is your role in the fate of Zagoravia?
New Translation: 我認為您有事瞞著我們，女王陛下。扎古拉維亞的劫難和您有什麼關聯？

Text: The Well of Worlds, Your Majesty! What is it? What did you do?
New Translation: 異界之井，女王陛下！那到底是什麼？您又做了什麼？

Text: The Well of Worlds is my blessing and my curse, hunter.
Section: Act1 21 Cutscene 3: Story of a Queen
New Translation: 異界之井對我既是祝福也是詛咒，獵人。

Text: It is a source of power hidden in our lands - a doorway to countless worlds beyond our own.
Section: Act1 21 Cutscene 3: Story of a Queen
New Translation: 它是藏在我們領土內的力量泉源，一個通往無數未知世界的入口。

Text: I unsealed it, many years ago to save myself from a mortal sickness.
Section: Act1 21 Cutscene 3: Story of a Queen
New Translation: 很多年前我打開了它，以醫治自己的重病。

Text: The Red Plague doesn't care if you are a peasant girl, or princess.
Section: Act1 21 Cutscene 3: Story of a Queen
New Translation: 紅色鼠疫才不管你是村姑還是公主。

Text: I became sick on my eighteenth birthday.
Section: Act1 21 Cutscene 3: Story of a Queen
New Translation: 我在18歲生日那天得病了。

Text: My skin withered, my hair started to fall out, vile red pustules covered my entire body.
Section: Act1 21 Cutscene 3: Story of a Queen
New Translation: 我的皮膚乾枯，我的頭髮開始掉落，我的全身長滿惡劣的紅色膿皰。

Text: The healers said that I would never live to see the spring.
Section: Act1 21 Cutscene 3: Story of a Queen
New Translation: 醫生們說我活不到春天了。

Section: Act1 21 Cutscene 3: Story of a Queen

Text: He didn't have the power to heal me, but he knew of eldritch forces that could.
Section: Act1 21 Cutscene 3: Story of a Queen
New Translation: 他沒有治好我的能力，但他知道有可以救我的邪術。

Text: He offered me salvation, a dark pact with the forces beyond the Well of Worlds.
Section: Act1 21 Cutscene 3: Story of a Queen
New Translation: 他給了我救贖，一份與異界之井彼端勢力的黑暗契約。

Text: I would have thirteen years of health before they came to claim me.
Section: Act1 21 Cutscene 3: Story of a Queen
New Translation: 我能延長13年的壽命，然後牠們就會來帶走我。

Text: My signature in blood was on the pact.
Section: Act1 21 Cutscene 3: Story of a Queen
New Translation: 我在契約上蓋上了血印。

Text: For everyone, my complete and swift recovery was a miracle, yet I knew it was anything but.
Section: Act1 21 Cutscene 3: Story of a Queen
New Translation: 對其他人來說，我的痊癒完全是一場神跡，但我知道事實並不是如此。

Text: Gabriel was made Lord of Zagoravia.
Section: Act1 21 Cutscene 3: Story of a Queen
New Translation: 加百列成為了扎古拉維亞的領主。

Text: Before he disappeared he left a parting gift – a spell that would deceive the demons.
Section: Act1 21 Cutscene 3: Story of a Queen
New Translation: 在他消失前，他留下了一件道別的禮物，一個可以蒙騙惡魔的法術。

Text: I thought I was safe and many blissful years passed.
Section: Act1 21 Cutscene 3: Story of a Queen
New Translation: 我以為自己安全了，幸福地過了許多年。

Text: On the reckoning night, the demons swarmed to claim me but they could not see nor recognize me.
Section: Act1 21 Cutscene 3: Story of a Queen
New Translation: 在清算到來的那晚，惡魔們蜂擁而來想帶走我，卻無法找到我。

Text: And all of Zagoravia paid the price that was mine to pay.
Section: Act1 21 Cutscene 3: Story of a Queen
New Translation: 而整個扎古拉維亞因此為我付出了代價。

Text: You know the rest of the story yourself.
Section: Act1 21 Cutscene 3: Story of a Queen
New Translation: 接下來的故事你們都知道了。

Text:
This is my story, hunter. I doomed my kingdom. The demon invasion is my folly, the price of my pact with the dark powers.

So strike me down, end the curse, here and now! I am ready to pay for my sins.
New Translation:
這就是我的故事，獵人。我毀了我的王國。惡魔的侵略是我的愚蠢，與黑暗勢力簽下契約的代價。

所以，殺了我，結束這場詛咒吧！我願意為我的罪過付出代價。

Text:
The sins of a scared, dying young girl... Your death will not annul the pact, Katarina. One evil never cancels another.

We have all done things we regret. At least you had the courage to stand and face the consequences.
New Translation:
驚慌、垂死的小女孩所犯的錯……您的死不會解除契約的，卡特蓮娜。邪惡是不會相互抵銷的。

每個人都有自己後悔的事，至少您有勇氣承擔後果。

Text: So, what do you plan to do Victor Vran?
New Translation: 那你打算怎麼做，維克多．弗蘭？

Text: Borimir knew of your dark pact, Your Majesty. An ancient spirit is a confused being, but he might find some clarity at the place of his passing. We can learn more from him there.
New Translation: 波利密爾知道您的黑暗契約，女王陛下。雖然古老鬼魂有點神智不清，但祂或許能在自己的逝世之地找回一些神智。我們可以從祂那裡知道更多訊息。

Text:
We do not know where the old Tzar perished but we can point you in the right direction. The Volkovs' were the keepers of the annals of Zagoravia since the city's founding.

The whole family perished in the invasion but hopefully the archive is still intact in their home in the High Quarter.
New Translation:
我們不知道老沙皇是在哪裡逝世的，但可以給你一個方向。沃卡夫家族自建城以來一直是扎古拉維亞史冊的保管者。

他們整個家族都在惡魔入侵時喪生了，但希望在他們貴族區家中的文獻庫沒有受到破壞。
