Text: I admit, I'm surprised, Vran. You did a noble thing going out there to look for Irene. I didn't expect a hunter to risk his life without some sort of reward.
New Translation: 不得不說，我很驚訝，弗蘭。你做了一件高尚的事，親身犯險去尋找艾琳。沒想到獵人也有無私的一面。

Text:
It was the Queen all along!

<angrily>A year I was looking for the cause of the curse and it was under my nose the whole time!
Section: Act1 23 Irene's story after she learns of the Queens guilt
New Translation:
原來都是女王造成的！

<angrily>我花了一年去尋找詛咒的原因，沒想到答案一直就在我的眼前！

Text: We couldn't have known without the spirit's help. You couldn't have foreseen this.
Section: Act1 23 Irene's story after she learns of the Queens guilt
New Translation: 如果沒有那位鬼魂的幫忙，我們也無法得知真相。妳不可能預料得到的。

Text: You don't understand! I thought... I thought I was responsible for all of it.
Section: Act1 23 Irene's story after she learns of the Queens guilt
New Translation: 你根本不明白！我以為……我以為這一切都是因我而起。

Text:
A year ago I arrived here chasing a sect of demon worshipers. I tracked them to their lair and killed them as they were performing a malevolent ritual.

On the following night the demons attacked and it all began. I thought it was all my fault.
Section: Act1 23 Irene's story after she learns of the Queens guilt
New Translation:
一年前我來到這裡追捕一群惡魔教徒。我跟蹤他們到巢穴，趁他們在舉行邪惡儀式時把他們一舉殲滅。

結果隔天晚上，惡魔就開始侵襲了。我一直以為都是我的錯。

Text: One year I've been trying to fix this. Many times I thought of abandoning this cursed city, but I was never able to leave.
Section: Act1 23 Irene's story after she learns of the Queens guilt
New Translation: 一年來，我一直在努力解決這一切。很多時候我都想放棄這座詛咒之城了，但始終放不下。

Text:
As if something was keeping you tied to this place, preventing you from running.

I think many of our fallen brethren felt this way. That is why Zagoravia is such an effective trap.
Section: Act1 23 Irene's story after she learns of the Queens guilt
New Translation:
仿佛有某種東西將妳束縛於此，阻止妳逃離。

我想我們的許多兄弟都有類似的想法。因此扎古拉維亞成為了非常有效的陷阱。

Text: Don't dwell on it, Irene. Now that we know about the Queen's dark pact, we know the root of the curse. Now we can unravel the mystery of Zagoravia.
Section: Act1 23 Irene's story after she learns of the Queens guilt
New Translation: 别想太多了，艾琳。我們已經知道女王的黑暗契約，知道那就是這場詛咒的根源了。現在我們可以揭開扎古拉維亞的謎團了。

Text:
A hunter survives on skill above all, but good gear makes our job easier.

Frankly, your current equipment is mediocre at best. Take a look at some of my special weapons. I could be persuaded to part with them for the right price.
New Translation:
獵人主要靠技巧存活，但好的裝備讓任務更輕鬆。

坦白說，你手上的裝備實在是平庸至極。來看看我的特殊武器吧。只要價錢合適，我可以忍痛割愛。

Text: <sarcastic>Have I told you how much I admire your hat, Victor?
New Translation: <sarcastic>我是否說過我很欣賞你的帽子，維克多？

Text: It goes well with your clothes; it is distinctive and flashy, yet not entirely ridiculous.
New Translation: 它與你的服裝簡直絕配；獨特鮮明，又不譁眾取寵。

Text: If I was a tough and dandy person I would've picked a hat exactly like yours.
New Translation: 如果我是雅痞猛男，我絕對會選擇跟你一樣的帽子。

Text: A man walks down the street with a hat like that; you know he's not afraid of anything.<laughter>
New Translation: 敢戴這種帽子走在街上的男人；你知道的，絕對是無所畏懼。<laughter>

Text: And so, the brave hunter vanquished the horrifying beasts, all thanks to his fabulous hat.
New Translation: 於是，勇敢的獵人擊敗了恐怖的野獸，全歸功於他超屌的帽子。

Text: Have you thought about adopting your own vigilante nickname, Victor?
New Translation: 你有想過給自己取個稱號嗎，維克多？

Text: Something like... "Hatman"! Because of your awesome hat.
New Translation: 比如說……「屌帽俠」！因為你的帽子超屌。

Text: Hat-man. Hatman. Hatman! It just rolls off your tongue.
New Translation: 屌帽男，屌帽人，屌帽俠！太順口了。
打倒那些石像鬼吧，屌帽俠！

Text: Go ahead, touch that pumpkin. I dare you!
New Translation: 上啊，我賭你不敢碰那個南瓜！

Text: Come on, touch it. What's the worst that can happen?
New Translation: 快啊，碰碰看。還能發生什麼更糟的嗎？

Text: No matter, I am sure you can deal with a single pumpkin.
New Translation: 不要緊，我相信你可以對付區區一顆南瓜的。

Text: And once again, the man with the distinctive hat has emerged victorious!
New Translation: 再一次，戴著獨特帽子的男人又獲得了勝利！

Text: The pumpkin lies defeated and ready to be cooked into a yummy-scrummy pumpkin pie.
New Translation: 南瓜被擊敗了，準備被做成美味可口的南瓜派了。

Text: Ooh, some circus freaks. Perhaps they want to be friends?
New Translation: 哦，幾個馬戲團怪胎。或許它們是想交朋友？

Text: Made it ma, top of the world!<laughter>
Listen to me, Victor, I'm about to tell you something very important.
New Translation: 聽我說，維克多，我要告訴你一件非常重要的事。

Text: Wait, this can't be right... All my children were daughters.
New Translation: 等等，不太對……我的孩子全是女孩。

Text: In any case, I feel an intimate connection to you, Victor.
New Translation: 不管怎樣，我感覺到我和你有著親密的連結，維克多。

Text: Perhaps I am your grandfather? Uncle? Second cousin twice removed?
New Translation: 或許我是你的祖父？舅舅？遠房表叔？

Text: Let's just say you are the son I always wanted.<laughter>
New Translation: 就當作你是我日以繼盼的兒子好了。<laughter>

Text: My, my, now this is interesting. Quite the longshot this plan of yours, isn't it?
New Translation: 哎呀呀，越來越有趣了。你那計畫希望渺茫啊，不是嗎？

Text: Find a ghost and make it part with its secrets. And the Volkovs... Oh, I think you know all too well that name, don't you, my dear?
New Translation: 找到鬼魂並讓祂說出祕密。還有沃卡夫……噢，我想你對那名字再熟悉不過了，不是嗎？

Text: Queen Katarina was right when she suggested that I search the Volkovs mansion for the information we need.
New Translation: 卡特蓮娜女王的想法是對的，她建議我到沃卡夫府邸搜索需要的資訊。
沃卡夫──扎古拉維亞史冊的保管者？

Text: Indeed they possess a treasure trove of written knowledge, but for far less benevolent reasons than the queen believes.
New Translation: 確實，他們擁有文字記載的知識寶庫，但他們的目的跟女王認知的善行相去甚遠。

Text: Through manipulation and blackmailing, the Volkovs family name is known for having extreme influence in the kingdom and the protection of the crown.
New Translation: 透過權謀和脅迫，沃卡夫家族在王國內因極大權勢和保護王室而眾所周知。

Text: In the hunters' circles though, they are known for hoarding priceless knowledge and forbidden rituals for sinister purposes.
New Translation: 但在獵人的圈子裡，他們則因邪惡的目的收集無價的知識和禁術而出名。

Text: Ah, the residence of the late Lord Valeri.
Section: Act2 02 Banter Rich Quarter - Small House
New Translation: 啊，已故的瓦勒里領主的大宅。

Text: He always threw the most exquisite parties. Lovely blood soup, superb black pudding.
Section: Act2 02 Banter Rich Quarter - Small House
New Translation: 他老是舉辦精緻的派對。迷人的血湯，超讚的黑布丁。

Text: <sinister>His cook truly had an excellent taste.
Section: Act2 02 Banter Rich Quarter - Small House

Text: It is said that once a piece of information falls into the hands of the Volkovs it forever remains theirs. All other bearers of said knowledge are rumored to wither and disappear.
New Translation: 據說任何消息一旦落入沃卡夫家族手中，就會石沉大海了。謠傳凡是得知相關消息的人全消失了。

Text: The Volkovs are Vampires... that explains a lot.
New Translation: 沃卡夫家族都是吸血鬼……這下我就明白了。

Text: It says here King Borimir fell to a conspiracy of envious nobles and was poisoned.
New Translation: 這裡說波利密爾沙皇掉入嫉妒貴族的陰謀中，被毒殺了。

Text: This happened in an old chapel that should be somewhere in the Onion Quarter, the poorest part of the city these days.
New Translation: 事情發生在一棟老舊的教堂裡，應該是在洋蔥區的某處，現今城市最貧困的地區。

Text: So much for the Volkovs clan I guess, at least in Zagoravia.
New Translation: 我想沃卡夫家族到此玩完了，至少在扎古拉維亞。

Text: You DO know they have footholds in quite a few cities, right?
New Translation: 你知道他們在不少城市都有據點，對吧？

Text: Perhaps one day you will meet again.
It may be raining down there, Victor, but up here in heaven the sun shines all over the place!
New Translation: 下界可能正在下雨，維克多，但天堂這裡可是陽光普照啊！

Text: Don't worry, I am not your god.
I am what god wants to become.<laughter>
And now for something completely different...

New Translation: 是時候來點原質體驗了！

Text: You seem fascinated by the macabre, Victor.
New Translation: 你似乎被死亡迷住了，維克多。

Text: It disturbs me to watch you like that, always so enthusiastic to enter a new cemetery or crypt.
New Translation: 看你如此著迷使我感到不安啊，總是這麼興致高昂地踏入新墓地或墓窖。

Text: You'll get there, Victor. You'll get there.
New Translation: 你會達到的，維克多，你會的。

Text: An ancient being roams the corridors of the Mausoleum. He is knowledgeable and powerful but I'm afraid he dislikes guests.
New Translation: 有個古老生物在陵墓的走廊遊蕩。祂知識淵博、力量強大，但祂恐怕不喜歡客人。

Text: Come on, Victor, I dare you enter. You're not afraid, are you?
New Translation: 來吧，維克多，我賭你不敢進去。你不是不怕嗎？

Text: Victor, I want you to meet the Broker!
New Translation: 維克多，我要你見見仲介商！

Text: He has some steaming-hot promotions for you. Go ahead, talk to him!
New Translation: 祂那有剛出爐的促銷等著你。去吧，和祂說話！

Text: I'm glad I'm finally out of this gloomy place.
New Translation: 很高興終於能離開這個陰鬱的地方了。

Text: Nonsense, Victor! Zagoravia is so beautiful at this time of the year - and our tour has just begun!
New Translation: 胡扯，維克多！扎古拉維亞每年的這個時候最美──而且我們的旅程才剛剛開始！

Text: Something is attacking me from above.
New Translation: 有東西正從上方攻擊我。

Text: I could use this to my advantage.
Careful, those monsters may be too tough for you.
New Translation: 小心，那些怪物對你來說可能太強了。

Text: <laughter>That wasn't fair to you, Victor. You are a big, strong hunter with such a fabulous hat.
New Translation: <laughter>這樣對你不公平，維克多。你是個高大威武、帶著超屌帽子的獵人耶。

Text: You could've taken those by yourself, I am sure of it.
New Translation: 你自己就可以搞定的，我很確定。

Text: Bravo, hunter! You have found a chest full of trash!
New Translation: 幹得好，獵人！你找到了一個裝滿垃圾的寶箱！

Text: Let's play a little game, shall we? I bet you can't find four more chests hidden around here.
New Translation: 咱們來玩個小遊戲吧？我賭你找不到藏在這附近的其餘四個寶箱。

Text: That makes two chests found, three to go.
New Translation: 找到兩個寶箱了，還剩三個。

Text: I'll bake you some pumpkin pie if you find them all.
New Translation: 如果你全找到了，我就給你烤些南瓜派。

Text: Three! You really want that yummy scrummy pumpkin pie, don't you?
New Translation: 三個！你就這麼想要美味可口的南瓜派，是嗎？

Text: <sinister>It's my speciality. People would just DIE to taste it.<laughter>
New Translation: <sinister>那是我特製的。一般人嘗一口就掛了。<laughter>

Text: You are almost there, Victor! Just find the fifth chest and there will be pie!
New Translation: 你快成功了，維克多！只差找到第五個寶箱就有派吃了！

Text: My pie is not a lie.
<sinister>It is just as tasty and real as you are.
You want your delicious pumpkin pie, don't you, hunter?
New Translation: 你想要美味的南瓜派，不是嗎？獵人。

Text: I have some bad news - you won't get it!
New Translation: 我有個壞消息──你得不到了！

Text: Turns out a rampaging maniac smashed each and every pumpkin in the city.
New Translation: 冒出一個胡鬧的瘋子把城裡的所有南瓜砸爛了。

Text: Who would attack some harmless pumpkins, I wonder?
New Translation: 我想不透，誰會攻擊無害的南瓜呢？

Text: Another thrall ambush. I'd wager their vampire lord wants to keep me away from something nearby.
New Translation: 又是死徒的埋伏。我敢說它們的吸血鬼主人想讓我遠離附近的東西。

Text: Don't be so prejudiced, Victor! I'm sure the vampires would be glad to have you for dinner!
New Translation: 別心存偏見，維克多！我確定吸血鬼們會很高興把你當晚餐吃掉！

Text: The poorest of the poor lived here. In the end this may have been an advantage for them.
New Translation: 這裡住的是最窮的窮人。結果這可能反倒救了他們。

Text: Poverty turns people into survivors. Maybe some of the denizens of the slums escaped death.
New Translation: 貧窮讓他們成了倖存者。或許有一部分貧民窟的居民逃過了一劫。

Text: Behold! The Lord of the Pumpkins that explode!
New Translation: 看啊！會爆炸的南瓜領主！

Text: Mind you, he might be a bit angry at you. He knows how much you hate pumpkins.
New Translation: 提醒你一下，祂可能對你有點生氣了。祂知道你很討厭南瓜。

Text: Ah, the Scyther in the Rye - the young man lost his mind after his fatally sick mother jumped off a cliff.
New Translation: 啊，麥田鐮刀手──這個年輕人在祂絕症的母親跳崖後，喪失了理智。

Text: He literally worked himself to death, yet he still wasn't able to afford to buy her medicine.
New Translation: 從前祂累得要死要活，但仍然買不起母親的藥。
啊～又一段感人的扎古拉維亞故事！

Text: Hey! Hey! I saw a survivor over there - quickly, up the hill!
New Translation: 喂！喂！我看到那裡有個生還者──快呀，在山上！

Text: Oh, I'm sorry, just an undead.
It is difficult to distinguish the starved citizens of the Onion Quarter from walking skeletons.
New Translation: 那些洋蔥區的挨餓居民和走動的骷髏還真難區別。

Text: Victor, while you've been busy I took my time reading some of these epitaphs.
New Translation: 維克多，趁你忙的時候我花了點時間讀了這些碑文。

Text: Hear this one, it's quite amusing: "Here lies my wife, a harlot and a shrew. If I said I missed her, I should lie too."<laughter>
New Translation: 你看這段，超好笑的：「這裡躺著我的妻子，一個潑婦淫娃。如果我說想她，我應該在說謊。」<laughter>

Text: Or this tombstone: "Vasiliy Dough. Pardon me for not rising."
New Translation: 或是這段：「瓦西里．布舉。請恕我起不來了。」

Text: But this one is the best: "Don't gloat. You are next!" Short and sweet, isn't it, Victor?
New Translation: 但最棒的是這段：「別幸災樂禍。你就是下一個！」簡單明瞭，不是嗎，維克多？

Text: Welcome to the Onion Quarter! Let me show you the sights.
New Translation: 歡迎來到洋蔥區！讓我給你介紹一下。

Text: To your left you can see the magnificent slum inhabited by the deprived workers who built the city with their sweat and blood.
New Translation: 在你的左邊，你可以看到雄偉的貧民窟，裡面住著窮困的工人們，他們以血汗築起了這座城市。

Text: Is that what you're fighting for, Victor?
New Translation: 這就是你為之奮戰的東西嗎，維克多？

Text: <concerned>Isn't there a way to persuade you not to do this, Victor?
New Translation: <concerned>有沒有辦法說服你不要那樣做，維克多？

Text: <mocking>It could be very, very dangerous…and I've grown to be quite fond of you.
New Translation: <mocking>那可能會非常、非常危險……我越來越喜歡你了。

Text: Between two worlds life hovers like a star, twixt night and morn, upon the horizon's verge.
New Translation: 生命於兩界之間盤旋，如星於天際晨昏交替。

Text: <laughter>The ghostly Tzar found his death here, you know.
New Translation: <laughter>幽靈沙皇發現祂的逝世之地了。
不知道你會發現什麼呢。<laughter>

Text: Lots of valuable goods stashed in this place.
New Translation: 大量貴重物品被存放在這個地方。

Text: This was probably a safehouse for the local criminals.
New Translation: 這裡可能曾是當地罪犯的藏匿處。

Text: Funny word - safehouse. No safe place in this city.
New Translation: 真可笑，藏匿處。這座城市根本無處可藏。

Text: <sarcastic>You love spiders, don't you, Victor? I think she likes you as well.
New Translation: <sarcastic>你喜歡蜘蛛，對吧，維克多？我覺得她也喜歡你。

Text: Perhaps you should put down your weapon and embrace her.
New Translation: 或許你應該放下武器去擁抱她。

Text: What a tragic end to such a beautiful love story.
New Translation: 美麗的愛情故事竟是如此悲慘的結局。

Text: Alas, these times of woe afford no time to woo.
New Translation: 唉，在這悲傷的時刻也不便求婚。

Text: The fungi in Zagoravia do not usually glow in the dark.
New Translation: 扎古拉維亞的真菌通常不會在黑暗中發光。

Text: It looks like those have been tainted by otherworldly energies as well.
New Translation: 看來這些東西也被異界的能量污染了。

Text: This chap was far scarier when he was alive.
New Translation: 這傢伙活著的時候更嚇人。

Text: He was a mime by trade. Believe me, death is an improvement.
New Translation: 它以前是默劇演員。相信我，死亡是一種進步。

Text: What? Are we right back where we started?
That can't be right. Go and make another lap around the cave!
New Translation: 不可能啊。再去繞著洞穴走一圈看看！

Text: <laughter>I can't believe you really did that.
You are so gullible, Victor, it is a wonder you made it this far.
New Translation: 你太容易上當了，維克多，你能活到今天簡直奇蹟。

Text: Will you do another lap, just for me?
Ossuaries were used as mass graves in ancient times.
New Translation: 藏骨堂就是古時候的亂葬崗。

Text: Plagues and wars filled them in a matter of months.
New Translation: 瘟疫和戰爭在幾個月內就能把它們填滿。

Text: Makes you wonder, how much the dead outnumber the living.
New Translation: 讓你不禁會想，究竟死人比活人多多少？

Text: And is this truly our world or theirs?
New Translation: 而這真是我們的世界，還是祂們的？

Text: The chapel is set ablaze with fires that give no heat.
New Translation: 教堂在沒有熱度的業火下熊熊燃燒。

Text: The forces of darkness have already worked their way into the sanctum.
New Translation: 黑暗勢力已經侵入聖地了。

Text: I wonder if the spirit of the Tzar is still uncorrupted or am I just rushing into the next sinister trap?
New Translation: 沙皇的靈魂還未被污染，不知我是否只是闖入下一個陰險的陷阱？

Text: Mortal, I sense the taint, the demon powers even in you! Do not come any further.
New Translation: 凡人，我感受到你體內惡魔之力的污染！別再前進了。

Text: Don't listen to him, Victor. Your powers have grown beyond his understanding. You must push forward to accomplish your goals.
Section: Act2 16 The Voice comments on Tzar Borimir
New Translation: 別聽祂的，維克多。你的力量已經超出祂的理解範圍了。你必須勇往直前，完成你的目標。

Text: I, Borimir the First Hunter, banish the shadows from this holy place!
New Translation: 我，初代獵人波利密爾，要把暗影逐出這神聖之地！

Text: Begone back into the Well of Worlds!
I shall suffer you no more, abominations! Your foul taint has tarnished my city for too long!
New Translation: 我不再受你折磨了，邪魔！你已經玷污我的城市太久了！

Text: The wraiths are too strong for my fading powers! You will have to trust the steel in your hand and your heart to deal with the rest.
New Translation: 這群怨靈對我衰退的力量來說太強了！你必須相信你手中的鋼鐵和你的內心，去對付殘存的怨靈。

Text:
Thank you for this, tainted hunter. I am Tzar Borimir, the first hunter. I had sworn to fight the demons in our world. It was I who built Zagoravia and established the Hunters Order to guard a secret that could destroy us all.

I built this city to hide and seal the Well of Worlds - a gateway to countless worlds beyond ours, populated by demons and cosmic horrors beyond imagination and comprehension.
New Translation:
感謝你的幫助，受污染的獵人。我是波利密爾沙皇，初代獵人。我曾發過誓要對抗我們世界中的惡魔。就是我建立了扎古拉維亞，並創立了獵魔組織，來守住能消滅我們所有人的某個祕密。

我建立了這座城市來隱藏並封印異界之井──那是一個通往無數未知世界的入口，居住著惡魔和宇宙間超乎想像的恐怖生物。

Text: For generations my legacy has been passed down the royal lineage of Zagoravia. In time my own kin forgot my words and the purpose given to them. And now - NOW - one of my own blood has sealed a dark pact with the very forces I had sworn to fight.
New Translation: 我的遺願已經由扎古拉維亞的皇室血脈傳承了好幾代。最後我的子嗣們還是忘了我的囑咐和給予他們的使命。而如今──如今──我的後代竟然與我曾發誓要對抗的勢力簽訂了黑暗契約。

Text: But who are you? I sense the demon taint within you! Flee, and do not turn back, for the Well of Worlds will corrupt your thoughts and tempt your heart!
New Translation: 但你是誰？我感受到你體內惡魔的污染！逃吧，不要回頭，因為異界之井會腐化你的思想、誘惑你的內心！

Text: I've been running away all my life. It is my time to stand and fight. Let me tell you my story…
New Translation: 我的一生都在逃避。該是我挺身而戰的時候了。讓我告訴你我的故事……

Text: Once upon a time, there was a prosperous kingdom.
New Translation: 很久很久以前，有一個繁榮的王國。

Text: Its citizens enjoyed a life of wealth, luxury and knowledge.
New Translation: 其國民的生活豐衣足食、學識豐富。

Text: Until its greedy neighbors joined forces in a vile plot.
New Translation: 直到它貪婪的鄰國組成了卑鄙陰謀的聯軍。

Text: Three armies surrounded the city and its fall was inevitable.
New Translation: 三支軍隊包圍了城市，它的淪陷是必然的。

Text: The young prince, heir to the throne, was willing to do anything and everything to save the kingdom.
New Translation: 年輕的王子，王位的繼承人，願意為拯救王國付出一切。

Text: In this most desperate hour, an old man whispered to him.
New Translation: 在萬念俱灰之際，一位老者對他耳語。

Text: <old man voice>"Open yourself to powers beyond this world, for this world has forsaken you."
New Translation: <old man voice>「這個世界已經遺棄你了，向異界的力量敞開懷抱吧。」

Text: <old man voice>"Seal your fate, my prince!"
New Translation: <old man voice>「決定你的命運吧，我的王子！」

Text: Those words burned the mind of the prince as fire.
New Translation: 那些話語像火一樣炙烤著王子的心智。

Text: He took the power he was offered and fought like a demon, summoning lightning and fire from the sky.
New Translation: 他施展獲得的力量，像惡魔一樣戰鬥，從空中召喚閃電和火焰。

Text: He turned the tide and the invaders fled in fear.
New Translation: 他反敗為勝，侵略者在恐懼中逃竄。

Text: He was a hero, a warrior of unseen power.
New Translation: 他是個英雄，具有前所未見力量的戰士。

Text: But great power always comes at a great price.
New Translation: 但強大的力量往往伴隨著巨大的代價。

Text: The children starved, for the crops would not grow.
New Translation: 作物不再生長，孩子們飽受飢餓。

Text: His father died of an illness unseen.
New Translation: 他的父親死於不明疾病。
他的國土在衰敗中淪喪。

Text: For the price of his power was the death and decay of everything around him.
New Translation: 他力量的代價就是他身邊的一切都會死亡和衰敗。

Text: Even though he was the last of his bloodline, the prince left his kingdom, for if he stayed, his people would suffer and perish.
New Translation: 即使他是最後的血脈，王子還是離開了他的王國，因為他若留下來，他的人民將受苦受難。

Text: Now he wanders the world alone, never staying in one place for long, lest his curse catches up with him.
New Translation: 現在他獨自在世界遊蕩，從不在一個地方久留，唯恐他的詛咒會跟上他的腳步。

Text:
I understand how you became tainted, hunter. Your past mistakes may be attributed to the foolishness of youth.

But are you any wiser now? Can you face demons and keep your hunter’s word?
Section: Act2 22 Tzar Borimir Starts The Trial
New Translation:
我明白你是怎麼被污染的了，獵人。你過去的錯誤或許歸因於年輕氣盛。

但你現在更有智慧了嗎？你能在面對惡魔時堅守你獵人的誓言嗎？

Text: I’m far past amends and redemption. But my heart is true. What must be done to break a demon pact?
Section: Act2 22 Tzar Borimir Starts The Trial
New Translation: 雖然談不上贖罪，但我是真心的。必須怎麼做才能破壞惡魔契約？

Text: There is a way. You must find the physical object that embodies the deal. Destroy it and the contract is void. The trouble is this pact lies in the demon world.
Section: Act2 22 Tzar Borimir Starts The Trial
New Translation: 是有個辦法。你必須找到契約的載體並摧毀它，契約就失效了。問題是契約在魔界裡面。

Text: Point me towards the gate to the demon world, Borimir! Tell me where to find the Well of Worlds!
Section: Act2 22 Tzar Borimir Starts The Trial
New Translation: 指引我前往魔界的大門吧，波利密爾！告訴我異界之井在哪裡！

Text: I will reveal the location of the Well to you, hunter, but not yet. If you aim to release Zagoravia from its curse in the demon world, then I suggest you make sure there is a city left when you return.
Section: Act2 22 Tzar Borimir Starts The Trial
New Translation: 我會告訴你異界之井的位置，獵人，但不是現在。如果你的目標是把扎古拉維亞從魔界的詛咒中解放出來，那我建議你先確保當你回來的時候這座城市還在。

Text:
There are several demons currently in Zagoravia of immense power. Each one of them has the potential to annihilate the city and all survivors.

I beseech you to defeat these monstrosities first. Return victorious and I will entrust you with the secret of the Well of Worlds.
Section: Act2 22 Tzar Borimir Starts The Trial
New Translation:
目前有幾隻強大的惡魔棲息在扎古拉維亞。每一隻都有消滅這座城市和所有倖存者的力量。

我懇求你先擊敗牠們。等你勝利歸來，我便會將異界之井的祕密交託於你。

Text: Didn't you like that chap better when he recited nonsensical poetry to you?
Section: Act2 23 The Voice sarcastic remark on Tzar Borimir
New Translation: 那傢伙唸些無意義的詩的時候，不是更討人喜歡嗎？

Text: Tad too arrogant for a thousand year old corpse, I would say.
Section: Act2 23 The Voice sarcastic remark on Tzar Borimir
New Translation: 區區一個千年鬼魂也太囂張了，我覺得。

Text: Spiders. Why does it have to be spiders!
New Translation: 蜘蛛。為什麼一定要是蜘蛛！

Text: Oh, look at all those spider eggs.
I wonder how many there are?
Let's count them! One, two, three, four, five, six, seven, eight, nine, ten...
fifty seven, fifty eight, fifty nine...
Ah, you made me lose count. Now I have to start all over again.
New Translation: 啊，你害我忘了數到哪了。現在我又得從頭數了。

Text: One, two, three, four, five, six, seven, eight, nine, ten...
Four hundred forty seven, four hundred forty eight, four hundred forty nine, four hundred fifty, four hundred fifty one, four hundred fifty two and four hundred fifty three.
Let's see... <mumbling>four hundred and fifty three multiplied by eight...
That's a grand total of three thousand, six hundred and twenty four legs.
Vail! The ancient corruption walks once again.
New Translation: 汎爾！遠古的穢物又出現了。

Text: I must follow his soul to find the phylactery.
New Translation: 我必須跟蹤祂的魂魄來找到命匣。

Text: There it is. I have to destroy this phylactery!
New Translation: 找到了！我得毀掉這個命匣！

Text: Oh, I've always wanted to meet Vail. His work is quite inspiring.
New Translation: 哦，我一直想見見汎爾。祂的傑作真是振奮人心。

Text: You would never guess half the things you can do with a carcass, let alone with hundreds of them. This bloke has quite the imagination, yes.
New Translation: 你永遠想不到你可以拿一具屍體做什麼，更別說幾百具了。這傢伙真是想像力豐富啊。

Text: Some sport you are! The poor bugger was on his back!
New Translation: 你該動一動囉！這可憐的傢伙八腳朝天了！

Text: Yes, yes, sure, just waltz into its lair uninvited and start trashing the place!
New Translation: 很好，很好，沒錯，輕鬆地闖入牠的巢穴，然後到處破壞！

Text: And so, our valiant hero has once again emerged victorious, slaying demonic spiders and defenseless stone columns alike, all in the name of better loot...
New Translation: 於是，我們勇敢的英雄又獲得了勝利，以掠奪的名義，屠殺蜘蛛和手無寸鐵的石柱……

Text: Don't worry, if they don't sparkle, you should be safe.
New Translation: 別擔心，如果他們沒閃閃發光，你應該是安全的。

Text: On second thought, those vampires seem more formidable than the monsters you've faced before.
New Translation: 仔細想想，這些吸血鬼似乎比你之前對付過的怪物要強多了。

Text: Are you sure you are up to the challenge?
New Translation: 你確定準備好接受挑戰了嗎？

Text: We wouldn't want you to end up like your buddy Adrian, would we?
New Translation: 我們可不想讓你落得和你兄弟艾德里安一樣的下場，對吧？

Text: Oh, look, a circus! I've always loved circus performances!
New Translation: 哦，你看，馬戲團！我一直很喜歡馬戲團表演！

Text: In fact, Zagoravia is one big circus right now.
New Translation: 事實上，扎古拉維亞現在就是一個大馬戲團。

Text: All kinds of freaks and sights presented to the eager audience. In this case - me.
New Translation: 各種怪人和場景都呈現在期盼的觀眾面前。在這裡──我就是觀眾。

Text: And your role is to play the clown, don't you think, Victor?
New Translation: 而你的角色就是小丑，你不覺得嗎，維克多？

Text: I heard an entity called Apocalypse resides in this cave.
New Translation: 我聽說有個叫天啟的東西在這個洞穴內。

Text: Can you smell it? Something stinks!
Maybe the conspiracy that you think surrounds Zagoravia?
New Translation: 也許是籠罩扎古拉維亞的陰謀味？

Text: Oh, nevermind, it's only the sewer shaft over there!
New Translation: 哦，沒事，是那邊下水道的臭味！

Text: Are you lost, Victor? There is nothing interesting in this direction.
New Translation: 你迷路了嗎，維克多？這個方向可沒什麼好玩的。

Text: Turn back and let's go see the circus!
New Translation: 回頭吧，咱們去看馬戲團！

Text: Those nasty-nasty vampires can't get you now. Right?
New Translation: 那些棘手的吸血鬼現在拿你沒轍了。對吧？

Text: Never have I set foot in a more unnatural place.  I’ve grown used to rot and decay, but this… ice and snow in this season?
New Translation: 我從未到過如此詭異的地方。我已經習慣了腐朽和敗壞，但這……這個季節會下雪結冰？

Text: The cold is cutting through to my bones. Yet it is nothing compared to the chill of anticipating the demon that sucked the warmth out of this place.
New Translation: 陣陣寒風刺入我的骨髓。但怎麼也比不上把這裡溫暖都吸走的惡魔寒意。

Text: Those frozen soldiers, they look so chic! I tell you, Victor, someone here has a taste for modern art!
New Translation: 那些冰封士兵，他們看起來好時尚啊！我跟你說，維克多，這裡有人具有現代藝術品位！

Text: Take care to get frozen in a more dynamic pose when you die, would you?
New Translation: 在你凍死前，記得擺個更動感的姿勢，好嗎？

Text: Ladies and gentlemen, welcome to the Gauntlet!
New Translation: 各位女士、先生，歡迎來到鐵手套！

Text: Let's hear it for Victor Vran, a hunter of some renown, who will brave the Gauntlet and try to make it to the end!
New Translation: 讓我們用掌聲歡迎小有名氣的獵人，維克多．弗蘭，他將在鐵手套中奮戰到最後！

Text: I can already hear the crowd cheering for you, Victor. Oh wait, are those crickets?
New Translation: 我已經聽見觀眾為你歡呼了，維克多。哦，等等，那些是蟋蟀的叫聲？

Text: Ladies and gentlemen, it looked close for a while, but Victor made it through the Gauntlet more or less intact.
New Translation: 各位女士、先生，雖然千鈞一髮，但維克多幾乎毫髮無傷的通過了鐵手套。

Text: Thank you, thank you! He'll be here all week!
New Translation: 謝謝，謝謝大家！他將在這裡表演一週！

Text: In times of old, this facility was dedicated to reeducating the most dangerous killers in the lands.
New Translation: 在古時候，這裡是專門對這片土地最危險的犯人進行再教育的場所。

Text: <sinister>Murderers, rapists and madmen. They were all transformed in the reformatory. Transformed indeed.
New Translation: <sinister>殺人犯、強姦犯和瘋子。他們都在感化監獄裡改變了。改變得徹徹底底。

Text: The sewers were constructed to reduce the threat of pestilence and disease.
New Translation: 這些下水道是為了降低瘟疫和疾病的威脅而建造的。

Text: Unfortunately, they became the breeding grounds for rats that spread the Red Plague two decades ago.
New Translation: 不幸的是，它們變成了老鼠的滋生地，那些老鼠在二十年前散播了紅色鼠疫。

Text: Let's find out what kind of rats live here now.
New Translation: 讓我們瞧瞧現在這裡住著什麼樣的老鼠吧。

Text: Welcome, hunter, to the home of the Collector. I trust you've already met his pets outside.
New Translation: 歡迎，獵人，歡迎來到收藏家的家。我相信你已經在外面見過他的寵物了。

Text: Exotic beasts, curios from faraway lands, pictures of cats; he collected them all.
New Translation: 奇珍異獸、異國古董、貓咪的畫；他全都收藏。

Text: Really dedicated to his hobbies, the Collector is. I hear he's into collecting eyes right now.
New Translation: 收藏家對他的愛好非常投入。我聽說他現在正在收集眼珠。

Text:
Apocalypse, the Demon Wraith, used to be held prisoner in this forsaken place, slowly draining all of its energies away to sustain its ever-burning wrath.

But it seems its master has already unleashed the hungering monstrosity.
Section: Act2 28 Tzar Bormimir reveals the Apocalypse demon left to attack the castle
New Translation:
惡魔怨靈，天啟，曾經被囚禁在這個遺忘之地，一點一滴耗盡了這裡的能量以維持其不斷燃燒的怒火。

但看來祂的主人已經釋放了這隻飢餓的怪物。

Text:
Apocalypse flew towards the castle. I fear that it is moving in for an attack against the survivors.

Make haste to castle Zagore, hunter. Save my legacy. Save Zagoravia!
Section: Act2 28 Tzar Bormimir reveals the Apocalypse demon left to attack the castle
New Translation:
天啟朝城堡飛去了。我擔心祂是要去攻擊倖存者的。

快回扎古爾城，獵人！拯救我的遺產，拯救扎古拉維亞！

Section: Act2 28-1 Banter in hub before battle

Text: At least there will be someone to patch me up after I'm done. Or bury my remains.
Section: Act2 28-1 Banter in hub before battle
New Translation: 至少會有人在我大戰後幫我包紮，或者幫我收屍了。

Text: Over there! On the balcony! Help!
Section: Act2 28-1 Banter in hub before battle

Text: Thanks to your efforts Zagoravia may yet survive, hunter. As promised, I will reveal you the entrance to the Well of Worlds. It is hidden below my crypt, in the Royal Gardens.
Section: Act2 29 The Tzar reveals the location of the Well of Worlds (after battle)
New Translation: 感謝你的付出，扎古拉維亞才得以倖存。如我所承諾的，我會告訴你異界之井的入口。它就藏在皇家花園裡，我的陵寢下方。

Text:
The history of the Well is entwined with the history of Zagoravia and my own. My ambition was too great for this world and I opened the Well of Worlds, a portal that connects our reality to countless others.

When I realized my mistake it was too late to go back. I had to do something to protect our world.
Section: Act2 29 The Tzar reveals the location of the Well of Worlds (after battle)
New Translation:
異界之井的歷史與扎古拉維亞的歷史及我的過去有著緊密的聯繫。我以前對這個世界有著極大的野心，因此我打開了異界之井，那是一個連接我們世界與其它無數世界的傳送門。

當我意識到自己的錯誤時，一切都難以挽回了。我必須做點什麼來保護我們的世界。

Text:
I gathered the noblest souls of the realms. We swore to hunt corruption and this new purpose made us a family. The Hunters Order.

Together we founded Zagoravia as a fortress to stand guard over the secret of the Well of Worlds for the sake of humanity. My hunter brethren and I swore an oath to guard the Well and our world from all kinds of unnatural and otherworldly threats.
Section: Act2 29 The Tzar reveals the location of the Well of Worlds (after battle)
New Translation:
我召集了領土中最高尚的勇士。我們誓言獵殺穢物，而新的使命讓我們成為了一家人──獵魔組織。

為了人類，我們建立了扎古拉維亞，作為守住異界之井祕密的堡壘。我的獵人兄弟和我誓言看守此井，以保護我們的世界免受各種非自然的威脅。

Text:
The demons used the Well to invade Zagoravia, so I bear as much guilt as Katarina for the current events, if not more. You can redeem us both, hunter!

Go now! Descend into the Well of Worlds and travel to the Demon World. Find the dark pact that binds Katarina and destroy it!
Section: Act2 29 The Tzar reveals the location of the Well of Worlds (after battle)
New Translation:
惡魔利用異界之井入侵扎古拉維亞，所以對於目前的情況，我承擔著與卡特蓮娜一樣，甚至更多的罪過。你可以救贖我們，獵人！

去吧！下去異界之井並前往魔界。找到束縛卡特蓮娜的黑暗契約並摧毀它！

Text: You're a resourceful man Victor, but you wouldn't last five minutes in the world of demons. Let me come with you.
Section: Act2 291 Irene Wants To Go To The Well Of Worlds
New Translation: 你是個足智多謀的人，維克多，但你在魔界撐不了五分鐘的。讓我陪你一起去。

Text: No. I've had enough people suffer the consequences of my decisions. I must do this alone.
Section: Act2 291 Irene Wants To Go To The Well Of Worlds
New Translation: 不行，我已經害夠多的人因我的決定而受苦了。這件事我必須獨自去做。

Text: Why are you doing this, Victor? Why would you risk your life for something that is not your cause?
New Translation: 為什麼你要這樣做，維克多？為什麼要為與你無關的事拼命？

Text: Oh, I see. You are looking for answers, for purpose. You believe that whatever lies in here would help you ease your guilt and self-disgust.
New Translation: 哦，我知道了。你在尋找答案、尋找使命。你相信這裡的東西能幫你減輕你的內疚和自我厭惡。

Text: Watch out! That one almost got you!
<sarcastic>Where do we go now? Where indeed?
If you ask nicely I would make a path for you.
New Translation: 如果你客氣的問，我就給你指引明路。

Text: Ooh, the silent treatment - I like your brazen attitude!
New Translation: 哦，不理我──我就喜歡你目中無人的態度！

Text: And now, I present to you - the Well of Worlds!
New Translation: 現在為你介紹──異界之井！

Text: Everything that you strive for is on the other side.
New Translation: 你為之奮鬥的一切都在另一邊。

Text: Go on, Victor. Touch the nice Well of Worlds and awaken it!
New Translation: 去吧，維克多。觸碰異界之井，喚醒它！

Text: That's it, my good boy! We are writing history, you and I!
New Translation: 就是這樣，好孩子！我們正在寫下歷史！

Text: The moment you have been waiting for all your life! Strike! STRIKE HARDER!
New Translation: 這是你等了一生的時刻！進攻！全力進攻！

Text: Be strong, Victor! Take your vengeance on the foul demons that cheated you and destroyed your life!
New Translation: 堅強點，維克多！對這些欺騙你、毀掉你人生的惡魔復仇吧！

Text: You did it, Victor! I am so proud, my boy. Go through the Well into the Demon World. Seal your fate!
New Translation: 你辦到了，維克多！我太驕傲了，孩子。穿過異界之井進入魔界。決定你的命運吧！

Text: You spoke one word too many! Now I know who you are.
New Translation: 有句話你說太多遍了！現在我知道你是誰了。

Text: Many times have I let my imagination drift into a demon world of my mind's devising.
New Translation: 多少次，我幻想自己置身魔界。

Text: I have gazed upon mountains of fire and molten rock. I have listened to a choir of countless voices, locked in eternal agony.
New Translation: 我凝視著火山和熔岩；我聆聽著被鎖在永恆痛苦中的眾聲合唱。

Text: As I pass through the gate, I find these washed away. What spreads before me is not a living hell, but a dying - if not already dead, world.
New Translation: 當我穿過那扇門，我發現這些都破滅了。在我眼前的不是一個煉獄，而是一個垂死──還沒消亡的世界。

Text: Are the demonic contracts the last purpose of this ancient and incomprehensible world?
New Translation: 惡魔契約是這個古老、不可思議的世界僅存的意義嗎？

Text: I feel the gate brought me where I desired to be, as close to the pact holder as possible.
New Translation: 我感覺我被帶到了我想去的地方，離契約持有者很近。

Text: There he is, the keeper of the pacts.
He will not surrender Katarina's contract easily.
New Translation: 牠不會輕易交出卡特蓮娜的契約的。

Text: Why have you come here, mortal? Why have you brought down this anger upon me?
Section: Act2 32 The Solicitor talks to Victor
New Translation: 你為什麼來這裡，凡人？為什麼把怒氣出在我身上？

Text: I have come for the pact of Queen Katarina of Zagoravia, demon. The same pact that allows creatures from your world to invade ours.
Section: Act2 32 The Solicitor talks to Victor
New Translation: 我是為了扎古拉維亞的卡特蓮娜女王的契約而來，惡魔。也就是那個讓你們世界的生物侵略我們世界的契約。

Text: I have no quarrel with you, mortal. A pact is binding for both sides and the price must be paid, one way or another.
Section: Act2 32 The Solicitor talks to Victor
New Translation: 我懶得和你爭辯，凡人。契約是雙方訂下的，無論如何都必須支付代價。

Text: Then destroy the pact, and end this.
Section: Act2 32 The Solicitor talks to Victor
New Translation: 那毀掉契約，結束這一切。

Text: Alas, I no longer have the pact, mortal. It was bought back by the one who facilitated the deal. A powerful being, one of the very first vampires of your world.
Section: Act2 32 The Solicitor talks to Victor
New Translation: 唉，契約已不在我手上了，凡人。它被促成這筆交易的人贖回了。一個強大的存在，他是一位你們世界上的吸血鬼真祖。

Text:
He came here not long ago and bought the contract for himself. In return, he promised his own immortal essence. While he holds the contract, the war between our worlds will rage on.

Undoubtedly, he thinks himself very clever. He believes he cheated me, as he will have to die to submit his essence. And a creature like him plans to live forever, of course.
Section: Act2 32 The Solicitor talks to Victor
New Translation:
他不久前來到這裡，他答應用他不朽的靈髓作為交換，贖走了契約。只要他拿著契約，我們兩個世界之間的戰爭就不會停止。

毫無疑問，他自認為很聰明，以為騙到我了，因為他必須死了才能交出他的靈髓。而像他這樣的生物，當然打算永生不死了。

Text:
You mean the contract is with Gabriel, the advisor of the Queen? And that he is one of the first vampires? That explains a lot.

You gave me the last piece of the puzzle, demon. I shall return to my world and deliver you the soul of a vampire immortal.
Section: Act2 32 The Solicitor talks to Victor
New Translation:
你的意思是說，契約在女王的顧問加百列手上？而且他是一位吸血鬼真祖？這下我就明白了。

你送了我最後一塊拼圖，惡魔。我會回到我的世界，把吸血鬼不朽的靈髓送來給你。

Text: I know the name of our foe.
Section: Act2 33 Cutscene 5: The Name of the Beast
New Translation: 我知道我們敵人的名字。

Text: He was careless to betray himself.
Section: Act2 33 Cutscene 5: The Name of the Beast
Act2 33 Cutscene 5: The Name of the Beast

Text: He is the whispering voice in our heads;
Section: Act2 33 Cutscene 5: The Name of the Beast
New Translation: 他就是在我們腦海中的耳語；

Text: The so-called healer who saved and doomed young Katarina;
Section: Act2 33 Cutscene 5: The Name of the Beast
New Translation: 那個救了也毀了年輕卡特蓮娜的所謂醫生；

Text: The old man who led a young prince astray.
Section: Act2 33 Cutscene 5: The Name of the Beast
New Translation: 那個引年輕王子誤入歧途的老者。

Text: <old man voice>"Seal your fate, my prince!"
Section: Act2 33 Cutscene 5: The Name of the Beast
New Translation: <old man voice>「決定你的命運吧，我的王子！」

Text: He is the one who tricked us; the one who turned this city into a trap for hunters.
Section: Act2 33 Cutscene 5: The Name of the Beast
New Translation: 他是欺騙我們的人；也是讓這座城市成為誘殺獵人陷阱的人。

Text: He is a schemer, a puppeteer, getting under our skin and inside our heads, using us as agents for his plans.
Section: Act2 33 Cutscene 5: The Name of the Beast
New Translation: 他是個陰險狡詐的人，在幕後操控著我們，利用我們執行他的計畫。

Text: He is one of the First vampires, more ancient and dangerous than anything I've faced.
Section: Act2 33 Cutscene 5: The Name of the Beast
New Translation: 他是吸血鬼真祖中的一位，比我面對過的任何對手都要古老和危險。

Section: Act2 33 Cutscene 5: The Name of the Beast

Text: His name is Gabriel. And I will seal his fate.
Section: Act2 33 Cutscene 5: The Name of the Beast
New Translation: 他的名字是加百列。而我將決定他的命運。

Text:
How could we have been so foolish, so blind? The voice, whispering in our heads, twisting our desires, how could we not recognize him all this time?

Find Gabriel in his mansion beyond the industrial quarter, hunter. He has always fancied himself a sort of scientist and is very unlikely to have abandoned the expensive equipment he gained with my family's help.
Section: Act3 01 The Queen gives the location of the final Boss
New Translation:
我們怎麼會如此愚蠢，如此盲目？那個在我們腦海中的耳語，扭曲我們慾望的聲音，我們怎麼會這麼久都沒認出是他？

去蒸汽區後方的加百列府邸尋找他吧，獵人。他自認是個科學家，不太可能會拋棄那些我們家族幫他獲得的昂貴設備。

Text: Seal your fate. The same words tricked me long ago, a naive young man facing a difficult choice.
New Translation: 決定你的命運。這句話很久以前就騙了我，一個天真的年輕人面臨艱難的抉擇。

Text: Seal your fate! Never have those words left my consciousness and I have carried their burden ever since.
New Translation: 決定你的命運！這句話在我的腦海中揮之不去，從那之後我一直背負著它的重擔。

Text: Gabriel brokered my own dark pact, and has done the same with Katarina in her moment of weakness.
New Translation: 加百列促成了我的黑暗契約，還趁卡特蓮娜虛弱時對她做了同樣的事。

Text: A fate will be sealed today, one way or another.
New Translation: 無論如何，今天有個命運要被決定。

Text: I see you're back from your little trip. How did it go?
New Translation: 你旅遊回來了呀，好玩嗎？

Text: Where are you going in such a rush, hunter?
<sarcastic>Slow down or you may lose your head.
You know what? I was beginning to think we were bonding, you and I.
New Translation: 你知道嗎？我最近開始覺得我們是好哥們。

Text: I watched over you, pointed out loot and kept you entertained, did I not?
New Translation: 我看著你，提醒你戰利品在哪，一路逗你開心，不是嗎？

Text: Now I can't help but feel there is a certain negativity in the air between us.
New Translation: 現在，我不禁感到我們之間有一股不快的氣氛。

Text: Oh, I really am growing quite agitated by your behavior, Victor! You wouldn't like me when I am agitated!
New Translation: 噢，我被你的態度搞得相當煩躁，維克多！你不會喜歡我煩躁的樣子的！

Text: Keep talking, Gabriel. That's how I recognized you.
New Translation: 繼續說吧，加百列。我就是這樣認出你的。

Text: Who knows what other secrets you will tell me.
New Translation: 誰曉得你還會告訴我什麼祕密呢。

Text: Oh...it replied to me, HOW SWEET!<laughter>
New Translation: 哦……竟然回應我了，太開心了！<laughter>

Text: Well Vicky, those are some big words. I'll make you eat up your hat for them.
New Translation: 好吧，維琪，既然你放話了。我會讓你為此吃掉自己的帽子。

Text: At first I thought about not talking to you anymore.
New Translation: 我本來再也不想找你說話了。

Text: But I can't stay mad at you forever. We share this connection, you know.
New Translation: 但我總不能一直對你生氣。我們之間有著羈絆，你知道的。

Text: Come to me and I will make it even stronger.
New Translation: 來找我吧，我能讓羈絆變得更強。

Text: Just like your friend Adrian. Remember him?
New Translation: 就像你的朋友艾德里安一樣。記得他嗎？

Text: Bah! Do you know what this whole place is Victor? Do you know its purpose?
New Translation: 欸！你知道這是什麼地方嗎，維克多？你知道它的目的嗎？

Text: You figured it out a long time ago, I know. To lure self-righteous bastards like yourself and then kill them!
New Translation: 我相信你早就猜到了。這是為了誘殺像你一樣自以為是的傢伙！

Text: Oh, and it works, believe me, it works. You hunters come like flies lured to manure and before you realize it -SNAP- it's too damn late!
New Translation: 哦，非常有效，相信我。你們獵人像蒼蠅撲屎般地自投羅網，而且還沒意識到就──啪──飛不走了！

Text: How long are you going to make me wait, Vicky?
New Translation: 你要讓我等多久啊，維琪？

Text: Do you feel unprepared for our encounter? Let me help.
New Translation: 你還沒準備好與我對決嗎？讓我幫你一把吧。

Text: Buy yourself some nice gear to make this more sporting, will you?
New Translation: 給自己買些好裝備，讓這一切更有趣，好嗎？

Text: Spiders. Of course there are more spiders.
New Translation: 蜘蛛，當然還有更多蜘蛛。

Text: It appears the vampires have found a way to breed the demonic arachnids.
New Translation: 看來吸血鬼已經找到方法培育惡魔蜘蛛了。

Text: In songs and legends a vampire would control wolves, bats and other creatures of the night.
New Translation: 在詩歌和傳說中，吸血鬼可以控制狼、蝙蝠和其他夜行生物。

Text: The grim reality is that the bloodsuckers strive to dominate everything that gives them even an ounce of power.
New Translation: 殘酷的現實是，那些吸血生物力圖支配一切能給他們帶來哪怕一點點力量的東西。

Text: For if there is one thing a vampire lusts for even more than blood...
New Translation: 因為，有東西比鮮血更令吸血鬼渴求的……

Text: Can you feel their souls, Victor? The miners, hundreds of them, disfiguring the earth with their pickaxes and drills.
New Translation: 你能感覺到他們的靈魂嗎，維克多？數以百計的礦工，用鎬子和鑽頭破壞土地。

Text: Can you sense their greed? The greed that made them dig that deep.
New Translation: 你能感受到他們的貪婪嗎？那個讓他們越挖越深的貪婪。

Text: For it is that same greed that drives us all. The miners lust for gold and silver.
New Translation: 同樣的貪婪驅使著我們所有人。礦工貪圖金銀財寶。

Text: You were just like them, only you desired power.
New Translation: 你和他們一樣，只不過你渴望的是力量。

Text: You signed your contract and still wield that same demonic power to this day.
New Translation: 你簽訂了契約，直到今日還使用著惡魔之力。

Text: Are we so different - you and I?
You are looking for me in all the wrong places, Victor.
New Translation: 你找我都找錯地方囉，維克多。

Text: Why don't you just give up? Or better yet, become one with the blood, like your dear friend Adrian?
New Translation: 為什麼不放棄呢？或者乾脆成為一個吸血鬼，就像你的摯友艾德里安一樣？

Text: You took a sliver of power once. I can offer you a lot more.
New Translation: 你曾經獲得了一些力量。我可以給你更多。

Text: Knock-knock. Who's there? It's me, Vicky, and I have come to DIE!
New Translation: 叩叩叩。是誰呀？是我，維琪，我來送死了！

Text: Some nerve on you, hunter, barging into my mansion uninvited.
New Translation: 你好大的膽子，獵人，未經邀請就闖入我的府邸。

Text: I have to say the other hunters had the decency to die without dirtying my carpets with their mortal FILTH beforehand!
New Translation: 我必須說，其他獵人很有禮貌，在用凡人的穢氣弄髒我的地毯前就死了！

Text: Let me make sure you don't get too far. Your smell will take forever to go away.
New Translation: 我會讓你走不了多遠的，你的氣味會永遠地消失。

Text: Oh, I can't wait for this little reunion of ours, teacher and pupil face to face once again!
New Translation: 哦，我等不及我們這小小的重逢了，師徒的再次聚首！

Text: You are not a teacher, Gabriel. You are not even the evil genius you imagine yourself to be.
New Translation: 你並不是老師，加百列，你甚至不是自認為的邪惡天才。

Text: You may be centuries old, but in all these lifetimes, you've been one thing and nothing more.
New Translation: 你或許上百歲了，但在這些漫長的歲月裡，你依然如故，一成不變。

Text: Enlighten me, Vicky. Pray tell, what am I?
New Translation: 說明白點，維琪。請告訴我，我是什麼？

Text: <laughter>That's a good one, Vicky. I promise you, you will be BEGGING me to suck your blood by the time I'm through with you.
New Translation: <laughter>這答案不錯，維琪。我向你保證，在我了結你的時候，你會「乞求」我吸你的血的。

Text: Why, if it isn't my friend - the Mad Hatter.<laughter>
New Translation: 喲，這不是我的朋友──瘋帽客嗎。<laughter>

Text: Please, make yourself at home. Care for some... DEATH!?
New Translation: 請，把這當自己家。要不要來點……死亡！？

Text: So how do you like the place?
It's a bit overwhelming for your brutish persona, isn't it?
New Translation: 對你這樣粗俗的人來說是不是不太自在啊？

Text: Well, yes, I do have my hobbies, being immortal and all.
New Translation: 好吧，是的，我有許多嗜好，成為不朽的化身。

Text: Playing with living things, making dead things out of them, making them living again and so on.
New Translation: 玩弄活物，弄死他們，再弄活他們，諸如此類的。

Text: <mocking>You, you defeated me, how can this be true?<cough>
<mocking> You...you are truly amazing, I am no match for <cough>for your splendor, skills and fine hats<cough>
New Translation: <mocking>你、你真是了不起，我比不上你，<cough>比不上你的光彩、技巧，還有超屌的帽子。<cough>

Text: <mocking>Have mercy, oh great hunter, and... <shouting>JUST BUY A NEW HAT, WILL YOU!<laughter>
New Translation: <mocking>饒了我吧，偉大的獵人……<shouting>你能不能買一頂新帽子啊！<laughter>

Text: Vicky, you DO know I'm only toying with you, right?
New Translation: 維琪，你知道我只是陪你玩玩，對吧？

Text: Merely having a good laugh at your expense.
New Translation: 不過是拿你尋開心罷了。

Text: I could quench your life with a snap of my fingers but where's the fun in that?
New Translation: 我用兩根手指就能捏死你，但那樣還有什麼意思呢？

Text: Tell me, did the Solicitor send you my way?
New Translation: 告訴我，是誘魂者派你來的嗎？

Text: I hoped you'd kill him for me and it looks like he had the same bright idea.
New Translation: 我本來期望你會殺了牠，看來牠也有同樣聰明的想法。

Text: Only one hitch in his plan, though. I don't plan on dying. Not today, not ever.
New Translation: 不過牠的計畫有一個問題。我不打算死。今天不會，以後也不會。

Text: You may not have much time left in this world, but please, don't take your rage out on my things!
New Translation: 就算你命不久矣了，但是拜託，別把氣出在我的東西上！

Text: These intricate devices took me decades to assemble. Breaking them is just rude.
New Translation: 這些精密設備花了我幾十年組裝。把它們弄壞簡直粗魯！

Text: Stop trashing my machines and die already!
New Translation: 不要弄壞我的機器，去死！

Text: You are seriously PISSING ME OFF!
Just look at the mess you made!
<angrily>I'll smash you like the little pest you are!
And by the way, your hat still sucks.
New Translation: 對了，你的帽子還是很蠢。

Text: Send my regards to the Solicitor.
Can evil ever be truly defeated?
Or is it eternal, like a dark seed, always finding new ways to sprout and corrupt the world?
New Translation: 或者它是永恆的，就像一顆黑暗的種子，總能找到新的土壤發芽，然後腐化這個世界？

Text: What I do know is the soul of the elder vampire now belongs to the Solicitor, bound by the pact signed with his own unholy blood.
New Translation: 我只知道這個古老吸血鬼的靈魂現在屬於誘魂者的了，被自己不淨之血所簽訂的契約束縛。

Text: In the end, he fell victim to his own plot.
New Translation: 最終，他淪為了自己計畫的犧牲品。

Text: Some kind of justice, to be sure.
Queen Katarina's pact was destroyed in the final fight.
New Translation: 卡特蓮娜女王的契約在決戰中被摧毀了。

Text: A difficult task lies ahead of her - rebuilding Zagoravia and dealing with the consequences of her past decisions.
New Translation: 她面臨一項艱巨的任務──重建扎古拉維亞，設法彌補她過去的決定所帶來的後果。

Text: She is not the only one who has to rebuild.
New Translation: 她並不是唯一一個必須去重建的人。

Text: Even in death, Gabriel accomplished his goals, tilting the balance of power in the world for the worse.
New Translation: 即使死了，加百列還是完成了他的目標，把世界力量的平衡向不好的方向傾斜。

Text: The Hunters Order is all but vanquished. Bearing my curse, I am not the person to restore it.
New Translation: 獵魔組織被擊垮了。背負詛咒的我，並不是適合去恢復組織的人。

Text: But I know the right hunter for the job...
New Translation: 但我知道適合這份工作的獵人……

Text: The guardians of the mortal race.
When Zagoravia fell, they came in droves.
New Translation: 當扎古拉維亞淪陷時，他們紛紛到來。
他們認為他們準備好了。
他們看起來自信滿滿，攻無不克。

Text: They carved a bloody path through the petty monsters,
New Translation: 他們在怪物群中殺出一條血路，

Text: deeper and deeper into the cursed city.
New Translation: 一步一步深入這座詛咒之城。
<emphasis>直到他們遇見了怪物的主人。

Text: I hunt demons for a living. It is a lonely trade.
New Translation: 我以獵殺惡魔為生。這是個孤獨的行業。

Text: At first you're the hero, the savior.
New Translation: 最初你是英雄，是救世主。

Text: But when the job is done, things quickly change.
New Translation: 但當工作完成後，狀況很快就變了。

Text: People realize you're as much a monster as the ones you hunt.
New Translation: 人們意識到你和你獵殺的東西一樣是怪物。

Text: Some demons are mindless. Those are the easy ones.
New Translation: 有些惡魔是不會思考的。那些很容易解決。

Text: Others are fierce and cunning warriors, fearless and ancient machines of destruction.
New Translation: 還有一些是兇猛狡猾的戰士，無畏且古老的毀滅機器。

Text: The worst are the ones that talk.
New Translation: 最棘手的是會說話的傢伙。

Text: Words have power, and demons use them to bind you in ways that you may not understand.
New Translation: 語言是有力量的，惡魔能利用語言以你無法理解的方式束縛你。
<red>禁咒在休閒模式下無法啟用。</red>

Text: (INACTIVE: Change to Normal mode and activate the required Hexes)
New Translation: （無法完成：請切換到普通模式再啟用要求的禁咒）

Text: INACTIVE: Change to Normal mode and activate the required Hexes
New Translation: 無法完成：請切換到普通模式再啟用要求的禁咒

Text: Are you sure you want to switch to <game_mode>? You can freely switch between Casual Mode and Normal Mode.
New Translation: 你確定要切換到<game_mode>嗎？你可以隨時切換普通或休閒模式。

Text: Loot drops are reduced in Casual mode.
New Translation: 在休閒模式下物品掉落數會降低。

Text: Trade this with GebaN for special items.
New Translation: 用這個與Ｇ瘦交易特殊物品。

Text: Trade this with GebaN in the Cauldron of Chaos for special items.
New Translation: 用這個與混沌之局裡的Ｇ瘦交易特殊物品。

Text: No gamepad controller detected. You need a gamepad to play local coop.
New Translation: 未偵測到手把。你需要手把才能遊玩單機合作。

Text: Gamepad <number> has been disconnected. Reconnect the controller or close this message to switch to <new_control_set> control set.
New Translation: 手把<number>失去連接。請重新連接手把或關閉此訊息以切換到<new_control_set>操作。

Text: Gamepad <number> has been disconnected. Reconnect the controller or close this message to drop out of local coop.
New Translation: 手把<number>失去連接。請重新連接手把或關閉此訊息以退出單機合作。

Text: Do you know that the gold which you bring here has some peculiar physical qualities? Perhaps it comes from the demon world.
Section: side: Alchemist 01 On why demons drop gold
New Translation: 你知道你帶來的金幣含有某種奇特的物質嗎？也許它來自魔界。

Section: side: Alchemist 01 On why demons drop gold

Text: Never mind, what can I offer you today?
Section: side: Alchemist 01 On why demons drop gold
New Translation: 別介意，今天我能為你提供什麼呢？

Text: I hope that contraption of yours isn't going to blow up the castle.
Section: side: Alchemist 011 Presenting the device to remake items
New Translation: 我希望你的怪發明不會把城堡炸掉。

Text: If I didn't know you I'd be insulted. Since we're friends I'll introduce you to my little baby - the Desolidifier! Oh, wait, this is not the right one. Ah, here it is - the Transmogrifier 10,000!
Section: side: Alchemist 011 Presenting the device to remake items
New Translation: 要不是我認識你，我會以為這是侮辱。自從我們成了朋友，我來介紹你看看我的寶貝吧──反固器！哦，等等，不是這個。啊，找到了──合成器10000！

Text: Oh yes, I've been trying to fix it ever since we fled here and now it works almost every time! It allows you to transfer matter and essence from one form to another, in other words, to change the way your equipment works or to create completely different, and much better items! The only drawback of this prototype is that it will consume a tiny bit of your gold every time you use it.
Section: side: Alchemist 011 Presenting the device to remake items
New Translation: 沒錯，自從逃到這裡，我一直試著修好它，現在差不多好了！它能讓你把物質與原質轉化為另一種，也就是說，能改變裝備運作的方式，或者能創造完全不同的、更好的物品！這個試作品唯一的缺點就是，每次使用時會消耗一點點的金幣。

Section: side: Alchemist 011 Presenting the device to remake items

Text:
A hunter should stay a hunter, right? Do what she is supposed to do! I am supposed to sell you all these gadgets and observe their effects in the name of science. Our fiery Irene is supposed to slay monsters and probably die a horrible death.

Why is she taking over my business, that's what I'd like to know?
Section: side: Alchemist 02 On Irene as vendor
New Translation:
獵人就該有獵人的樣子，對吧？去做她應該做的事！我才應該以科學的名義把這些裝備全賣給你並觀察它們的效用。我們那火爆的艾琳就應該去斬妖除魔，再悽慘的死去。

為什麼她要搶我的生意？真叫人納悶。

Text:
Did I hear you right, Victor? A spirit is sending you to fight demons? A spirit that only hunters can see?

Now, I might have a bottle with a spirit of my own for your condition...
Section: side: Alchemist 03 on Victor conversing with Tzar Borimir (During The Trail Quest)
New Translation:
我沒聽錯吧，維克多？鬼魂派你去對抗惡魔？而且只有獵人能看見？

好吧，我好像有一瓶藥能治療你的症狀……

Text: It was a pleasure knowing you, Victor. Any last purchases?
Section: side: Alchemist 04 Before going to the Demon World
New Translation: 認識你是我的榮幸，維克多。最後還要買點什麼？

Text:
Good job, Victor! Pardon me for asking, but whom did you talk to just after you dealt with Apocalypse?
 
Wait, don't answer that. Take a deep breath, relax. Why don't you have a look through my wares?
Section: side: Alchemist 05 on Victor talking with demons
New Translation:
幹得好，維克多！恕我冒昧，請問你解決天啟後和誰在說話？
 
等等，不要告訴我。深呼吸，放鬆。何不來看看我的貨呢？

Text:
A first vampire is a force to be reckoned with, Victor. To stand a chance in your fight, be sure to leave well prepared and fully stocked!

Have a look at my inventory, while I pack my things, just in case.
New Translation:
吸血鬼真祖的力量不可小覷，維克多。為了些微的勝算，做好萬全的準備再出發吧！

趁我收拾行李的時候，來看看我的貨吧，以防萬一。

Text: The voice in my head is ruining my concentration. Is he doing it on purpose?
New Translation: 腦海中的聲音讓我無法集中注意力。他是故意的嗎？

Section: side: GabeN 02 Repeating lines of the trader demon

Text: You spare me and I will sell you some special goodies. An exceptional promotion, just for you!
Section: side: GabeN 02 Repeating lines of the trader demon
New Translation: 你放我一條生路，我會賣你一些好東西。特別再給你折扣喲！

Text: Look for me in other places and I may offer you something else.
Section: side: GabeN 02 Repeating lines of the trader demon
New Translation: 在其它地方找我，我可能會賣你別的東西。

Text:
It gets to you, doesn't it? Seeing so many hunters fallen in their fight against the darkness.

We've lost too many members of the Order in Zagoravia. We must avenge them, you and I.
Section: side: Irene 01 On the fallen Hunters
New Translation:
看著這麼多獵人在與黑暗的抗戰中倒下。這讓你改變了心意，不是嗎？

我們在扎古拉維亞失去太多組織成員了。我們必須為他們報仇。

Text:
During my last foray I met Tzar Borimir. I don't know what you did to the old spook, but he is much more lucid now. We had a nice little chat, hunter to hunter.

The Tzar seems to have some high hopes for you. But don't get yourself killed on his account.
Section: side: Irene 02 On Tzar Borimir after he finds rest
New Translation:
上次冒險的途中，我遇見了波利密爾沙皇。我不知道你對老沙皇做了什麼，但祂現在神智非常清醒。我們愉快地聊了一會，獵人之間的交流。

沙皇似乎對你有很高的期望，但可別因此害自己送了性命。

Text: We were so blinded by the hordes of demons coming from beyond our world. We failed to see that the real enemy is from our very own. Vampires. Show them no pity, Victor.
New Translation: 我們被來自異界的惡魔蒙蔽了雙眼，而忽略了真正的敵人來自我們的世界。吸血鬼。不要對他們心存憐憫，維克多。

Text: So, Gabriel is one of the first vampires. He's the one behind all of this and you're going to confront him.
New Translation: 加百列是吸血鬼真祖中的一位。他是這一切的幕後黑手，而你將要對抗他。

Text: Don't be careful. Be frightful! Make this creature of the past feel your wrath! Avenge our Order! Good hunting, Victor Vran!
New Translation: 不是要小心，是要變得可怕！讓這個古老生物感受到你的憤怒！為我們的組織報仇！祝你狩獵豐收，維克多．弗蘭！

Text:
Praise heavens! God has answered our prayers in this hour of need and sent you here. I'm Casimir, servant of His will and patriarch of Zagoravia. You bring hope to my people and hope is what we need in these dark hours.

My prayers will be with you.
New Translation:
讚美上天！上帝在這關鍵時刻回應了我們的祈禱，把你送到我們身邊。我是卡西米爾，上帝的僕人，扎古拉維亞的牧首。你為我的子民們帶來了希望，正是我們在這黑暗時期最需要的。

我的祈禱將與你同在。

Text: The heavens blessed Irene with a brave albeit somewhat hasty heart. Be patient with her, my son. You two stand together against the darkness!
Section: side: Patriarch 02 on Irene, after first meeting with Victor
New Translation: 上天賜予了艾琳勇敢、但稍微魯莽的心靈。對她保持耐心，孩子。你們要攜手對抗黑暗！

Text: Thank you for your donations, my son. Each piece of gold enters the church coffers and will be used to build new homes and a future for the suffering. Continue to fight the sinful temptation of possession and the heavens will bless you!
New Translation: 感謝你的捐贈，孩子。每一枚金幣都會進入教堂金庫，被用於建造新的家園和應付未來的苦難。繼續抵抗身外之物的罪惡誘惑，上天會保佑你的！

Text: Remember, my son, our hope shines brighter in our darkest hours.
New Translation: 記住，孩子，越是黑暗的時刻，我們的希望越是明亮。

Text: Beware of the false sense of strength that contraptions and weapons often give, my son. Those crude devices have their uses, but put your trust in your own heart and soul above all things.
New Translation: 孩子，當心裝備和武器帶給你擁有力量的錯覺。那些工具固然有其用處，但最重要的是相信你自己的內心和靈魂。

Text: I worry for the Queen, my son. She has not confessed to me for weeks and I feel the darkness could have crept inside her heart.
Section: side: Patriarch 06 on the Queen (before Queens Story cut scene)
New Translation: 我很擔心女王，孩子。她已經幾週沒有來找我告解了，我覺得黑暗可能已經悄悄地侵入了她的內心。

Text: Godspeed, my son! Find Irene! No living soul should ever be left to the mercy of darkness!
Section: side: Patriarch 07 on leaving to rescue Irene (after Sprung the Trap cut scene)
New Translation: 一路順風，孩子！找到艾琳！任何人都不該受到黑暗擺布！

Text: Tzar Borimir was a great man, my son. The ancient scripts that were held in the Cathedral tell of his deeds. In ancient times he followed God's good will and founded this city to act as a beacon of hope, casting away the shadows that held sway over the hearts of mortal men.
Section: side: Patriarch 08 on Tzar Borimir (After accepting the Trial)
New Translation: 波利密爾沙皇是位偉人，孩子。保管在教堂裡的古老手稿記載著祂的事蹟。在古時候，祂遵循上帝的意志，建立了這座城市作為希望的燈塔，趕走占據在凡人心中的陰影。

Text:
Of all God's creations, vampires perplex me most, my son. Whilst demons are beyond redemption in their absent minded drive to sew evil, Vampires are of our realm. 

Where do they fit in the Creator's grand scheme? I am truly at a loss, my son.
New Translation:
在上帝的造物中，吸血鬼是最讓我困惑的，孩子。雖然單純追求邪惡的惡魔萬劫不復，但吸血鬼卻生在我們的世界。

他們在造物主的計畫中占據著什麼樣的位置呢？我真的想不透，孩子。

Text: Praise God, you returned, my son! Truly you are like Saint Borglas the Banisher, he who fought the unholy legions of the Enemy to bargain for the soul of the Maiden!
Section: side: Patriarch 10 after defeating Apocalypse Boss in hub
New Translation: 讚美上帝，你回來了，孩子！你真像驅魔人．聖波吉拉斯，那位曾和邪惡軍團奮戰，奪回少女靈魂的聖人！

Text: Father, I'm as far from being a saint as anyone could be.
Section: side: Patriarch 10 after defeating Apocalypse Boss in hub
New Translation: 神父，我不是聖人，只是個普通人。

Text: Do you wish to join our efforts to liberate the city, hunter? An experienced warrior like you will be invaluable to our cause.
Section: side: Queen 01 (repeating, before slaying Adrian) Invitation to join the defense of the city
New Translation: 你要加入我們一起解放這座城市嗎，獵人？像你這種經驗豐富的戰士對我們行動來說是無價的。

Text: We are glad you return unscathed. Stay and rest for a while, but tell us - how's the liberation of the city progressing? We believe the tide of battle will turn in our favor very soon.
Section: side: Queen 02 (repeating, after Spring the Trap Quest) Delusional belief in victory
New Translation: 很高興你平安歸來。在這休息一會吧，另外請告訴我們──城市解放的進展如何？我們相信戰況很快就會變得對我們有利。

Text: Thank you for all your effort...and your kind words, Victor. You helped me realize my sins and gave me hope that I will find atonement one day. A queen must be strong and you helped me be just that.
Section: side: Queen 03 (repeating) Disillusioned Queen, after telling her story
New Translation: 感謝你的付出……和安慰，維克多。你讓我意識到我的罪過，給了我有朝一日能贖罪的希望。女王必須堅強，你幫我做到了。

Text: Is it true hunter? If those powerful demons that could destroy Castle Zagore on a whim exist, why have they not done so already?
Section: side: Queen 04 (During The Trial Quest) on the strength of demons and the game Gabriel plays
New Translation: 真的嗎，獵人？如果那些能輕易摧毀扎古爾城的強大惡魔存在的話，牠們為什麼還不動手呢？

Text: I think whoever commands them is toying with us, your Majesty. Perhaps he hopes to lure more hunters to Zagoravia.
Section: side: Queen 04 (During The Trial Quest) on the strength of demons and the game Gabriel plays
New Translation: 我想是控制牠們的人正在玩弄我們，女王陛下。或許他希望能引誘更多的獵人來扎古拉維亞。

Text: Feel free to leave with me any item you don't immediately need, sir. You will find it in the same or better condition when you come back.
Section: side: Stash 01 Introduction as chest, before entering Royal Crypt
New Translation: 儘管把不急需的東西交給我保管吧，先生。等您回來的時候，您會發現它們依然如新。

Text:
Huntress Irene asked me if my storage space is limited. Why would I ever limit the number of items she, you or anyone else decides to entrust to my care?

Stash away, sir!
Section: side: Stash 02 random comment after Queens Story Cut scene
New Translation:
女獵人艾琳問過我：「我的儲藏空間是否有限？」我為什麼要限制任何人交給我保管的物品數量呢？

儘管存放吧，先生！

Text: Everything is here, sir. I never touched any of your items and no one can prove otherwise.
Section: side: Stash 03 random comment after Steam Quarter is reached (Act 3)
New Translation: 東西都在這裡，先生。我沒有碰過您的任何東西，也沒人可以證明就是了。

Text: Everything is in place as expected, sir. If you find some of the items different, rest assured, the new ones are better! And we all profit from it.
New Translation: 所有東西都如預期的妥當存放，先生。如果您發現東西變了，請放心，新的一定更好！我們都會從中受益的。

Text:
I think one of your stored items was misplaced recently, sir.

Oh, never mind, that was one of Irene's.
New Translation:
我想您最近存放的某件物品放錯位置了，先生。

噢，沒事，那是艾琳的東西。

Text: Sir, I have an awkward question to ask, sir! If the worst thing happens to you, can I have your weapons afterwards?
Section: side: Stash 06 comment before Victor leaving for final battle
New Translation: 先生，我有個不情之請！如果您遭遇不測，您的武器可以留給我嗎？

Text: Greetings, Vran. Words between warriors are needless, so good hunting out there.
New Translation: 你好，弗蘭。戰士間不需言語，祝你狩獵豐收。

Text: How could you battle such terrible foes and walk away unscathed? What are you?
Section: side: sir Krum 02 Comment during The Trail quest
New Translation: 你是怎麼戰勝如此可怕的敵人並毫髮無傷地脫身呢？你到底是誰？

Text: You really don't want to know that, Sir Krum.
Section: side: sir Krum 02 Comment during The Trail quest
New Translation: 你真的不會想知道的，克魯姆爵士。

Text: I don't know what is in your past, but I’ve grown to respect the warrior I see before me here and now. Perhaps you are too hard on yourself, Vran.
Section: side: sir Krum 02 Comment during The Trail quest
New Translation: 我不知道你的過去，但我尊敬現在站在我眼前的這位戰士。也許你把自己逼得太緊了，弗蘭。

Text:
It's good that Gabriel showed his true colors. It was he who convinced Her Majesty to stand her ground and call the hunters to Zagoravia, it was he who doomed all my men to death.

Could you do something for me, Vran?
Section: side: sir Krum 03 Before final battle
New Translation:
很好，加百列終於露出了他的真面目。就是他說服了女王陛下堅守陣地並號召獵人來扎古拉維亞，就是他把我們的人全害死了。

你能幫我做件事嗎，弗蘭？

Section: side: sir Krum 03 Before final battle
side: sir Krum 03 Before final battle
